We care about the comfort and satisfaction of our guests so we appreciate you letting us know what we can do to make your stay perfect. We'll make sure to communicate your feedback to the appropriate members of our team so that we may improve moving forward.  We're looking forward to sharing a more enjoyable experience with you soon. Thank you again and have a lovely day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: good location-promote private beach service but there were never any chairs and they rent to anyone-not just guests- its a beach hotel and fine-as expected -lots of kids in the pool and hot tub and full of sand by end of day-people are super friendly
Manager Response: We appreciate that you took the time to share your feedback, Christine.  We're glad you had a pleasant stay with us despite our services not exceeding your expectations. We've addressed your concerns with the appropriate members of our team so that we may improve moving forward.  We hope to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience that our guests are accustomed to.  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: Hotel location was in a excellent location. I thought the rooms were  a little dated. Restaurants in the area were great. Enjoyed walking out to beach without having to cross any traffic. Staff was good also.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you review, garyrG3532KH.  We're thrilled you enjoyed the fantastic views from Pacific Edge Hotel's prime location. We agree that we have the best placement in the city and we love sharing it with our treasured guests. We can't wait to see you again soon for another amazing experience!  Have a fantastic day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: The location and restaurants are amazing but the hotel is a bit tired.
Summary: The location near the beach is specatular.  The restaurant and bar are incredible with views that will blow your mind.  The staff are all lovely and friendly. The rooms however, aren't as impressive.  They're clean but just need updating.  The bathrooms is very dated and could do with improving.  It's also very noisy.  Pipe work is noisy and road noise can be a bit much (I was on a ground floor room next to the carparking).  Luckily most of the noise finishes by 10pm but you'll be awake early (fine for me as it made me get up early and walk on the beach).
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback.  We're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. We're thrilled that you took advantage of our breath taking views and amazing restaurant, however it's unfortunate you've noticed a decline in the quality of our accommodations. We deeply care about the comfort of our guests which is why we regret that your room was not up to your level of expectation. In addition, it's disheartening to hear that you had such challenges with the sound insulation in our rooms. We'll be sure to address your concerns with our team moving forward as the satisfaction of our guests is important to us.  We hope for the opportunity to host you again soon for a more positive experience.  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: This was a very nice hotel/motel right on the water. It was reasonably price and pretty basic. It was in a good location walkable to a lot of things. It had a private beach with towel service that came with the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this wonderful review!  We're so glad to hear that you had a positive stay with us at Pacific Edge Hotel! We're also thrilled that you loved our central location so much! We'd love to see you again soon so we can share an even more enjoyable experience with you.  Have a lovely day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Our favorite spot to visit for a quick trip!
Summary: I have grown up going to Pacific Edge so naturally I love the place with all the memories... Family vacations, my husband and I got married there, trips with friends... you name it! It‚Äôs such a great place to hang out, it suits all ages and families. The location is the best bc there‚Äôs so much to choose from in walking distance. It‚Äôs close to the main beach area and also close to all the great spots south of main beach. The beach in front of the hotel is a nice spot, not nearly as crowded. The staff is very friendly and helpful. We love it here and we can‚Äôt wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for this lovely review, Sherjayalltheway!  We're thrilled to know you had such a wonderful experience at Pacific Edge Hotel. We're also glad you enjoyed our prime location and proximity to so many of the city's best attractions. It's great to hear that our staff was very helpful and able to accommodate you. We're thankful to hear that you've found our hotel to be the perfect spot for so many occasions, and appreciate that you continue to choose to stay with us! We look forward to hosting you again so we can share yet another fabulous experience with you and make even more memories!  Have an amazing day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Keep it simple... It's not the Ritz
Summary: My fiancee and I had a great time at Pacific Edge Hotel. My sister stays there often and she recommended we go. I read a bunch of the reviews before going... the good, the bad and the ugly. The bad reviews are from people who had the expectations set too high. Keep it simple... It's not the Ritz. Take a deep breath, lower your expectations and have a kick ass time!  We want to throw a special shout out to our favorite of all time CHANTAL!!! She made our visit extra special.  There were some other team members who assisted to make our trip great: Jocelyn, Sophia and Peter.  Thanks everyone for a great trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review with us, Chuck!  We're thrilled to hear you had such an enjoyable experience at Pacific Edge Hotel! We also appreciate your kind words regarding our team. We're pleased to know that you felt valued by each member of our top-notch team. We strive to provide our guests with the warmest hospitality and most efficient service, so this is fabulous to hear! Your praise is not only rewarding, but also encouraging.  We'd love to share yet another unforgettable visit with you someday! Have a great day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect location in Laguna Beach! Eat the breakfast!
Summary: We stayed in one of the "budget" rooms (#205), and while it didn't have a view, it was super close to the beach and the main road through town. The staff went above and beyond to get us checked in early. The room had a small kitchenette and a small bathroom. The room is older but clean and comfortable and was perfect for our stay.  The resort fee is $15/day, which is less expensive than other hotels in the area. The parking fee is a little steep, so if you can avoid taking a car, I'd recommend that. Or, park somewhere cheaper and ride the free trolley through town.  It was so, so nice to just walk down the steps to the beach and relax on the lounge chairs that are reserved for hotel guests. There is a foot shower at the bottom of the steps to the beach and restrooms in the stair
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us, Christie!  It's fantastic to see how much you enjoyed your recent stay at our prime location! We strive to provide our guests with a very comfortable and modern environment. We look forward to hosting you again, in the near future for another outstanding experience.  Thank you again for taking the time to share your feedback, and we hope you have a fantastic day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: I visit Laguna several times a year and have stayed at many of the hotels in town. Pacific Edge rises to the top for me as the best choice. The ocean front rooms have one of the best views in Laguna. The waves are literally breaking right below your balcony. You are steps to the downtown shops, Orange Inn (best breakfast in town), The Deck, and the grocery market. The room rate is more reasonable than other ocean front options in town and they don‚Äôt gouge you with an excessive resort fee. There are great deals to be had weekdays in winter months and with no crowds. A special shout out to Peter at the front desk who went the extra mile to make my stay a slice of bliss! Highly recommend the Pacific Edge!
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review, Rob!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your time at Pacific Edge Hotel so much! We're delighted you appreciate our convenient location with its stunning views. We love sharing our breathtaking sights with our guests and your praise lets us know we're succeeding! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Have a lovely day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: This little spot is just so perfect! Situated between the action of South Coast Highway and the action of the Pacific Ocean, it is perfect for a getaway with your friends or family. Due to an issue during a previous stay, the wonderful management compensated us for a room with an ocean view. They were also kind enough to leave a bottle of wine and a handwritten note. We were so touched by the gesture.  This room is perfect and we don‚Äôt want to leave! I highly recommend this adorable spot. It‚Äôs perfectly located near restaurants, nightlife, and shopping. I can‚Äôt recommend this place highly enough. I recommend getting an ocean room if you can. Absolutely fantastic!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this wonderful review, Missmolly3011!  We're thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay at Pacific Edge Hotel so much! We strive for excellence so we're pleased to hear you appreciated not only our staff's kind and attentive service, but also our location! Your praise lets us know we're succeeding!  We can't wait to host you again for yet another unforgettable visit! Have a lovely day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: For this hotel, you clearly are paying for the location.  The building is an older building that any place else would be considered a budget motel.  We booked one of the oceanfront rooms (room 125 or 225, I think).  We loved the convenience of walking down a flight of stairs to the beach with our kids.  The beds were clean and comfortable, and the room was spacious. The bathroom finishes were not as high-end as they could have been, and the bathroom was pretty small, but it was clean.  When we checked in, one of the lights was out and the heater was not heating the room fully, but a very nice maintenance guy came right away to loan us a space heater for the other side of the room and replace the light bulb.  The refrigerator was turned on to the warmest setting, so the frozen
Manager Response: Dear Fraz, I hope you are well and had a safe journey back to New Mexico.  First and foremost I want to thank you for sharing feedback from your recent stay with us. It definitely sounds as if we let you down. Our number one goal is to provide excellent service along with a fully functional room. It appears this wasn‚Äôt the case. I am ever so sorry to learn you had a light that didn‚Äôt work properly. I can understand how frustrating this must have been. I must admit the last part of your review was very disappointing to learn that your generosity didn‚Äôt go as it should have. I will be further investigating all of the items you addressed and will be carrying out an investigation with regards to the missing money  We hope all our guests leave with a memorable experience and want them to come back. I would very much like the opportunity to speak with you further about your getaway and hope you will allow us to redeem ourselves. Please let me know the best number and time to call you. Alternatively I can be reached directly at josh.brown@pacificedgehotel.com. My number is (310) 850-6744  I look forward to hearing from you.  Warmest Regards,  Josh  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Edge Hotel in their "Pacific Suite". This a a detached vintage home that they have remodeled and it is the PERFECT place to stay in Laguna Beach! A home away from home. It has two bedrooms, a balcony overlooking the ocean with white water sound and views. There are three fireplaces - Master bed, bed two and the Master bath. It is spacious with beamed vaulted ceilings. The beds were so comfortable and the decor was darling. There is a LARGE open walk-in closet off the Master Bed where my daughter was able to get ready for her wedding. It is more like a room off the Master, with a large, full-length mirror. You could call it the "bridal room". The staff was friendly and helpful. They have valet parking, as well. The location couldn't be better as you are
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review!  We're happy your time at Pacific Edge Hotel was so excellent! It's amazing you appreciated our spacious and comfortable accommodations. We endeavor to ensure our guests have a memorable and relaxing experience. We can't wait to host you again soon for another splendid experience!  Have a fantastic day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: Collina the manager is a sweetheart and she helped us out a lot. This please is wonderful and we always stay here when in laguna.  Very accommodating and friendly staff.  We love their jet tubs.  Thank goodness !!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for the perfect rating, 832karlak!  We're pleased to hear that you have fully enjoyed your stay at Pacific Edge Hotel, as we strive to create a full service experience for our guests. We can't wait to see you again soon! Have a fantastic day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: A Dump with a Great Location
Summary: We booked the studio suite with a King, Queen, and kitchenette for $151 supposedly 20% off, plus $34 parking fee, and $16 resort fee on hotels.com totaling our one night stay at $188. We checked in to find a room last renovated in maybe the 60-70s by a ‚Äúhandy man slap things together fix-it guy just to get the job done‚Äù kind of work. The tiled countertops in the kitchenette and bathroom hand been covered with the white lacquer used to refinish bathtubs and were peeling. The carpet was the cheap blue carpet you would usually find in green for faux indoor putting green. The bathroom light was not working, tub was peeling, and the countertop was smudged with makeup and a hair. I took photos and went to the check in counter to request a clean room. If I hadn‚Äôt brought my twin babies
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, jkrosado.  It's disheartening that we couldn't exceed your expectations and offer you the most positive experience possible. We care deeply about the satisfaction of our guests so we do hope you give us another opportunity to improve your opinion of us.  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: We LOVE the staff!!! The rooms, not so much.  Looking for a hotel we checked social media and loved the location and loom of the rooms. The location is amazing, but our room has not been updated in 50+ years?  The smell is disgusting from the dogs that have urinated on the floor and balcony. When asked for help, the amazing staff did come clean it up the best they could.  We still don't want to walk in the room or on the balcony without shoes. Heater doesn't work, so they brought up a portable. Toilet flushing is a bit temperamental.   Staff is GREAT, but won't stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback, Global102661. I'd very much like the opportunity to speak with you about your stay. Please feel free to contact me directly at josh.brown@pacificedgehotel.com.  I look forward to hearing from you.  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: We loved being on the ocean at this hotel but we were very disappointed to discover the inaccurate price listed on Expedia. That price omitted a $34 a day parking fee as well as a $16 a day internet fee. That‚Äôs $50 a day more than we thought we were paying. We feel all fees should be upfront and not buried in the website.
Manager Response: Sara P, we appreciate your feedback.  We strive to offer our guests quality service and comfort. However, it's unfortunate that your stay with us was anything less than perfect. We'd love to see you again in the future to share a more positive experience with you.  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Some great, some not so great
Summary: There are great reviews of this hotel, and terrible reviews. They are both accurate. The location is fantastic, couldn't be better. The view is *amazing* from the ocean front rooms. But parts of the hotel are rusted, dirty, and rotting away. The "remodel" was clearly done on the cheap. One row of ocean-front rooms isn't being used and looks like it should be condemned. But we have stayed here more than once and might stay again because of the unbelievable view. Unfortunately, people would often smoke on their balconies, and the front office said they would ask them to stop but never did. It makes it hard to open your window at night when you get woken up by people smoking at 3am.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Kirsten.  We're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. It's unfortunate you've noticed a decline in the quality of our accommodations. We care about the comfort of our guests so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We hope for the opportunity to host you again soon for a more positive experience.  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: This is one of my favorite hotels in Laguna Beach.  I stayed in the Reef building. Rooms are spacious and the views are Epic.  You can hear the ocean as it breaking right below the building.  There is a community area with a fire pit for lounging which is located on the back side of the building.  I‚Äôll be staying here again when I return to Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Thanks for the glowing rating, Todd!  We're delighted you had such a fantastic experience at Pacific Edge Hotel! It's great to know we left you with a wonderful impression and that you enjoyed our stunning views. We look forward to hosting you again soon.  Have a lovely day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Views but no longer a value
Summary: I booked the rooms for a family thanksgiving trip. No longer the same standards with the new owner.  Rooms and carpets are dirty. Furniture broke and needs an update.  It was more expensive than previous trips and the valet ( only parking available is 35 per day for guests). Ocean views still gorgeous.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback.  It's unfortunate your stay in our hotel didn't exceed your expectations. We regret you weren't entirely satisfied with our furnishings and accommodations. We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address all of your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: In any hotel stay, there are bound to be issues, it‚Äôs how the staff responds that makes or breaks the experience! The hotel is due for a makeover, and I was told that a remodel is coming in the near future.  The entire staff was fantastic!  They were all friendly and professional.  I spoke to Assistant General Manager Josh about a couple of issues and couldn't be happier with his response and professionalism!  Because of Josh, we will be back for future visits, and are looking forward to visiting after the remodel!
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent rating, dreamreacher1969!  We're so glad that you've enjoyed your stay at Pacific Edge Hotel so much. It's wonderful to know that your interactions with our staff have been so positive. We strive to provide each guest with exceptional service and we're so glad that several members of our team went above and beyond to ensure your satisfaction. We'll be sure to pass your compliments along to our team.  Thanks again for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Have a beautiful day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: My husband and I wanted to getaway for a couple of nights and chose Pacific Edge. I booked it directly with the hotel which was easy. I was able to request a lower floor level facing the ocean and a mini fridge. Staff, room and valet were wonderful. The sunsets were breathtaking and the surf below your room was amazing to watch and listen too. We also enjoyed the drive to Newport Beach took the car ferry to Balboa Island for lunch. I would definitely book again.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing this perfect rating, Kathy!  We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay at Pacific Edge Hotel! It's our pleasure to accommodate you to the fullest extent. After all, your happiness is our top priority! We're already looking forward to your next visit!  Have a beautiful day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: Great location right on the beach.  Lots of art galleries/restaurants nearby.  Good restaurant at the hotel.  Beautiful ocean views.  TV in room.  We stayed in a room with an ocean view and a balcony that is right on the ocean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, Jeff!  We're thrilled to hear that you had a great stay with us! It's wonderful that you loved our central location so much! We'd love to see you again soon so we can share an even more positive experience with you.  Have a fantastic day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: I will start by saying that this is a very reasonably priced hotel, and therefore it's important to note you get what you pay for.  However our stay had issues from start to finish.  And I don't care how cheap it is, roaches and wet carpets are just unacceptable at any price point.  First, I called two days prior to check in to see what upgrades were available.  I was told of three upgrade opportunities, noted which one I wanted to take advantage of and was assured that notes were in the computer regarding my request.  I then specifically asked if I needed to pay for the upgrade at that time over the phone, and was explicitly told "No, we've got you all set here in the computer."  When we arrived we were told that all upgraded rooms had already been sold.  The woman who informed
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback, shimsham41.  It's unfortunate your time with us didn't measure up to the high standards we're accustomed to sharing with our guests. We do hope for the opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: If you book a hotel room at this hotel you must get an ocean view, it‚Äôsit simply the best.  You are literally right on the ocean and you can‚Äôt get any closer.    The buildings are a bit dated but the restaurants are great and the service is fantastic.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  It's outstanding you had such a wonderful experience with us! We're delighted you enjoyed our excellent location with its stunning and breathtaking views. That's what we like to see! We can't wait to see you again soon so we can share those beautiful scenes with you once more!  Have a fantastic day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: We stayed in one of the smaller rooms on road side. You are paying for location not for the room itself. The bathroom is tiny and the room is dated but it's on the beach. The beach service was nice. We were able to get beach chairs and an umbrella.
Manager Response: Thanks for the 4/5 rating, angie4media!  We're thrilled you enjoyed your time with us so much! We look forward to sharing an even better experience with you soon. Have a lovely day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: The Pacific Edge Hotel and Laguna Beach was perfect for our first out of state trip with our 6 month old! It‚Äôs a simple little hotel with modest rooms but it‚Äôs RIGHT on the beach and even prettier with an ocean front room like we had! It was worth the few extra bucks. The restaurant was very high quality too. They also make things easy-peasy with the valet parking and nice guys that set you up with beach chairs and an umbrella there on site. I thought everything was perfect and a good value too. Nice restaurants and cool art galleries are all along the main strip. Recommend!
Manager Response: Thanks for the outstanding rating, sarahpclark27!  We're delighted your time with us was so amazing! We strive for excellence. We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another fantastic experience with you. Have a splendid day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful Location, low key classy, good vibes but parking fee and resort fee very high...
Summary: We go often to enjoy their salted pool and Hot tub and get a double queen room that face the swimming pool... love the location as it's step to the beach and you can get your own lounge chairs and umbrella... beautiful setting for sunset.  Their breakfast place and restaurant just on the beach is a delight too. The rooms are a bit small and sometimes it gets cold quickly but we love this place. Been going there at least once or twice a year since 12 years. We stayed one day for our anniversary in their tall building and the view of the ocean was mesmerizing. Getting a balcony view for my husband bday this year.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great rating, MissValerieCA!  We are always working very hard to provide the best experiences for all of our guests. It's great to see that you enjoyed yourself! We hope you plan on visiting again soon, we'd love to have you back!  Have a lovely day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: Gorgeous ocean view , make sure get ocean front room , beautiful room and clean and right on the beach , room view is killer  Great location , center of Laguna Beach , a lots of restaurant and bar around the hotel  Really recommend this hotel , we loved it
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your time with us so much! We're delighted you appreciate our convenient location with its stunning views. We love sharing our breathtaking sights with our guests and your praise lets us know we're succeeding! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Have a lovely day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: We booked an oceanfront room, only to discover their event space (directly below our balcony) was hosting several parties. The front desk graciously offered us a much quieter, oceanfront room in the Reef building! So so nice! We are so appreciative and are now making the Pacific Edge our go-to stay in Laguna!
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing the excellent review with us!  We're so glad that you had an exceptional experience with us from beginning to end. It's wonderful to know that our staff treated you so well and made you feel welcome throughout the entirety of your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Have a lovely day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: When made reservations was offered an early check-in for 1pm, that didn't happen and figured since it didn't I would have been offered a voucher for The Deck but that didn't happen. Pool area very dirty, not picked up and Jacuzzi was dirty with lots of sand.  Website pictures (enhanced) makes everything look so much more nicer. basically paid for the view but that's what I wanted and the menu didn't list certain food I have experienced at The Deck.  Ice Machine was also broken and for what prices are just figured there could be a newer ice machine or one closer to the rooms. For a couple more hundred I rent a beach house.  I would consider coming back but for a fraction of the price or just stay at The Deck and eat dinner and enjoy the view of The Pacific. Sheets were very very
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback.  We're disappointed your time with us was less than ideal. We care deeply about the satisfaction of our guests so we regret that our features and amenities didn't meet your expectations. Thank you again for your feedback. I would like very much like the opportunity to speak with you further about your comments. I can be reached directly at josh.brown@pacificedgehotel.com.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at the pacific edge for the last ten years and have always enjoyed my time there the rooms are always very clean the beds are very comfortable,  thelocation is perfect you are on the beach, you can walk everywhere  The staff was wonderful Josh the GM went out of his way to solve a problem quickly which was greatly appreciated . I have in the past recommended the hotel to friends and family and will continue to do so in the future. Wafa wear
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your perfect rating with us, Wafawear!  It's wonderful to see how much you appreciated your time with us! We want everyone to feel right at home at Pacific Edge Hotel. Being able to create a feeling of home is exactly what we aim to do!  We look forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: We were over the ocean at high tide! King ocean front room. Was concerned about the reviews but I was pleasantly surprised. Our room I think was in a older building but very clean and the bed, sheets and pillows were so comfortable. We were in room 136 and it was really over the ocean. Room had a mini fridge, Keurig coffee maker (I would bring your own coffee &  cream though). Staff and valet were very nice and quick.
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent review, Kristy!  It's lovely you had such a pleasant experience with us! We strive to offer top-notch service and comfort for all of our guests. We're happy you appreciated our clean accommodations so much. Our team takes great care to properly refresh all rooms and your praise lets us know we're succeeding!  We look forward to hosting you again soon for another amazing experience! Have a fantastic day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: My husband and I booked at the Pacific Edge Hotel in Laguna for a mini kid-free getaway. We could not have asked for a better customer service experience! We had a slight Parking lot incident but the GM Josh dealt with everything so professionally and courteously. He went above an beyond what we expected and totally made our vacation. Every team member at his hotel was kind, competent and professional.   The ocean views, well kept beach and location can‚Äôt be beat.  We will 100% be coming back - maybe even with the kids next time!
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  It's outstanding your time with us was so amazing. We love sharing our excellent service with each person who walks through our door. It's team members like Josh who ensure our guests are getting the best level of service. That's what we like to see!  We can't wait until your next visit so we can once again share our high-caliber service with you. Have a beautiful day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: So, I read all the reviews about the hotel before I booked. The bad reviews about the rooms that had not been renovated. About the staff and so on. So, I took the bull by the horns and I asked for a renovated room. I had secured an Oceanfront King room. The lovely front desk person, Nanu, was very helpful when I checked in. I requested a room that had been renovated and she said No Problem. When I got to my room, 605, I was very pleased. The room was fresh and obviously had been completely redone. The front door had some gap issues but that never came into play. Right on the ocean as promised. I mean WOW. A fully stocked mini bar at reasonable prices. Yes, the bathroom was small. But much larger than most European baths I have had. Great wifi, great bed and linens. And the price
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review!  We are very pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable experience with us! We appreciate your praise for our team; they work very hard to ensure every guest feels right at home. We are delighted you felt welcomed and valued during your time with us!  We'd love to share another positive experience with you in the future! Have a beautiful day, and thanks again for sharing!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: LOVE this hotel !  My husband and I come to this hotel every year & we can‚Äôt wait to go back.  I also took my mom there for her birthday this year & she didn‚Äôt want to leave !  The hotel is so cozy and right on the sand.  The rooms are big, clean and nicely set-up.  Very comfortable.  And, of course the views are amazing & can‚Äôt be beat.  They have 2 restaurants:  The Deck and Driftwood Kitchen.  Both have great food and great service.  John at Driftwood and Chantal at the front desk sure made us feel welcome !  The boys who helped with the chairs and umbrellas at the beach were so attentive and nice.  I honestly can‚Äôt say enough about this hotel.  5 stars all the way !  Thank you for always making our visits there memorable ones.  We can‚Äôt wait to come back next year !
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your stay with us so much! We strive for excellence so we're thrilled you appreciated not only our comfortable rooms and stunning views, but also our top-notch service! Your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience! Have a fantastic day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for one night while traveling down the coast to San Diego. Great hotel right on the beach. Room was clean, beds comfy and location was close to all the shops and restaurants. Just a note-ocean view is not directly on the beach but does give you a view. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words, Travis!  It's excellent you enjoyed your time with us so much! We pride ourselves in offering a clean and comfortable environment for all of our guests and your praise tells us we're succeeding. Thank you again for sharing your review with us!  We can't wait to see you again soon for another amazing experience! Have a fantastic day!  Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: The door didn't unlock with our key card ever.  We had to get help to get in and sometimes it took a long time. We even had an engineer in the room at midnight trying to fix it.  Our room was unsecured because of this.  The air conditioner did not work and it was 90 degrees.  They refused to change our room.  They gave us ice and the ice bucket leaked all over our travel documents and tickets. We demand a refund.

We checked into the hotel and left our old, quiet dog in our room for an hour until we received a text message saying that the hotel had received complaints that our dog was barking. We went back to the hotel and our dog was not barking or disturbed and we were informed by the hotel that according to their policy, you have to keep your dog with you at all times and cannot leave it in the hotel room. We did not appreciate this. The hotel falsely advertises beachfront rooms and a communal deck on the beach. When we checked into our room, we found it to be nothing like the pictures online. It had no kitchen as we

We had an extension cord running across the room, the AC did not work and the front desk staff were unhelpful in resolving the issue - one even asked me what I was doing for the AC not to work.  Will never return to this old, poorly maintained and managed hotel.

Apparently, some have been renovated recently, and our family members who stayed in those rooms were very happy. Unfortunately, the building at the front of the property on Coast Highway with the one and two bedroom suites needs a lot of work, ranging from just annoying to perilous.  As examples, the closet doors have been removed from most rooms, but the master closet door in ours was still there, but broken, so that it could not be moved and half of the closet was hard to access. Also, two of the railing anchors on the 3rd floor balcony were rotted out, and I do want to mention that

Josh Brown Assistant General Manager

Summary: This hotel is so bad I had to post a review.  This property is in desperate need of a remodel or maybe tear down and start over. Rugs are worn and stained badly, pool area is sandy and disgustingly dirty. They charge a resort fee, but run out of towels frequently. Many buildings not connected so there are several flights of stairs up and down to get from 1 building to the lobby and elevator is slow. Paint is peeling and facility could use a fresh coat of paint and clean windows. Staff indifferent to clientele‚Äôs requests.  No chair or picture in room. Bed, pillows and beach are the only positives .  They leave the house cleaning cart in front of our sliding glass door that overlooks the pool. Has to be the worst hotel I‚Äôve ever been to in 70 years

The staff were very nice, but the 36 dollar a night valet car fee was excessive especially since i had to wait to get my car out when they couldn't find the person manning the booth for 25 minutes.

Summary Heading: Great location, right on the beach, with the Pacific Ocean.

Generally changing mid way when you least expect it.  Great place though - would def stay again.

Summary Heading: It‚Äôs amazing what a good photo can do

Dear traveler : sometimes you are paying for a view or for some specific feature in a hotel and this one is that one : THE VIEW !!! our room was almost in the ocean and we experience the most amazing sunset ever !! we went across the street and bought champagne and enjoyed the view.... If is true that the hotel should invest on remodeling the exteriors, our room was OK for one night : AC on full effect, TV perfect and wit channels, refrigerator and everything basic you need. Yes is a little bit expensive but is Laguna Beach so EVERY hotel is expensive. I had a great time for one night and both

No actual coffee maker or malita, on keurig one-cup machine so if yuu want to make your own coffee yuu can‚Äôt. (Travel with a malita?!)  Balcony overlooks a loud parking lot. Pool is in same parking lot, blocked from sun/southern exposure, it‚Äôs like swimmig in a basement.  There are no outlets near the main bed for phone, no clock radio by main bed etc. No shower cap.  For $300+ a night, I expected a nice place. A real sad sack spot for what was supposed to be a nice vacation for my kid and me.  Overpriced trashy motel basically.  Hope this helps.

After settling down we got a call from front desk at 11 pm. Front desk request to prepare check-out next morning at 11 am. Thus the next morning was not relaxing by the pool but re-packing our luggages. 2) Front desk advised that new room is available at normal check in time 4 pm. After request front desk said room may be available before 4 pm.  3) Our luggages were not transferred automatically from suite to new room. After a request they were transferred.  4) New room carpet was dirty, and matress was covered with big spots.  5)

Summary: Don't get ripped off by this hotels scam. We booked for 4 nights; breakfast and parking included. When we checked out they charged us for breakfast amounts over $ 30/day. Our contract and confirmation papers said nothing about the over $ 30 charge. They tried to condone on the basis that it was on "their" computer reservation system. In fact we even re-confirmed after making our reservations that breakfast and parking was included and they agreed but again said nothing about the over $ 30 charge. We will deny credit card invoicing until this matter is cleared up. BEWARE!

We had 4 rooms booked as a group (all standard rooms) and the official hotel photos looked NOTHING like the rooms we had. They were dark and smelt damp, 2 of the rooms were overlooking the highway and were super noisy. One of the rooms had an iron burn mark on the floor, the walls are paper thin and the air conditioning was so noisey I preferred to have it switched off (bear in mind it‚Äôs the middle of August).   The good points - the staff are genuinely lovely and super friendly. The bed was comfy. The deck area was fun for food and drinks.   Overall I really wouldn‚Äôt recommend unless you are starring in a short film about being in prison.

Josh you are a legend.  We were blown away by his attention to detail and kindness.  He took the time to walk us down to the THE DECK restaurant at the hotel and get us a table.  The food was exceptional and the vibe was perfect.  Then we made our way up to our ocean front room that Josh generously upgraded us to.  Again, my wife and I were blown away by the service, food, and views.  Highly recommend this hotel.  We will be back...nothing but great vibes here!!!!!  See you next summer

We enjoyed the views and lovely sunsets and even talked my sister and brother in law into staying a night at the resort.They didn't choose an ocean view but we shared ours with them.  The service was excellent from the front desk to the "beach boys" and I'm sure you ordered they great weather too! We think this may be a yearly event going forward. No TSA, no 3-5 hour flight, great location, nice room,.. why would we go anywhere else? So see you next year Josh. We look forward to your great smile in July 2020.

Summary: Amazing view so close to the ocean you can't hardly see the wave action without stepping out on your deck. You feel like you're in the ocean as you walk in. Old motel room style. I felt like I was sleeping in a paper envelope! Bed was basic and not comfortable, hard and springy. It also moves alot when your partner rolls over.  Needs a comfortable chair in room, not just a desk chair. Carpet was creasing and a bit gross. They didn't refresh our soup and had to ask on our 3rd night. Valet parking only. Nice restaurants on site. We choose a special with breakfast included,$30 credit. Most dishes are over $15 each and we

We checked in on Friday, while we waited for our room to be ready, we had lunch at the DECK, right on the ocean. After we finished, our room was ready and the valet was so helpful, took us straight to our room, right on the ocean. with waves crashing right outside our balcony. Everything is right there, no need to drive anywhere, restaurants ,beach , shopping, anything you need. All 4 burners were popped up and 1 was not connected.  The exterior portion of the AC unit was rusted to the point that a section was exposed that should be enclosed in the metal case. Furniture is dirty, bathroom is moldy and gross. If I owned this hotel I would take the money from the rent and put in new carpet or floors. Retile the bathrooms and get ride of the mold. Put in new tubs. Retile kitchen. Invest in furniture that is easy to clean.   Make sure staff cleans rooms well.  We checked in and there was a wad of someone else‚Äôs hair in the shower.  Deck was dirty and gross. Air conditioner was on its last leg and needed to be replaced. I had to go to the front desk several times for toilet paper because a new roll wasn‚Äôt left for us. We are looking forward to our next visit!

Summary: My wife and I recently went to the Pacific Edge Hotel to spend two evenings.   The resort is located conveniently close to the main downtown area and everything is within a short walk. The resort is located on the beach side of PCH. A great location!  Staff at the property could not have been nicer in helping us get checked in, get settled and answering all of our questions as pleasantly as one could ever expect.  Unfortunately, in between our two night stay we had an unfortunate event and needed to leave early the next morning. When we explained our situation to the staff and requested a refund for the second night's stay, they could not have been more accommodating and especially the hotel manager, Josh Brown who went out of his way to help in every way possible. We purchased

Summary: Pacific Edge Hotel is our ‚Äúgo to‚Äù hotel in Laguna Beach. Nestled right on the beach and perfectly located to walk anywhere in Laguna. We highly recommend Pacific Edge Hotel as we feel like we have found our little piece of heaven on earth!

Summary Heading: Beyond Amazing Stay at the Pacific Edge
Summary: This hotel was amazing, beyond my expectations.  It is right on the beach, and also in the middle of town, so easy walking distance to shops and restaurants.  The staff is very friendly and helpful and they have a fun, detailed, specific map of restaurants and bars that help you figure out where to go.  We got an amazing and generous upgrade-we were so so grateful, and had an amazing oceanfront room.  I highly recommend these rooms.  They are right on the water, and when the tide comes in it looks like you're surrounded by water.  Then it is so easy just to walk down onto the beach.  The oceanfront room also had a lovely balcony.  I was in heaven and so so so happy.  It isn't a traditional hotel where everything is in one building.  From the check-in/lobby you have to walk to

Summary: I paid just over $460 a night for five nights at the hotel. It included valet and a $30 credit for breakfast every day, which wasn‚Äôt enough money for the two of us. With that said, I expected more luxury in the accommodations, but you will not find it here. I am attaching a picture of the hotel layout. We stayed in the Reef building and had a balcony facing the ocean. There are exterior doors. We even saw dolphins one morning. The hotel is on Main Beach and is walking distance to the downtown area with various shops, galleries and restaurants. There is a grocery store (Ralph‚Äôs) right across the street from the end of the hotel. Pros -great location to the beach and downtown  -friendly staff, others on TripAdvisor complained about valet, but they were excellent -bed and pillows

Summary: We had been promised in writing an accessible room with a bath tub: neither materialised. What we did get was a really tiny room off an exterior walkway facing the main road. This meant that the traffic noise was terrible and that we had to have our curtains closed permanently so that people could not look into our room. There was no space or surfaces  for anything and an extension lead under the bed was the only recharging facility. We have spent the last 5 weeks on a road trip from Seattle to San Diego, staying somewhere different each night. Nowhere has been as cynically overpriced as this. I feel exploited and would urge Trip Advisor users to think very carefully before booking. What you see is not what you get.

Summary: I cannot believe this hotel gets the ratings it does.   It isnt really even a hotel. It has 5 star hotel prices, but at best 2 star quality.   The one positive...  location.   Laguna Beach property isnt cheap, and this one is right near waters edge.  Easy access to the beautiful beach.     Beyond prime location and beach access, this felt like a typical beach side motel.    Horribly tight parking lot when you check in.  Accident waiting to happen.    Price does not include $34 valet fee and additional facility fee.    The property is very old, with rust and deterioration noted on support structures, stairs, and all around.   Property is comprised of several buildings,  some facing city street, others down the hill closer to the water.   Our so called, newer,  renovated room was

The Valet team is also wonderful, willing to help with luggage etc even though they are busy parking cars for 2 restaurants .   The view is a 10 however, if you sit on the balcony there is noise from the a/c window units.  Its so loud you cannot have a conversation and heat is generated from the units - not pleasant.  Central air conditioning would be nice. The rooms are in need of refurbishing - carpet ,drapes, bathroom, lighting, and furniture in my opinion all need WORK.  I doubt I would ever stay there again however, as I stated, the

This hotel has a few buildings separated by a road, some are on the ocean side and some are on Pacific Coast Highway.  Although it appears to  be a boutique hotel, its more like an updated motel.  My only neg is after charging $35. for daily parking, (which I understand because parking is limited in town) they have no self-parking.  You have to call for the vallet (and tip them) everytime you need your car.

Still, we return for its excellent beachfront rooms and super-excellent housekeeping staff. We always booked in the Reef part of the hotel, where the surf practically comes in under your balcony! Nothing like the real McCoy of ocean sounds to lull one to sleep.

Expensive though, but you pay for location;-)   On arrival we went straight to the beach and got some surfboards and hit the waves. A definate highlight on the road-trip. Summary: We sent our parents there for a much needed belated anniversary getway.our dad has had health issues and our mom had had a really rough 4 years,many surgeries one which left her on life support from sepsis and 2 bouts with breast cancer. She just finished Chemo so we sent them to your hotel for some much needed relaxation.. from the reservation process on you guys have been amazing.. they were able to check in early and received an upgraded room with an ocean view and balcony.. My mom loves the Ocean and hasnt been able to go in years..having the balcony room was very relaxing to them.. The staff was all so helpful and beyond kind.. Jocelyn was great and my mom said that a staff member even went and got her ice and brought it back to them.. This is the best hospitality EVER
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing the excellent review with us, David!  We're so glad that your parents had such an exceptional experience with us from beginning to end. It's wonderful to know that our staff treated them so well and made them feel welcome throughout the entirety of your time with us. We aim to please and your appreciation lets us know we're doing our job! We're thrilled they had a lovely, relaxing visit.  Have a fantastic day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: We had a pretty rough start. We got in at 2 AM after a long day of traveling. The room we initially were assigned to was a disaster and after several mishaps we decided to cancel our reservation for the remainder of the week and find another hotel the next morning. Victor and staff seemed genuinely concerned when we asked to check out. They went above and beyond to correct the situation when we showed them the issues we encountered. They upgraded us to one of their beachfront rooms and made sure we were comfortable. They also sent up several bottles of champagne and decorated my room for my birthday.  The view was amazing and exactly what we were looking for.  Joshua was also amazing in helping us find restaurants and activities around town. I will definitely have this location
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review!  We are very pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable experience with us! We appreciate your praise for our team; they work very hard to ensure every guest feels right at home. We are delighted you felt welcomed and valued during your time with us!  We'd love to share another positive experience with you in the future! Have a beautiful day, and thanks again for sharing!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: After a long day of traveling we were ready to settle down. We had gotten to Pacific Edge early and were worried we couldn‚Äôt check in early. Not only did they let us check in early, we also got a free room upgrade. They really went above and beyond! We will definitely come back, if you even can get us to leave.
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review, Hollie!  It's excellent your time with us was so fantastic! We take great care in providing top-notch service for all of our guests. Your praise for our team lets us know we're doing our job! We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another splendid experience with you!  Have a fantastic day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: The hotel is definitely not new but has a great location. The rooms are clean and spread amongst multiple buildings just make sure whether you are water front or view. All rooms have easy access to the beach.
Manager Response: Thanks for the fantastic review, zapprint!  We're happy you enjoyed your time with us so much at The Pacific Edge Hotel! We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so it's excellent you appreciated our prime location. We love seeing our guests take advantage of our proximity to so many wonderful attractions.  We look forward to hosting you again soon! Have an amazing day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: The staff here is fantastic. Everyone from the front desk to the maintenance man greets you and are very professional. We ended up with a nice room with a partial ocean view, which means there is one building between you and the ocean. The view was fine for me. The other building is their ocean front rooms. We had a suite with 2 beds, kitchen and large patio. Our room had new floors and nice beds. The kitchen needs some renovation to update and add a microwave to the existing stove, full size fridge, sink and coffee station. The bath was tight, but was told from other family members that their baths were tighter than ours. Several of their rooms are under renovation now. The only complaint is that you have to use valet for your car, which is $34 a day. All in all, enjoyable
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us, Charles.  We're glad to hear you had such a great experience with us. We care about the satisfaction of our guests so we appreciate you letting us know what we can do to make your stay perfect in regards to parking. We'll make sure to communicate your feedback to our team.  We're looking forward to sharing an even more pleasant experience with you soon. Thank you again and have a wonderful day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: My favorite place to stay in Laguna Beach, California is the Pacific Edge Hotel, a landmark in this artists‚Äô influenced coastal community. I love this unpretentious hotel as it is just that, relaxed and kickback, holding memories from the past and waiting for more to be made. The lodging offers multiple types of rooms, oceanfront, apartments with full kitchens, and two bedrooms, and the less costly village rooms. Two blocks from the center of town, most needs are within walking distance. This hotel employs a helpful, friendly staff, ready to assist their guests with all of their needs. One of those staff members being, Joshua H. Whenever I call, and for whatever reason, Joshua has the answer and ready to accommodate my request from how to get the cork out of the expensive wine I
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for sharing this fantastic review! We're thrilled your time with us was so outstanding! We endeavor to share a memorable experience with our guests. After all, your happiness is our top priority! We always strive to go above and beyond for our guests. We appreciate all of your praise for our amenities and service. Your kind words let us know we're doing our job!  We're already looking forward to your next visit so we can share another amazing experience with you soon! Have a beautiful day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: This place was great! The rooms were clean with amazing views! Only negative was paying for parking:( We will be back with our kids for the full beach experience! We have stayed in many hotels in Laguna and this is definitely in the top 2, best location!
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent review, Jessica!  It's lovely you had such a pleasant experience with us! We strive to offer top-notch service and comfort for all of our guests. We're happy you appreciated our clean accommodations so much. Our team takes great care to properly refresh all rooms and your praise lets us know we're succeeding!  We look forward to hosting you again soon for another amazing experience! Have a fantastic day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Beautiful ocean view. Located in heart of galleries, shops, restaurants. Walk out to the beaches. So glad I chose this hotel.Let the sound of the waves be your lullaby. Each ocean view room has a deck to sit, relax, and enjoy the sights and sounds.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for the amazing review! It's wonderful you enjoyed your time with us so much! We're delighted you appreciate our convenient location with its stunning views. We love sharing our breathtaking sights with our guests and your praise lets us know we're succeeding! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Have a lovely day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: I booked this local place based on photos and reviews. I used time share points and fee to pay.  I expected a nice cute room (similar to what is advertised on web site) close to the beach.  The location was fantastic however the room was very small and bare bones!  No art, no cute paint job and no chair to sit comfortably in.  A bed and small bathroom only. I felt like I was given the last possible room however I was given the opportunity to upgrade for $125 a night!  Do NOT use time share points to book at this hotel. You will waste your money and points.  Staff was very nice when I informed them of my disappointment however that was as I checked out.   Great location!  Just be careful when booking!
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, Carl.  It's unfortunate your time with us was less than ideal. We regret that our rooms didn't meet your expectations. We do offer a variety of room sizes/types and would be happy to help you choose one which better suits your needs next time. I would like to fix the issue you experienced with the pictures not matching the room type you booked, please contact me directly at vgonzalez@pacificedgehotel.com if you would please let me know the last name on the reservation and how you booked.  We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Fall asleep to the sound of the Pacific Ocean
Summary: This property was formerly known as Vacation Village, and has a variety of accommodation types to suite your needs. The location is stellar, right on the beach and ocean within easy walking distance to Laguna Village and all its amenities. The staff is extremely helpful, the valets wonderful. The property is older, and has not been updated in a while. This results in rates which are quite reasonable given the superiority of the location. It is my understanding that a complete remodel is scheduled for late 2019, after which the rates are sure to become more pricey.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for the 4-star rating and review! We're thrilled you had such a pleasant time with us! We strive to offer top-notch service and convenience for our guests. It's fantastic you enjoyed our efficient service and accommodations so much. That's what we like to see!  We look forward to sharing an even better experience with you next time. Have a lovely day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Great location to main beach, restaurants, and shopping. The staff is very friendly. Linnea was especially helpful and professional. She went above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay. Thank you Linnea!
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review, Rachel!  It's excellent you had such a fantastic experience with us! We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests and your praise for our team lets us know we're doing our job. Linnea is a valued member of our team so it's no surprise she took such great care of you. That's what we like to see!  We look forward to sharing another splendid experience with you soon! Have a lovely day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Overall, I enjoyed my stay--the location is exceptional, can't be beat: located right on the beach; easy access to beach from hotel with swimmable beach/moderate surf most days, gorgeous views of beach and, looking north you view the Main Beach coastline; Main Beach downtown area is only a few blocks/a modest walk away). The hotel staff is also exceptional: from hotel desk (especially kudos to Jocelyn for genuine courtesy and patient effort in arranging a room that was best for my physical limitations) to room service delivery staff, everyone was cheerful, knowledgeable, helpful, and seemed genuinely invested in insuring that I was enjoying my stay at Pacific Edge. The bathroom was clean in all ways that mattered (toilet, sink, shower were all sparkling) but the floor had
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to leave this 4/5 review!  We are glad you had a great experience with us at our convenient location to the beach! However, we are disappointed to see some of your concerns, and we will let our team know about them. We always work very hard to make sure all of our guests have a pleasant stay. We look forward to hosting you again for an even better experience.  Thanks again, and have a lovely day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Fun and comfortable place to stay
Summary: Pacific Edge is charming as soon as you approach it, probably because of all the nautical decor out-front and in the lobby. The staff are very friendly and useful, especially the front desk. Location is great! Close to everything and right on the beach.   The rooms are quite nice, simple but well decorated with a kitchenette. There is a pool but in an odd location so we didn't end up using it, though it did seem like a good party place to be. The beach is accessible directly from the property which is nice.  The Deck patio bar and gets pretty busy with visitors and locals alike, admittedly it does have a pretty fun vibe to it and a great view. Driftwood Kitchen restaurant has an amazing deck with great brunch and a fun bar on the ground floor, which also gets pretty busy at
Manager Response: Thanks for the excellent review, Kateryna!  We're delighted your time with us was so outstanding as providing our guests with an excellent experience is very important to us. It's fantastic you appreciated our friendly service and prime location as well as our comfortable rooms. That's what we like to see! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another fantastic experience.  Have an amazing day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: AWESOME PACIFIC EDGE LUGANO BEACH, CALIFORNIA
Summary: I stayed with PACIFIC EDGE FOR 2 NIGHTS DECEMBER 20 & 21 I had a 3 floor looking at the Pacific Ocean and an easy walk to the beach.  A king bed, I had my breakfast delivered to my room from a nearby walk from the hotel ... The menu is terrific.  You can be on the outside deck on a great day which I got one that was terrific  The front deck as PACIFIC EDGE are very well trained and are quick with ideas to make you day better ... They even help with the parking meters issue in Laguna Beach .. they help with exchanging dollar bills for quarters to put in the meter that shows how much time is left to move your car  Internet is free  It was easy to print your forward airline passes whether for the next day or other flights  I myself have been on a trip starting in Christchurch NZ,
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding review, Thomas!  We're delighted your experience with us was so wonderful! We strive to make all of our guests feel welcome and relaxed during their time with us. It's fantastic our team could accommodate your needs and assist you in any way possible. We aim to please and your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We look forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon! Have a lovely day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Part of the hotel is on directly on the beach, virtually on the edge of the Pacific, with a stunning view on big waves and the the laguna and a nice view on the town light at night. Very nice service and a very nice room - perfect for a romantic trip to the seaside. Loved it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the excellent rating! It's fantastic to hear you enjoyed your stay with us so much! We're delighted we could accommodate you during your stay and that we left you with a wonderful impression. Your praise for our rooms and service is much appreciated! Thank you for taking the time to share.  We look forward to hosting you again soon! Have a great day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: We stayed in the Reef building, rm 127. Great beds, crisp clean linens, the softest bath towels I have EVER had and long enough they can actually be wrapped around you! Mini fridge and coffee maker, large tv..but surely that‚Äôs not why you‚Äôre here! The attention grabber of this building is the beach and you have a direct view of it from any angle in this room...well, except the bathroom! It‚Äôs incredible! Two floors above the ocean with a balcony that allows you views of the whole beach. Surfers to your left and wider beach areas to your right. The sunset directly in front of us and beach access was a mere 4 doors away (length of this building). Once you‚Äôre on the beach, you will see this is an older building in comparison to the ones around it but my personal opinion is that if
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review, Suzanne!  It's outstanding your time with us was so amazing and that your appreciated our comfortable bedding. We love sharing our excellent service with each person who walks through our door. It's team members like Jay who ensure our guests are getting the best level of service. That's what we like to see!  We can't wait until your next visit so we can once again share our high-caliber service with you. Have a beautiful day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Groupon offer description and photos did not match property
Summary: I booked by stay at Pacific Edge Hotel for business. I needed to be close to central Laguna Beach. The location of the hotel is great. The staff are very friendly and welcoming. I was very disappointed that the groupon description and photographs did not match the quality of what I expected. The room was more of a motel, the kitchenette is a small refrigerator and the main street traffic is very loud and disruptive during the night. The hotel nickel and dimes for everything. Be prepared to pay for parking, internet etc.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Samantha.  We are currently reaching out to GroupOn to make sure they have the most up to date photos and room descriptions. We're disappointed that the room did not meet your expectations  from your description you may have been looking at the description for our Village deluxe room with one queen bed, but booked a village room with two double beds. We have just undergone a refresh renovation in the room you stayed in with new carpet and furniture. We care about the satisfaction of our guests so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We hope for the opportunity to host you again soon for a more positive experience.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: If you want to stay on the sand you can't do any better...
Summary: This is the perfect spot if you want to stay as close to the sand as possible. If you pick the beach building to the left you will be right on top of the sand. The rooms aren't quite as swanky, but you are a hallway and a staircase away from being on the sand. The other building has nicer rooms, but you are not as close as you can be, but this place has it all. There is a beautiful restaurant bar on site that has great food, you never really need to go anywhere. I used it to do Model Photography and just love this spot. It is Centrally located, so if you want to walk to the Downtown Are you can in 5 minutes.  And if you're from out of town, trust me as a So Cal native, Laguna is one of if not the best beach in all of California.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing you review! We're thrilled you enjoyed the fantastic views from our prime location. We agree that we have the best placement in the city and we love sharing it with our treasured guests. We can't wait to see you again soon for another amazing experience!  Have a fantastic day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Awesome views and balcony give some privacy except you can look right into rooms next to you,but the service was very good.the restaraunt was mediocre. Rooms were very outdated but comfy beds and linens.
Manager Response: Thanks for the lovely review, Cah!  We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We're happy that you loved our beautiful location and comfortable bedding. However, we are disappointed to see some of your concerns, and we will let our team know about them. We strive for excellence so we look forward ot sharing an even better experience with you next time.  Have a great day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Excellent staff and a great location in the off season. Would be just as good in the main season. It‚Äôs very handy for business travel. There‚Äôs also a Ralph‚Äôs across the road for any incidentals needed. Beach access is right behind the hotel. It‚Äôs a short walk to the main stores.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review, Paul!  We're delighted your time with us was so wonderful! It's fantastic you took advantage of our convenient location in the heart of the city. We endeavor to offer a memorable experience for all of our guests. We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Have a splendid day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Being lover's of water, my wife and I chose Pacific Edge for the stay of our wedding night so we could sleep close to the ocean.  As we entered into our ocean view room in Reef, we knew we chose the right place.  Being on the bottom floor, we were as close to the water as possible, and the late evening ascending high tide was already sending the waves into the wall beneath our balcony.  We chose to sleep with our door open all night so we could hear the water all night.  From the friendly young woman at check in, to a kind goodbye from a housekeeper, to the kind gentleman at check out,  our interactions with staff were nothing short of personable and warm.  We even asked if we could linger just a little longer by the pool, just to soak in our visit a little longer.  We are
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review, AJ!  We're delighted you had such a memorable and wonderful wedding night at our hotel! We're thrilled you enjoyed our beautiful location and friendly service so much. We strive for excellence and your praise for our hotel lets us know we're doing our job! We can't wait to see you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you!  Have a beautiful day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: We have loved the Pacific Edge for years because we can be right on the beach and ocean and bring our dogs. Sadly they have gotten overpriced about $75 a night, in my opinion, for this experience. Especially for repeat customers. Considering the hotel is a little aged with a rug that needed replacement and lack of well cared for amenities. Costly car parking. We will look for other accommodation rations in the future
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, Ira.  It's unfortunate your stay in our hotel didn't exceed your expectations. We regret you weren't entirely satisfied with our furnishings and accommodations. We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address all of your concerns with the appropriate members of our team so we may improve moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Staying for a company Christmas party
Summary: Great hotel. The staff was absolutely amazing. The restaurant was great and there are so many other restaurants and local shops to enjoy all within in a short walking distance. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the fantastic review with us, Brian!  We're happy to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us. It's wonderful to know that you appreciated our service as well as our hotel restaurant. We strive to create a memorable experience for each of our guests and we're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us.  We look forward to hosting you again the next time you're in town. Thanks again for providing us with your feedback. Have a great day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: One night on the Pacific Coast
Summary: We were in California for a week, and wanted to see the Pacific Ocean. So we booked our last night in Laguna Beach.   We arrived early at the Pacific Edge Hotel and they were more than happy to let us get into our room since it was available.  The front desk staff was very pleasant, the valets were very accommodating, and the room had a beachy feel, it was clean and our balcony was literally right on the Pacific Ocean.  The property was clean.  We enjoyed our stay.  We were in walking distance to restaurants and shops.
Manager Response: Thanks for the fantastic review, Sandra!  We're delighted you had such an amazing experience with us! It's excellent our clean accommodations and friendly service could exceed your expectations. That's what we like to see! We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Have a wonderful day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: I have been coming to Laguna Beach my whole life (46 yrs) for vacations. We always stayed at The Pacific Edge, used to be called Vacation Village.  It feels like a second home to me.  Yes, it is a bit dated, and not perfect.  But it's on the beach and walking distance to shops and restaurants. You can't beat the price either. The staff is friendly and helpful.  We have made great memories in Laguna Beach and The Pacific Edge has helped make that happen.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic rating!  We're delighted to hear you enjoyed yet another stay with us! We pride ourselves on providing exceptional service to our guests at all times so it's very pleasing to hear that we were able to accommodate you during your stay. We look forward to hosting you again in the future!  Thank you again for taking the time to share your review. Have a wonderful day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: I want to complement the whole team that assisted us with our stay. We requested a microwave oven and the front office team went above and above beyond. I want to applaud Jocelyn for helping us to find a place to heat up our thanksgiving dinner. Other amazing employees who assisted us include.   Linnea, Josh and Chantal. The whole team was the best that could ever be.   Maria Dempsey
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent rating, MariaMeehanDempsey!  We're so glad that you've enjoyed your stay with us so much.
