Summary: We were placed on the waterfront in unit 121, which smelled like a cave, very musty which was intolerable, and a bit scary when thinking of the possibility of mold. They did not have another room with ocean view, but could not refund our money since we reserved online with Hotels One, which of course does not answer their phone (one hour on hold, and we gave up) and sent them an email to refund our monies. Hotels One did answer the email of which they said the hotel offered us another room, which they did not as they said they have none. Essentially a nightmare. My suggestion is do not make reservations other direct to the hotel, and yu would need to see your room before committing. T
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, mammothrox.  We strive to offer quality service and convenience for our guests. We're disheartened our rooms didn't meet your expectations. We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so we'll be sure to discuss your review and concerns moving forward. We had hoped you would have given us the opportunity to make it right but you would not allow us to go to your guest room then immediately checked out. The room you checked into was inspected after you departed by our rooms specialist and was cleared of any concerns you brought to our attention.  We do hope you allow us to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Awesome location on beautiful beach  Rented out the suite and was top tier Elevator from room to restaurant and bar areas below for food and drink deliveries exclusively to this one of a kind suite Place ruled
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us, Art!  It's fantastic to see how much you enjoyed your recent stay! We strive to provide our guests with a very comfortable and modern environment. We look forward to hosting you again in the near future for another outstanding experience.  Thank you again for taking the time to share your feedback, and we hope you have a fantastic day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Staying in king ocean front view.  I've stayed in hotels around the world.  I have never been so close to the power of the ocean.  I love the noise of the crashing waves.  A couple of stairs from Laguna Beach.  Super close walking distance from all of the great shops and restaurants of Laguna.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review, Mark!  We're delighted your time in our hotel was so fantastic! We care deeply about the happiness of our guests so it's amazing we could share our beautiful views with you. We aim to please and your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We look forward to seeing you again soon for another stellar experience! Have a lovely day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Absolutely charming. Location was excellent, only a short walk to many shops and restaurants. Loved The Deck, restaraunt, excellent breakfast and view of the ocean. Beautiful beaches and wonderful night life.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you review, Heather.  We're thrilled you enjoyed the stellar views from our prime location. We agree that we have the best placement in the city and we love sharing it with our treasured guests. We can't wait to see you again soon for another amazing experience!  Have a fantastic day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: We were attending a wedding for friend and had a choice of staying in the hotel she had a block for (cheaper than pacific edge) or finding my own room. Pacific edge was close to the venue and seemed like a better option than the hotel block location. Since we had to stay two days (hotel wouldn‚Äôt guarantee an early check in and we had to be at the venue by 4) we were forced to book two nights. I figured I would spend a little more, get a partial ocean view and enjoy Laguna for the weekend. The total of the room for 2 nights, with taxes, parking (seriously $35/night?!) was $800!!! Now $800 for a weekend at a nice hotel would be worth it. But let‚Äôs be honest. It‚Äôs a motel. Off the highway. Sure they dolled up the lobby so it looks nice, but then you got to your room. Ours was above
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback.  We're disappointed that your stay with us was anything less than ideal and that your room wasn't properly refreshed before your arrival. It's also unfortunate you've noticed a decline in the quality and condition of our accommodations. We care about the comfort and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address your concerns with the appropriate members of our team so we may improve moving forward. We hope for the opportunity to host you again soon for a more positive experience.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: I give this hotel a 2-star rating for location only. Nice waking distance to shops and dining and decent view from room (beachfront King) However, the room itself was less than a motel setting. It smelled of dollar store carpet freshener, so much so that we could taste it for two days. The walls were dirty, and half painted, and the bathroom is horribly tiny. The bed is so uncomfortable, we woke up with kinks in our neck and a sore back. There is no where to get ice because there is not an ice machine around. Also, there is clearly marked assigned parking spots, but you are mandated to use ‚Äúvalet parking‚Äù at $35.00 a day. With all this, you are charged a ‚Äúresort fee‚Äù or as the receipt says a ‚Äúfacilities fee‚Äù of $15.00 a day. This is for the umbrellas, chairs, and towels on the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate you sharing your feedback. We are disappointed to hear that your stay with us did not meet your expectations. We strive to provide every guest with excellent experience and we regret that your stay with us did not reflect this. Please know that your concerns have been passed on to our management team so they can be properly addressed.  We hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again soon so we can show you the quality experience we know that we are capable of sharing with our guests.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: -We stayed at the reef tower, ocean front in a 2 queen bedroom. We got there and our room was so hot and smell funky. The A.C wasn't turned on knowing they have an arriving guest. The room didnt even look like a 3 star hotel.  -They don't have microwave, mini bar, nor a complimentary water bottle in the room. -No complimentary breakfast. -They have a heated pool and non heated but both were small.  -The guy who supposed to provide towels, chairs,and umbrella at the beach was not helpful at all. We asked for towels and the guy said they run out so WE HAVE TO GO TO THE VALET AREA AND ASK IF THEY HAVE TOWELS THERE. I didnt pay to use your amenities and be on vacation just to do your job. -Valet parking spaces were really tight.  -No life guard at the beach.  -Better to eat at the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your feedback. We're very disappointed to hear you're dissatisfied with your stay. Providing our guests with a great experience is very important to us. We truly value your feedback and we'll address all of your concerns with the appropriate members of our team so we may improve for the future.  We hope you'll give us another opportunity to provide you with the quality experience‚Äã we pride ourselves in providing. Thank you again for taking the time to share your feedback.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: We chose the Pacific Edge Hotel for several reasons. We wanted to stay on the beach in a room with a balcony, overlooking the ocean, with good coffee within walking distance. We have an infant that we knew would be going to bed at 8:00 and we wanted a nice hotel to spend a lot of time in. Pacific Edge hit all of our boxes. Before we came we called to see if there happened to be microwaves and cribs or Pack-N-Play type things available.The staff was very kind and said yes and put a note on our reservation. When we arrived at the hotel both a microwave and crib were delivered to our room. We had an excellent stay and very pleasant interactions with all the staff. It is valet parking only but we had access to our car quickly anytime we wanted.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review, Mori!  We are very pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable experience with us! We appreciate your praise for our team; they work very hard to ensure every guest feels right at home. We are delighted you felt welcomed and valued during your time with us!  We'd love to share another positive experience with you in the future! Have a beautiful day, and thanks again for sharing!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: While taking a trip from San Diego to Santa Monica we (wife) decided to stop for a night in Laguna Beach.  The (2) considerations we had were: on the water and not overly expensive... this place fit the bill.  While we were disappointed that it took so long to get into our room, the staff worked with us to maximize our beach time. It was conveniently located near restaurants and groceries so location was perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4/5 rating!  We're happy you had a pleasant stay with us and appreciated our convenient location. It's unfortunate you had such challenges with our check in services. We're disappointed we couldn't accommodate your needs and fix the problem. We hold ourselves to a higher standard. We'll address your concern with our team moving forward.  We strive for excellence so we look forward to sharing an even better experience with you soon! Have a lovely day.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Stayed 3 days there with my wife. We took second time this hotel and this time our room was water front on the first floor. It was really awesome, ocean‚Äôs waves rich our balcony line and at the evening after low tide we could see the beach with a rocks. At night waves sound  were little bit intense , but we were really tired and didn‚Äôt prevent to fall asleep. Location of hotel is great, few minutes walk to the center, a lot of restaurants around and good to walk on the beach in both directions. Hotel have their own beach with low chairs and umbrellas, that really convenient if you come for few days and don‚Äôt want to buy all this stuff.  Was no breakfast option include, but it is fine , me and my wife have favorite places in the town for a breakfasts. Only one issue was ignored
Manager Response: Thank you for the great rating, Alexey!  We are always working very hard to provide a high-quality experience for all of our guests. It's great to hear that you had a lovely stay with us! We hope you plan on staying with us again soon! We'd love to share an even better experience with you.  Thanks again and have a great day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: This was a nice hotel but there were just a lot of aspects of it that bothered me. It started out we tried to check in early, about 10:00am, and we were told check in is 4:00pm but when they have something available they will text us. Let me start by saying this was off season and checking in on a Monday when it was slow. We have never had a problem checking into a hotel in Laguna Beach very early if the rooms were available.  It was about 1:00pm that we finally got our room.   The hotel has a strange layout, four different buildings and our building we no where near the ocean, the nearest pool to our room was unheated. They did have a pool and hot tub far from our room that we could use that was heated. Also they have a beautiful deck with many outdoor sofas that overlooks the
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.  It's unfortunate your time with us was anything less than ideal and that you faced such difficulties with our beds. We also regret your challenges with our early check-in process and that we couldn't exceed your expectations. We strive to provide all of our guests with the highest caliber service so we've forwarded your concerns to the appropriate members of our team. Your feedback regarding our check-in system is also much appreciated.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: This hotel is very old and definitely nothing to write home about.  We rented a suite that slept 6, but it only had one bathroom.  The kitchen was lacking in basic supplies. They knew we were a party of 6 but there were only enough towels for 3 people so we had to have them bring more. They charged outrageous prices while providing substandard service. I would never stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Teresa.  We're disappointed to hear that you were not completely satisfied with your experience with us. We are dedicated to providing our guests with quality service and convenience. It's unfortunate to know that you felt we could have done a better job, but we're confident that we can provide you with a more positive experience in the future.  We'd love to host you again and give you the wonderful experience we have become known for here.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Great linen in a subpar room
Summary: Stayed in the Pacific Edge for two nights based on its proximity to friends who were staying nearby in a villa right on the beach.  Starting with the positive points - the Pacific Edge is in a great location - front desk staff was very nice - check in/ out easy. The accommodation itself was a mixed bag - great bed and bath linen. Towels some of the best I've seen in a hotel or home. The bed comfortable.  However - ALL electric outlets for charging of 'phone/tablet or even use of iron are behind tables and require moving furniture.  Lighting was poor for reading unless drapes are open but that allows passersby an open view of room.  Also, in the closet there was an additional door to the outside that caused much security concern. Much conversation and noise coming from the other
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, Gail.  While we're happy you appreciated our convenient location, it's unfortunate our room's layout and amenities didn't meet your expectations. We regret your challenges and inconvenience so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: We have been here several times and enjoyed it every time. We always get a ocean front room and the view is  spectacular. The food is great, the bartenders are the best. Having a great time, we will be back
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, Ron!  We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Pacific Edge Hotel. It's wonderful to know that our ocean front views and delicious cuisine left a lasting impression. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We look forward to hosting you again the next time you're in town!  Have a wonderful day.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: We booked an ocean front room.  Based on other local hotel listings, it appeared that the view was costing at least $100 extra per night.  The only thing special about the room was the view.  Everything else was cheap and/or shabby.  I would not book with them again.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Bill.  It's unfortunate your stay in our hotel didn't exceed your expectations. We regret you weren't entirely satisfied with our furnishings and accommodations. We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address all of your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: We had a great stay at this property.  Location was great, right on the beach and convenient for exploring the town. The room was basic, but very clean and had everything we needed. The staff were very friendly. No complaints! Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review, Katlyn!  It's very pleasing to hear our staff took great care of you at our prime location. We appreciate your compliments regarding our hardworking team. We pride ourselves on providing excellent service to our guests and we strive to go above and beyond expectations. We look forward to hosting you again in the future!  Thank you again for sharing your review. Have a wonderful day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Hotel was OK. But beware of who you book through
Summary: I called the number that the hotel site has for booking. I asked them if they were the hotel that I was directly dealing with. They said they were the booking site for the hotel.  So I told the man that I specifically wanted a Waterfront room with a balcony.  He told me my room was a village room. I asked him if it was waterfront with a balcony and he said it was. So I agreed since I was not familiar with this hotel and thought he was being honest. I also asked for breakfast to be added to the room and was told this was done.  When I got to the hotel They did not have me on the water and the room has 1 bed against the wall and no breakfast.  Needless to say I was not at all happy.  Please never book through "ReservationsCounter.com" They do nothing but charge you for booking
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Theresa.  Thank you for the honest review so that we can make improvements with our booking services. It's unfortunate your time with us was anything less than ideal due to the poor first impression. Also, it is very concerning that the third‚Äìparty vendor reservation agent you spoke with was not trained properly in our hotels rooms and amenities. We strive to offer quality service and guidance for all of our guests, so it's relieving that our front desk team was able to rectify the reservation error by getting you the room you had originally anticipated. Thank you for bringing both the mistake and the resolution to our attention. We will be sure to discuss how to move forward in a positive light.  We do hope to see you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Visited here with my boyfriend a few days ago for our 4 year anniversary, and we were not disappointed at all. Pretty easy to find, they had valet, front desk gentleman was very nice and helpful. Originally we had a room without a beach view but upon walking past one of the rooms with the door open (that had a beach view) I changed my mind and we had to upgrade! Sooo worth it, perfect view of all of the gorgeous beach, they also had a bar/cafe called The Deck just a few steps away that was lovely. It filled up fast so the second time we went there (later in the day) there wasn't any space left at the bar so we had to go elsewhere for our drinks but luckily the hotel is a short walk from all of the downtown restaurants and bars. Overall our stay was wonderful and we'll be back
Manager Response: Thank you for the stellar review, Autumn!  It's outstanding you had such a wonderful experience with us! We're delighted you enjoyed our excellent location with its stunning and breathtaking views. That's what we like to see! We can't wait to see you again soon so we can share those beautiful scenes with you once more!  Have a fantastic day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: As a hotel to pay $350 and get a motel room overlooking the main road is never ideal.  The nearby Deck bar and the Driftwood Kitchen are excellent though.    If you are paying for a room you might as well pay extra and get a proper view.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback, Russ.  While it's great you enjoyed our location, we regret that our rooms  didn't meet your expectations. Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Horrible ‚Äûhotel‚Äú seems like a motel renting out rooms by the hour - the police was there when we arrived... several ‚Äûwomen‚Äú presented themselves with older men at the beach  - horrible bathroom with black hairs everywhere - incredible! the entire building has the appearance of a social housing - why should you go there on vacation?? Thank god we only had to stay for one night!

Summary: The best thing about the hotel is the view if you book an expensive ocean view room In the Reef Tower. This hotel is comprised of several buildings.  The other really nice thing is The Deck , bar & restaurant overlooking the ocean. Otherwise the service is somewhat rude & uncaring. I asked for a late checkout and was denied.  So at 11:10 someone from the hotel came banging on our door to get out.   I understand rules are rules, however this was 10 min after checkout. My husband was loading the car already.  We are an older couple & we travel the world.  We really stayed at 5, 4 & 3 Star hotels so we have experience with what to expect.   We were horrified that they sent someone to the room to bang on our door at 11:10 a.m. to get out!!!!!   We were paying $ 519 / night ( summer
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback, Joan.  It's unfortunate to hear you weren't completely satisfied with your recent experience, as we strive to provide all of our guests with a wonderful experience from beginning to end. We hope you'll give us another chance to provide you with the quality experience we're truly capable of sharing with our guests.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: This hotel is right on the beach and has two nice restaurants as well, other than that you may want to stay elsewhere...we were moved 4 times in two days, asked for a toaster which should have been in a kitchenette, they couldn‚Äôt find one, only two coffee cups and one drinking glass and barely any cutlery.  The pull out bed/couch was a bed with springs, we had five people and called ahead to make sure we were ok with getting a roll away. Once we were there they said it was not allowed. They moved us to a room that was already booked so we had to move again then moved us to a room with one king bed!  How do run a hotel without knowing which rooms are booked or not booked. Needless to say we were jerked around so we decided enough was enough and left. I talked to one of the

Summary: Hotel is a combination of several buildings.   The entry area has limited parking.  The people were very friendly and had a smile.   Everything said was in caring for the customer.   There are elevators in the buildings.   However is limited and key as to why there is not self parking.    Fee is $34.00   Resort fee is  $15.00.   these are in addition to what is paid for room + taxes.     Also there is a $8.42 for two bottle of water if found in the room.    We didn't see any and were charged.   They took off the billing when addressed.   We happen to be the one on the beach side.   The Hotel is shows its aged however they do they to keep up with repairs.   In our room  there were broken tiles in the bath room.   The bathroom was very functional.   However,  limited to one person
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Jam_macL_A_Calif!  We're happy you enjoyed your experience with us! The happiness and satisfaction of our guests is important to us and we endeavor to offer quality comfort and service for our guests. We look forward to sharing an even better experience with you soon! Have a lovely day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: This place was horrible. Stayed for a conference where my company was paying thousands of dollars. Received 2 phone calls from front desk while I was in my conference to come and remove my stuff. Really, that‚Äôs how you treat your guests. Then l approach my room and Security is there with the door open and I get a weak i‚Äôm sorry. Go to front desk and they could care less about any of this then I hear the front desk answer the phone saying yes he is gone.  Absolute worst experience ever and as a local I will be sharing this experience with all of my friends.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, C-Suite.  We're disheartened to hear about the challenges you faced during your stay with us. Summary: We staying here for a few nights whilst we made our way to Carlsbad. All the staff were helpful on all occasions. The Deck and Driftwood were perfect to have dinner and cocktails. I would recommend the lamb chops, one of the best dishes I've had. Again, the staff were all friendly and made us feel welcome. It's great having a section on the beach, the staff will grab you chairs/loungers/towels/umbrellas and set them up for you. They have balls to borrow for a kick about as well. There are packages on their website too where you can get parking/breakfast which makes it better value.  We'll definitely stay here when we go to Laguna again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the fantastic review, Kaylie!  It's excellent you had such an amazing stay with us! We're delighted our team made you feel so welcome and valued during your time in our hotel. We endeavor to go above and beyond to ensure our guests have a memorable experience. Summary: Stayed at 2 bedroom. 1) There were no bath towels, we had to call for them. 2) Husband got stuck in elevator - no apologies or compensated for this scare 3) Room keys continuously were not working.   4) Charge "resort" fee , didn't use and when we wanted, we couldn't even get beach chairs after 5:45 to wait and enjoy the sunset at 6:40 ish.  Maybe change time so guest can enjoy this special treat.

Summary: Loved staying here. The room and location were great. Staff was ultra friendly and helpful . Quick and easy access to the beach, vending machine and surrounding shops and restaurants. I would highly reccomend staying here

Summary: We have stayed at Pacific Edge several times and woudn‚Äôt stay anywhere else in Laguna. It‚Äôs a perfect location. Walking distance to town and restaurants. Private beach. Devin and Q, our beach attendants were wonderful. They were courteous and helpful with every request. Clean rooms. Excellent service in every way!
Manager Response: Thanks for the splendid review, Perri!  It's fantastic you had such an excellent experience with us at our prime location. We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you. Have a beautiful day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Loved the beach and want to praise & thank DEVON THE BEACH GUY FOR ALL HIS HELP EVERY DAY.  He made it great -helping with umbrella,chairs,adjusting them and being so helpful.THE WAVES CAME UP AND HE HELPED US AND TOILD US WHEN THEY WOULD GO DOWN .
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, clairejlehr!  We're delighted to hear that you had such an outstanding experience with our team! Thanks for sharing and have a terrific day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Stayed last night at Pacific Edge.  We used to stay at Hotel Laguna but it's now closed.   Pacific Edge is a warren of buildings and rooms.  We stayed in a 2 queen "partial ocean view" room.   #20.   Right over the lobby.  About 5 rooms on that stretch by themselves.  Upon arrival we found that the "parking" is valet only at $35/day.   We were told we could "find self parking on the street" but in Laguna Beach street parking is rare and metered.   Hotel room was decent and there was a view, across the other buildings of the ocean.   Outside balcony w/privacy wall to next room over.    Not bad room but did find trash in the "brochure slots" on the desk.   Small wall ac was loud enough to drown out the ocean and had to work hard to cool the room and kill the beach humidity.   In

While we're happy that you appreciated our comfortable beds and convenient location, it's unfortunate our parking and amenities didn't exceed your expectations. We hope you allow us the opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Pacific edge is such a relaxing spot on PCH Highway. We love the secluded beach! Devon and Q were so wonderful. They always had an umbrella and chairs available and set up. Fantastic customer service! I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a relaxing weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent rating, Laura!  We're so glad that you've enjoyed your stay with us so much. We strive to provide each guest with exceptional service and we're so glad that several members of our team went above and beyond to ensure your satisfaction. Summary: Had a great experience at Pacific Edge Hotel. Devon the beach attendant was the best so helpful.  Clean rooms, house keeping was great. Great views of the ocean, the sunsets were amazing. Will return again and again.

Summary: We arrived at 400(check-in time) and were told our room was not ready. When we were able to get in our room(5:30), there was no ac and it was very hot. The ac unit is a tiny wall unit, ridiculously small. I asked the manager why the ac was turned off when it was so hot. She said the maids often turn the air off. I asked why since that makes no sense when someone is checking in the room. She shrugged and seemed to care less. When I was blowdrying my hair for only 10 minutes( travel size blowdryer), it blew a fuse and the ac turned off. The maintenance worker told me that the ac and outlet in the bathroom are on the same circuit and advised me not to have ac on when using bathroom outlet. The electrical system is obviously updated which goes with the old, dirty carpet and saggy
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, ginnyfla.  We're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. It's unfortunate you've noticed a decline in the quality of our accommodations and that our service wasn't up to par. We care about the comfort of our guests so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We hope for the opportunity to host you again soon for a more positive experience. Summary: We did not want to leave. The hotel sits ON the beach. There is beach side set up service - Devon is amazing and works so hard. Nicholas the valet is the kindest. Lauren and Emily and the other gentlemen at the front desk couldn't have been more accommodating. Finally Sean at Driftwood was one of the best servers we have ever had. The kids only wanted to eat at Driftwood because of wonderful Sean. The rooms are simple and small but it works since u r pretty much at beach all day or eating. We will be back for sure !!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this glowing review, Rose!  We are delighted to hear about your experience! We truly appreciate your kind words regarding our team. We strive to provide our guests with the warmest hospitality and most efficient service, so this is fantastic to hear! Your compliments are not only rewarding, but also encouraging.  We'd love to share another positive, fun experience with you in the future. Have a stellar day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: We first stayed here 5 years ago, almost by accident, and loved it so much we had to come back when we returned to California. It's all about the location, right on the beach and within a few minutes walk of the town which is a really friendly, eclectic and interesting place. The service is friendly and "can-do" and the suite we had was plenty big enough for the 4 of us. There are a couple of small pools which are generally quiet, for a relax away from the waves. If I had to grumble about anything it would be that if a kitchenette is provided, more than 2 bowls and 3 plates should be in the cupboards and the air conditioning is really in need of an update as there is currently the choice between being cool and being able to hear yourself think. As a family, we would go back
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us, Jim.  We're glad you enjoyed your time with us so much! It's excellent you appreciated our spacious rooms and friendly service. That's what we like to see! Hearing our guests' suggestions are extremely important to us. With that being said, we'll be sure to look into your concerns moving forward. We want to make sure those missteps‚Äã are erased for our future guests.  Once again, we appreciate the time you've taken to leave us a review. If there's any way we can accommodate you during a future visit, please let us know. Have a great day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: I usually stay at the Holiday Inn across the street but I‚Äôm thankful they were booked. The Pacific Edge was great! The service, restaurants, views, beach, and cleanliness were all 10 out of 10. I will definetly be staying here now when I come to Laguna!
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely review, Jessica!  We are very proud to hear about the wonderful stay we were able to share with you. It is great to hear that you found everything to be so fantastic! We hope you plan on staying with us again soon as we'd love to share another great experience with you.  Thanks again! Summary: Our beachfront room was located in the Reef section which allowed for quiet, peaceful moments throughout the day and evening.  Our view was amazing.  We spent last summer at Kaanapali Resort, and while the view was beautiful, our experience at Pacific Edge rivaled Hawaii as the clear aqua-blue waves crashed right under our balcony.  We were impressed with the warm, friendly service experienced in our interactions with the staff at the front desk, room service, and housekeeping.  I called the front desk to see if the hotel sold sunscreen.  Dennis, who was incredibly helpful throughout our stay, offered to share his own.  The location is wonderful.  We dropped our car off with the valet and didn't need it until we left.  The food at the Deck and Driftwood Kitchen was delicious.
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review, Lisa!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your time with us so much and that our team took excellent care of you and your family! We're delighted you appreciated our convenient location with its stunning views. We love sharing our breathtaking sights with our guests and your praise lets us know we're succeeding! We look forward to sharing another excellent experience with you "as soon as possible"!  Have a lovely day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: The staff was super friendly and helpful which set the tone for a nice stay. The room was what you would expect for a beachfront location and to me was great. The bed was very, very comfortable. I chose this hotel for location, location, location and it did not disappoint as home base as we explored several beaches including the beachfront Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Thanks for the fantastic review, Lori!  We're happy you enjoyed your time with us so much at Pacific Edge Hotel! We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so it's excellent you appreciated our prime location. We love seeing our guests take advantage of our proximity to so many wonderful attractions.  We look forward to hosting you again soon! Have an amazing day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: We tried to check in early. Front desk promised to call us, when our room will be ready. No one did.  Yes, we checked in at 4. Today, at 9:30, a cleaning lady knocked at our door and asked, "Are you checking out?" We had to leave more then 1 hour early.  On hotel rules said" Late Check Out fee" Do they have any fee for early kicked out? Why this hotel do not have" Do Not Disturb" sign? Why there no safe in the room. I had to care my valet and jewelry wherever I went.   Over all, room was clean, bed was very comfortable, valet parking staff were pleasant...
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to reach out to us, hayushka1.  We are deeply disappointed to hear that you were not more fully satisfied with your stay. We will let our management team know about your experience and see what we can to ensure this won't happen again in the future. If there is anything we can do to accommodate a future stay with us, please let us know.  We'd love another opportunity to show you how amazing we are so we look forward to hosting you again soon.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Service desk person was rude. Rooms need a make over very small and beds where the worst. Bed bugs we couldnt sleep. Definitely will not recommend this place to anyone. Yeah its super close to the beach but not worth the charge, service and quality of room
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed in Laguna Beach many times, but this was my first time staying at the Pacific Edge Hotel and I can't wait to go back!  The entire staff, from front desk to the beach attendants were super polite, personable and knowledgeable.  Location was unbeatable and our beachfront room was so clean and comfortable.  I truly can't say enough good things about the hotel and cannot think of a single thing that could have made my stay better!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review, Lynn!  We are very pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable experience with us! We appreciate your praise for our comfortable rooms along with our team; they work very hard to ensure every guest feels right at home. We are delighted you felt welcomed and valued during your time with us!  We'd love to share another positive experience with you in the future! Have a beautiful day, and thanks again for sharing!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Rooms are badly in need of Updating
Summary: Staff upon arriving was pleasant and accommodating. Room wasn't ready even though it was almost 5:00pm (checkin: 4:00pm). Went out for dinner came back 3hrs later; given room key but NO luggage. We were told the luggage would be brought up from the car;  unfortunately they couldn't find my Porsche. After waiting one hour, we were told they misplaced our luggage; evidently it was delivered to the wrong room. The room was ocean front as requested but looked as though it was out of a 20 year old Motel Six. Carpeting so dirty it wasn't fit to walk barefoot upon. The air conditioner ran on HIGH only making it unbearable to sleep. The patio door was off the track and barely operable, furniture broken on the deck,  Requested a room change and the staff did accommodate us but
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, Arjaye.  We were disappointed to learn that the condition and quality of our hotel did not meet your expectations. We also regret that our team didn't go above and beyond to accommodate your needs in a timely manner. Please be assured that this is not the standard that we aspire to and we will share your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward. Summary: Ocean front room- excellent  AirConditioner- worked but so horribly loud interfered with sleep.  Would have opened door for ocean breezes and wave sound but too hot and cafe right next to our room was so loud we had to batten down the hatches to try to sleep. Refrigerator so full of their ‚Äòfor sale‚Äô items that their was no room for anything we might have wanted to keep cool. No microwave  Shower completely non functional for 1 day out of 3. Carpet looked dirty. Valet guys were great.  Some people felt the parking rate per night was too high but with all the activities of the wedding party I appreciated their efficient and cheerful service. Staff charged a daily resort fee ($15) for pool towels, beach chair use etc. which we never used and they refused to remove the fee.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, dwoodnd.  It's unfortunate you had such challenges during your stay with us. We're disheartened our temperature control system didn't meet your expectations and that you weren't satisfied with our amenities. It's important to us that our guests feel relaxed and comfortable during their time with us. We hold ourselves to a higher standard so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We hope you allow us the chance to host you again soon for a more positive experience.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Stayed for one night for business so I was focused on the room and its amenities rather than the beach. The room really fell short. I was in the Sea building which is between the street and the alley. There was a sliver of ocean view. Room was adequately sized and had a kitchenette. Furnishings were very worn. Almost no accessible outlets to plug your electronics. Bed was okay but the pillows didn't work for me. My biggest complaint was the incredibly thin walls. I was awakened by the alarm on the phone in the next room!  Bathroom was cramped with the towels bumping you when you sat on the toilet. Shower water temperature vacillated from scalding to cool all in the same shower.  Ate at the Driftwood and service was great as then view and the food good.  Sounds like others in
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, Dak.  It's unfortunate your time with us was less than ideal. We're disappointed you had such challenges with the sound insulation in our rooms, as well as our furnishings and bathrooms. The satisfaction of our guests is important to us so we'll be sure to discuss your feedback moving forward.  We hope for the chance to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: DJ, Jordan and Devin were amazing! They made our stay worthwhile. They made sure we had the spot we wanted on the beach everyday, and went out of their way to recommend places for dinner. We will definitely be back next summer due to their hospitality!  Cheryl & Shannon
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely review, Cheryl & Shannon!  It's excellent your time with us was so fantastic! We're thrilled to have provided you a 5/5 experience; we highly credit our team members for being so attentive and informative. We will be sure to pass along your compliments to DJ, Jordan & Devin.  We look forward to seeing you both next summer. Have a splendid day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: My husband & I stayed in a 2 bedroom villa with another couple. Check in was fine, staff is friendly. Beware however, they will be quick to offer you valet parking without letting you know of the $35 a day fee. (Mind you, if you've never been to the Laguna Beach area before, parking anywhere isn't free.) But luckily we caught on after entering our villa since the valet was right in front of our balcony & we saw the cost posted! So we quickly opted out on the valet & found a parking garage for $10 around the corner instead! (Hey, $30 VS $105 is a no brainer!) The Villa does not provide a microwave in their kitchen (weird) & be careful if you bring beverages to put into the fridge.... they have 2 water bottles in there already, & if you don't notice & accidentally take them, they
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, garcia2016.  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent birthday getaway. While it's great to see that you seemed to enjoy the 2 bedroom villa and our staff, it's unfortunate you had other challenges during your time with us. We're disheartened that our amenities and services offered were added to your bill despite you not using them. It's great to see that our front office staff finally took care of reversing that charge, but we apologize again that it took multiple calls to settle it. We hold ourselves to a higher standard so we'll discuss your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We truly hope for the chance to host you again soon for a more positive experience.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Perfect location! Wonderful towel and lounge chairs service right on the beach! Make sure you make reservations in advance for breakfast if it is included in your package so you can get a beachfront table.

We'd love to host you again in the future so we can share another excellent experience with you.  Have a beautiful day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Ocean front room with the waves crashing below was awesome! Would definitely stay again. We were just a few minutes walk down to the shore and the water. Ordered room service a few times from the local resturant and the food was great.

Summary Heading: Very hip and trendy beachfront bar
Summary: This place is packed on the weekends.  Make reservations if they take them.  Literally, you are right on the beach.  They have private meeting rooms and balconies right next to the bar that you can reserve for birthday parties.  Very fun place.  Check it out.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4/5 rating, sm92629!  It's fantastic your time with us was so great! We're happy you appreciated our beachfront location and fun atmosphere. We aim to please and your feedback lets us know we're doing our job! We strive for excellence so we look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share an even better experience with you.  Have a stellar day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Came here on a Groupon and went to check in.  We asked about an upgrade and advised that we were celebrating our anniversary.  They gave us a reduced price for Oceanview and included a bottle of champagne.  Room was very nice and walking distance to downtown.  Great view of ocean from our room.
Manager Response: Thanks for the 4-star rating and review, kcolton!  We're thrilled you had such a pleasant time with us! We strive to offer top-notch service and convenience for our guests. Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: What a Great Location! Seconds Away from the Beach
Summary: At first, I thought we made a mistake staying at the hotel, as the check-in area is different than where the valet is located and different than the building we stayed at (Reef Building).  Once I got into the room and realized I was seconds away from the beach I was thrilled.  You just walk outside - no shoes - and then before you know it you touch the sand.  The hotel is older and has been remodeled - sort of - it is a decent hotel and I would DEFINITELY stay there again due to the location and room service.  I actually hesitate to write this review because I don't want anyone else to know about this place.  We stayed in room 124 - Reef building; it was almost right on the water and there were rocks below so no beachgoers could make camp so little to no people noise - just the
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, Al.  It's outstanding you enjoyed your time with us at our convenient location to the beach so much. We love offering the most relaxing and comfortable experiences with our guests and your praise for our bedding lets us know we're doing our job. We're also thrilled to know you appreciated our services and amenities. That's what we like to see!  We look forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon! Have a stellar day!  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: Great location, right on the ocean side of PCH.  Oceanfront rooms are literally right above the beach, gorgeous views and sounds of the ocean.  Hotel is obviously older, but has been updated so the rooms are nice and modern feeling.  Excellent beach that the hotel controls and attendants help with lounge chairs, beach towels, etc.  Tons of great restaurants in walking distance!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the fantastic review with us, Tara!  We're happy to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us. It's wonderful to know that you appreciated our prime location as well as our stunning views. Summary: We were greeted by Nicholas, who is just awesome at his job. Nicholas watched out for us and was super helpful. Knowledgeable about the area ,we had many different functions we had to attend , and food ! I have all boys and this was most important to us . Nicholas ROCKS!!!!!

Summary Heading: Everyone is so friendly it‚Äôs intoxicating
Summary: Looking for a ocean facing hotel with direct access to the beach, super cute locals who are just so so nice - this place is for you. It‚Äôs worth it to splurge on the ocean facing rooms to wake up to the sound of the waves if you plan on being here more than a couple of days. If it‚Äôs a quick weekend trip, the street facing rooms are just fine. With this hotel it‚Äôs all about the beach, and the deck side restaurant that is buzzing with people drinking rose and enjoying mussels and the eye candy (during my stay there was a lot of that!!!) . When you are ready for the beach, A nice college kid puts out your lounge chair, offers you towels and an umbrella and then you are set to get into the water (and if you are lucky catch the dolphins). It‚Äôs a public beach so bring your own drinks

Summary: Everything was clean and very nice   The only disappointing thing is the late check in policy it is at 4:00 PM and room service leave at 5:00 PM   The receptionist was very nice and helpful  It is on the main street and there is a free shuttle service outside the hotel so transportation was very easy üôÇ

Summary: I have to agree with many of your reviewers that the rooms are horrible n far below the standard expected from a hotel asking for the level of rate. By the way, be aware of not so obvious charges including resort fee n valet parking fee.  The paint peel off from the bathtub, no desk or chair in the room, the fridge is right next to the bed, impossible to turn on the air con as the noise generated is so high that's no one can get to sleep, the only sliding door opens to the corridor that anyone walking past can come through. The carpet smells and need to be aired out. The hot tub says limit is 7 persons but no one cares and is overflowing most of the time we were there.   Not even the reception staff show any flexibility or willingness in rearrangement with rooms.  I have stayed

Summary Heading: Good location but not a great room
Summary: The location of the hotel was amazing, and we had ocean views despite not being in an ocean view apartment, however the hotel had the vibe of a converted motel. Considering we stayed in off-peak season, the price we paid for this accommodation was not justified.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback, Travelling_WNS.  We appreciate your input. It's great that you loved our prime location and ocean views. Summary Heading: Great staff but room a disappointment
Summary: We came to CA for just a quick 3 day excursion. When we booked the hotel we thought is was very pricey and over $300/night but from the photos of the beach and rooms we thought we would go for it. The staff is very friendly and accommodating, this is why we gave it a three. As for the rooms and facility I would give it a 1. The pictures of the room showed a room with a couch. We are 4, 2 adults and 2 teenagers. The room is tiny. It does not have a desk which is standard in hotels and there is no couch. It is very tiny. To make it worse we got a room on the ground floor right in front of the pool. It is 9:17 pm and there are kids outside our door in the pool and screaming. We are tired from our trip and want quiet at 9pm. Also, the hotel is on the beach and they offer beach
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Kyle.  We regret to hear that you were unsatisfied with your room. We aim to provide our guests with the most comfortable experience possible, and we'd love to help you reserve a room that better suits your individual needs of space and comfort in the future.  We hope for the opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Fantastic Beachfront Location but Disappointing Room
Summary: If you want to be just steps from the beach and in walking distance to wonderful shops and restaurants, the location of Pacific Edge is prime. Hotel even provides towels, chaise lounges, and umbrellas for their guests down by the water. Now for the unfortunate part:  We reserved this non-refundable room directly off their hotel website with the expectation that there would be some luxury for the price we paid; what a disappointment when we opened the door to our cramped (bathroom/shower especially), stuffy, thin-walled motel room facing the street. Into the wee hours, we could hear every word of every television show the people behind us were watching. Also, the maid did not service our room during our stay. Perhaps they have a more upgraded block of rooms facing the ocean for a
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, K2A2.  We're glad you appreciated our convenient location, but we're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. We regret that our rooms and sound insulation failed to meet your standards. We will address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We hope to have you stay with us again so we can share a more positive experience with you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: You can hear the crashing waves
Summary: A lot of people write bad reviews of  Pacific Edge Hotel in Laguna Beach. I have been there a few times in the past few years and this last weekend. The positive is that if you book a room for the oceanfront in the Reef building you will be happy for about 350.00 per night plus tax in the summer. The ocean is right below your room. This part of the property is away from the Deck Restaurant so it is quiet. It is a smoke free hotel, and has a nice smoking area in the front..but the room next door lit up a cigarette the first night we were there....and I told them to put it out. There seems to be quite a lot of people that smoked there that weekend which surprised me. I heard one person say that the staff cam and knocked on their door to have them warned after someone complained.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, Terry.  We strive to offer our guests quality service and comfort. However, it's unfortunate that your stay with us was anything less than perfect. We'll be addressing your concerns regarding our no-smoking policy with the appropriate members of our team.  We'd love to see you again in the future to share a more positive experience with you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Didn‚Äôt like this hotel. The pictures don‚Äôt acutely show the hotel. They show you the suits on the beach, not the rest of hotel, which is not on the beach. The rooms are small and out dated. We had to be moved 3 times due to rooms that weren‚Äôt cleaned or only partially cleaned (used soaps and towels on the floor). The office clerk was kind and moved us rooms and compensated. It just wasn‚Äôt at all what we thought it would be. Probably wouldn‚Äôt stay their again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback, Angela.  We regret that you had such difficulty during your time with us. We strive to offer quality service and comfort for our guests and it's unfortunate your room wasn't cleaned to the high standards we aspire to provide. We'll be sure to address your feedback with our team moving forward.  We do hope you allow us to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: My husband and I came to Laguna Beach to spend the day, enjoy a meal and soak in the beautiful Memorial Day weather. We took the free shuttle to scout out what to do next. I particularly wanted to check out Driftwood Kitchen. After staying on the shuttle on it's entire route we got off at the Sleepy Hollow (stop for Pacific Edge Hotel and 2 restaurants, The Deck and Driftwood Kitchen). After exploring the location and it's easy beach access we decided to book a night. Linnea at the front desk was so nice and everso helpful. She even upgraded our room for being a first time customer. Having no toiletries, she offerred toothbrushes and toothpaste. Thanks, Linnea, for making us feel so welcome. We walked down the road to a clothing shop and purchased the next best thing to pajamas.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing this stellar review, JujuTol!  We're thrilled your time with us was so outstanding! We endeavor to share a memorable experience with our guests. Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: I booked a week to treat my son's out of school celebration, so I booked suite full size bed pull out sofa bed, sofa bed was broken so I told front desk they said house keeping checked it out and said it was fine,my kids slept floor.so I told lady can you please come and look at it so she did. And said yes it's broken really after 3 nights of sleeping floor.bathroom shower ceiling had dry wall falling my head from leak above floor. She said I'll take $50 off. Keep your $50 just give me what I paid for. So frustrating to pay over $2000 and sleep floor. Not a fun vacation. Pics are very deceiving.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Sunny.  We're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. It's unfortunate you've noticed a decline in the quality of our accommodations and that we weren't able to fix the problem. Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We were enticed by the beautiful pictures on their website so we booked this hotel for a relaxing stay. The pictures show a beautiful ocean view balcony and a peaceful looking beach.  When we arrived, omg, we were met with several loud parties right under our balcony.  People were rowdy and music were blasting to the level that we couldn't hear anything else.  This hotel rents out 5 bungalows under the Beach Front Surf rooms for parties.  I have no issues with people having parties but just do not want to have 100+ people drinking and dancing outside my balcony.  Pacific Edge Hotel in Laguna Beach advertises a completely different picture than what it is.  Their website deceptively omit the vital information about the reality of the stay.  They ought to clarify to potential
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback.  It's unfortunate your time with us was less than ideal. Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel. We came to celebrate my birthday. We booked the King Ocean Front in the Surf wing. We got the top floor and it was magnificent! The room was simple but nice and comfortable. But we loved the outside balcony with the most outstanding views. We ordered twice from room service. The Driftwood Kitchen delivered in a speedy and friendly manner. Everything was delicious. The French toast and Egg White Omelet were extremely good! We will be back.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review, four2travel!  It's fantastic you had such a memorable and rewarding experience with us. Summary: Can‚Äôt rave enough about this lovely beach hideaway and it‚Äôs amazing staff. Everyone has been truly hospitable in every way. The rooms are spotless and the grounds are literally a few steps from the sand. If you are planning an event, definitely check out the Beach Bungalows all designed with a different theme. Seriously, so cute!!!

Summary Heading: Not as advertised. Rooms are old, outdated and dirty.
Summary: To see the pictures on the web site which are gorgeous and then what you are actually getting, an old section of the hotel that is outdated and falling apart is very deceiving. No where in my booking did it say I would be staying in an old, outdated room.  Even that I could have overlooked had the room actually been acceptably clean.  The kitchen floor was filthy and when we cleaned it the cloth we used was disgusting. The state of the utensils and pans in the room was disgraceful even for an old outdated room. The cabinets and drawers barely opened or closed they were  such a mess. The stove was disgusting, they couldn't have even been bothered to put new silver liners under the burners? They were stained and gross. Only 3 of the burners worked on the stove and there was only

Summary Heading: Great location, but rooms need to be updated and cleaning needs to be better.
Summary: The location is great! Right on the beach, walking distance to shopping, restaurants and bars.    However...  The rooms seriously need to be updated.  I have four complaints that will make me try some other hotel instead of coming back to the Pacific Edge.  I offer these constructively for the hotel to get feedback for improvements.  1.  There were only four outlets in the room.  One behind the nightstand with the ipod dock and lamp taking up the plugs, one under the desk with another lamp leaving one open plug, one behind the refrigerator being used by the refrigerator and the coffee maker and finally, one in the bathroom.  Tip:  Bring a power strip unless you want to start moving furniture and unplugging everything in the room.  The hotel needs to provide additional, open

Summary: Have tried to stay here many times because of it's great location in Laguna Beach but I'm good at "not" planning ahead.  This time however, I started early in the season and booked to come in on a Thursday and stay as long as they would have me.    What a treat.  Great staff, lots of parking, a fabulous room on the beach, and a short walk to downtown dining and shopping was over the top.  Thank you all!!  I will plan ahead from now on..  :-)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the wonderful review with us, Don!  We're happy to hear that you had such a pleasant stay with us! It was our pleasure hosting you. Summary: We extended a business trip into a pleasure trip meeting another couple that we knew from the area .We were determined to find a waterfront location under $200 a night .When we arrived we were promptly met by the valet and the check in was easy enough but it became obvious that most of the hotel is not actually on the water .The restaurants have good views and some of the rooms on the ocean side might have good views but a large number of them are not available because a building was recently obtained by the hotel in this being renovated .A great many of the rooms are facing the parking lot or the main road .Don't expect to even see the water if you don't pay for the ocean Front or ocean view room .That being said the hotel does have just about everything you would need .It is

Summary: I live in Laguna Beach very close to this hotel.  I was having some work done on my house and had to be out of it for the week.  I booked this hotel and it ended up being during my daughter's spring break and her birthday so we were really excited to have a little "stacation" and celebrate her birthday while our house was getting a few upgrades.  i have to say, this is actually the first review i have ever written, so that says a lot. Summary Heading: Best stay ever clean rooms great staff

Summary: Very cute cozy little room. The service and hospitality is excellent. I love the fact there is some one at the front desk 24 hours.  And the view at the Deck restaurant is beautiful.  Beach access is very convenient.

Summary: My family and I love coming down to Laguna Beach for a quick weekend getaway! We enjoy staying at the Pacific Edge because it has a great location close to shops, restaurants and steps away from the beach. The staff is also super friendly... particularly Devon and DJ. They helped us out on the beach... set up our chairs, umbrellas, etc. They were super attentive and were happy to help us with anything we needed. Over-all this is a great hotel perfect for families or couples. Looking forward to coming back soon :))

Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Laguna is a great place to visit and stay for the weekend!  And if this is the only place you can find to stay, go for it. It‚Äôs overpriced, including $34 a day for parking. The room was small, had a shower from ‚ÄòPsycho‚Äô that wend hot to cold to hot... our view was the ally in the back.  But, it was walking distance from downtown.   Not so bad. I would recommend the holiday inn across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, doctorwinkelman.  While we are glad you enjoyed our excellent location, we were disappointed to learn that the condition of our hotel did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that this is not the standard that we aspire to and we will share your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We hope you allow us the chance to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Super Sweet Staff... Amazing Location...(well, I mean... if you're facing the water)
Summary: Laguna is always pretty amazing... and if you are coming off-peak you can usually find extremely decent prices, however---- most of the time you get decent prices, you miss out on the best part of Laguna. And that's how I feel about this hotel... If you're not going to pay the price for an ocean front room with a balcony that opens to the ocean, then it's just a typical "spruced up" old hotel.  They have done as good a job as possible of making the interior of the rooms feel fresh and somewhat current without doing a proper upgrade to the building and it's done well enough to feel good about staying there.  The ocean front bungalows which you can rent for the day are pretty wonderful, giving you a room to have on the beach with your own drinks, TV... indoor and outdoor seating
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Chris!  We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We're happy that you loved our attentive staff and gorgeous views. We strive to provide our guests with warm hospitality, efficient service, and clean rooms.  We'd love to share an even better experience with you next time. Have a beautiful day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Yes it is an ocean front property with great views. But would I stay again, probably not. The room I had was nothing light any pictures on the sight. The rooms ALL OF THEM need updating. The carpet, d√©cor, bath, AC and heating units are also old and out dated! The rooms are more motel style to me. The best thing about the hotel is the on property restaurants. I ate breakfast and dinner several times during my stay at the on site restaurants. The views are spectacular and the food was top notch. Even though I probably wont stay here again because the rooms are just not up to quality to me, I would definitely visit again for the restaurants.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to hare your feedback with us.  I'm sorry that we weren't able to meet your expectations, but I'm glad to know that your experience at the restaurants were enjoyable. If there is anything we can do for you in a future visit if you change your mind, please let us know. We hope we get the opportunity to do so. Thank you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: This is my 2nd time staying at Pacific Edge for a girls weekend.  I love the ocean front rooms because you are so close to the ocean.  It's fun to watch the dolphins feeding in the morning in your pj's on the balcony.  The rooms are clean and big and the staff is great.  Easy to valet your car and they will help you take your bags up the stairs.  We had dinner one night at The Deck and one night at Driftwood Kitchen.  Both places are pretty busy but the food and view are worth the wait.  And it's also an easy walk to town and other restaurants.  I would highly recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: Chefola,  Thanks for the amazing review and for coming back to visit us again. I'm glad that you and your girlfriends had a great time. The dolphins were definitely in abundance these last few weeks and I'm so glad you got to see them in the morning. Thanks for the great compliments about The Deck and Driftwood. We love the food and I'm glad you were able to enjoy it as much as we do. Don't wait too long to stay with us again. Thanks again for the wonderful review!  All my best,  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: This hotel is in such a great location! It‚Äôs within walking distance of all of the beach shopping and restaurants in Laguna Beach. It‚Äôs also right on the beach! The beach attendants Devon and DJ are fantastic! They are super nice and always helpful! Difinetly want to return to this place!
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review, jsdilo11!  We appreciate your compliments regarding our hard-working team. We will make sure to pass on your kind words to Devon and DJ! We can't wait to see you again and thank you for the fantastic review!  Have a great day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Never mind the vacation here's Pacific view
Summary: Incredibly cool location in a beautiful iconic venue with cool friendly staff and pleasent ambience great room with 2 clean.pools friendly and fun staff on the beach supplying chairs and lougers Devon and Share  great guys funny friendly and really helpful beach attendants
Manager Response: Andrew,  Thank you for the great review and the wonderful comments about the staff and especially about Devon and Sophian. I'll make sure to share your comments with them. Come visit us again and thanks again for the great review!  All my best,  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Devon and DJ the beach attendants were super friendly and helpful. With staff like that we‚Äôll be back for sure! The rooms were great and location was excellent. Beach was steps away and lots of shops and restaurants. A grocery store near by also. Helpful with a small refrigerator in a he room. Thanks for a great getaway:)
Manager Response: Gina,  Wonderful! Thank you for the amazing review and for highlighting Devon and DJ. They're fantastic guys and we're so proud of them. I'll make sure to let them know of your comments and we can't wait to have you back and stay with us again. Thanks again for the wonderful feedback and see you soon!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We had a great time as always in Laguna Beach.  We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite.  Would have liked a microwave.  It‚Äôs pretty old, bathroom floor dirty and cupboards, age.  Maid woman was really nice.  DJ, the attendant at the beach, was amazing!  So helpful and super courteous!  Rest of staff great too!  We will forsure be backüëçüèñ
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent review, Kristen!  We're thrilled your time with us was so amazing! We endeavor to go above and beyond to ensure our guests have a memorable experience. It's not surprising that DJ took such wonderful care of you and made you feel so valued. He is an important member of our team!  We look forward to hosting you again soon for another stellar experience! Have a beautiful day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: The location of this hotel is wonderful, but our room was mediocre.  We were in a village queen room- it was locked off from a larger room with a very loud family. We could hear everything going on and when the door slammed our room shook. The room had ants in the bathroom. The only place to sit was on the bed and it the backboard was metal, so uncomfortable that we couldn't even comfortabley watch some t.v.   I hope the oceanfront rooms are nicer.  Pros were the beach service with tables/chairs and umbrellas and the breakfast at driftwood kitchen was good as well.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, Sarah.  It's disheartening to hear that you had such challenges during your time with us. We're disappointed that the condition of our rooms didn't meet your expectations and that your room wasn't refreshed properly. The comfort and satisfaction of our guests is important to us so we'll be sure to address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope for the chance to demonstrate the high-caliber service we're accustomed to sharing with our guests.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: The beach boys DJ and Devon were so great to us during our stay! They were super nice and helpful when we needed a towel, beach chair, etc.  We would definitely recommend them! We are looking forward to our next visit!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this glowing review, Brenna!  We are delighted to hear about your experience! We truly appreciate your kind words regarding DJ and Devon. We strive to provide our guests with the warmest hospitality and most efficient service, so this is fantastic to hear! Your compliments are not only rewarding, but also encouraging.  We'd love to share another positive, fun experience with you in the future. Have a stellar day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Great service, very friendly staff. The location is great, on the ocean and walking distance to downtown as well as a grocery store, easy breakfast spot and a surf shop. We stay with them every time we get down there.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing the excellent review with us, Tim W!  We're so glad that you had an exceptional experience with us from beginning to end and that you took advantage of our excellent location. It's wonderful to know that our staff treated you so well and made you feel welcome throughout the entirety of your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Have a lovely day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic getaway in an amazing location!
Summary: My friend and I recently stayed at the Pacific Edge Hotel in Laguna Beach, CA.  It turned out to be an excellent choice.  The location is superb, right on the beach and the staff there all made us feel so welcome and comfortable. We were greeted by Issy & Lauren and right from the start we knew we would have a wonderful experience!  We all shared laughs together and then they helped with all the things we needed to enjoy our stay!  Later we met Leiann and Zach and they too took time to ensure we had maps and ideas on fun things to do in and around Laguna Beach!  The hot tub at the hotel was a delicious treat after hiking the trails in Laguna Canyon!   Guaranteed you will enjoy being here in this delightful beach town at this hotel that offers everything you want for fun in the
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Sharon!  We pride ourselves on our service and I'm so glad that Issy, Lauren, Linnea and Zach made an impression on you and made you fell welcomed. We'll make sure to recognize them and I'm sure they're going to be very happy that they were able to make a difference in your stay.  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience! Have a stellar day and thanks again for the great review!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: As the saying goes Location is everything. The pacific edge hotel is a little gem on Laguna beach. Here are the key factors:  Location  - on the beach with easy access to beach (Stairs) A- Staff - Friendly, helpful, responsive A Room - older style but clean and spacious B On sites restaurant - overlooking the beach, food was good not great - B-  There are two pools on property and 1 hot tub. Areas were clean and water was clear - B+  Parking is tough very limited even for checking unless you use the valet area behind the hotel No easy to see signs or directions. It cost $34 a day.  Only had two minor issues. As the day got warmer by the time we got back to the room it had a very musty smell. Open the sliding glass door and in 10 minutes it was gone. On the second day we got back
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. We're happy you enjoyed your overall stay with us! It's great you appreciated our friendly service and clean accommodations so much. Hearing our guests' suggestions are extremely important to us. With that being said, we'll be sure to look into your concerns moving forward. We want to make sure those missteps‚Äã are erased for our future guests.  Once again, we appreciate the time you've taken to leave us a review. If there's any way we can accommodate you during a future visit, please let us know. Have a great day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: I get it that Laguna Beach has some of highest priced real estate in the country and therefore what would be considered expensive in other parts of the country doesn't buy you much here. That being said, my two sisters and I -- there to celebrate an important 60th birthday together which I noted in our reservation notes and at check in) -- felt very disappointed after spending one night at this hotel. We had rented a two-bedroom "suite" with kitchen and were very surprised to see that the living room had NO lamps or lighting whatsoever. Perhaps they felt that we could get by with the glaring overhead entry light or read by flashlight. A call to the front desk to ask if perhaps they might have a lamp we could borrow produced adequate results, with one old lamp and a rummage
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your feedback. We're disheartened to hear about the challenges you faced during your stay with us. We strive to offer our guests quality service and convenience. It's unfortunate to see that we could have done more for you. We hold ourselves to a much higher standard of service so we'll be addressing your concerns with the appropriate members of our team.  Please consider allowing us another chance to provide you with the excellent service we're capable of providing.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Just want to say. The room was decent and clean for the price. Front Desk employees were great. Very friendly and helpful. Right by the water. Our room was facing the main road and you could hear the traffic all night. I am sure the rooms on the other side were better.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us, Dawn.  We're glad to hear you had such a great experience with us. We care about the satisfaction of our guests so we appreciate you letting us know about the challenges you had with the sound insulation in your room. We'll make sure to communicate your feedback to our team.  We're looking forward to sharing an even more pleasant experience with you soon. Thank you again and have a wonderful day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: we booked online and this was our first visit. Hotel is in a great location and the property is fantastic. We had great interactions with the friendly staff and the manager went out of his way to make sure we were comfortable and even provided an on the spot upgrade. Fantastic crew and view! We'll definitely visit again! Had a blast.  Summers family
Manager Response: Summers family!  Thanks for the outstanding review! It's been a pleasure having you stay with us and we love your family. Your girls are so adorable and we just wanted to make sure that they remembered this as the best vacation that they ever had. Keep enjoying your stay and have a great time at the beach.  All my best,  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We've stayed here several times and so far it's one of our favorite places in the area to choose. Hotel's location can't be beaten - some of the greatest views from your room can be found here, the restaurants produce delicious food, valet is nice and quick + reasonably priced for the area. There's a little beach area that is semi-tended with chairs and towels with umbrellas to use. This hotel is also pet-friendly, which is so nice. The front desk staff tends to be a little snobby, despite the rotating personnel we've seen through the years - but check-in is quick!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thanks for the fantastic review!  We're happy you enjoyed your time with us so much at Pacific Edge Hotel! We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so it's excellent you appreciated our prime location. We're glad you enjoyed the beach area as well as our pet friendly policy.  We look forward to hosting you again soon! Have an amazing day!  Alex Yi General Manager
