Summary: After reading several negative reviews I almost cancelled my booking but am very glad I didn't as we loved this place! We only stayed for a night but really enjoyed our stay. The staff was friendly and efficient, the decor is lovely and the hotel has a really nice funky beach feel to it. The room was clean and had a partial ocean view even though we had booked a room on the back of the hotel. Very spacious, the bed was comfortable, the room even had an iPod docking station and a Keurig coffee machine. We had lunch at their beach front patio restaurant 'The Dock' and it was great, the views are amazing. The hotel is in a convenient location, close to restaurants and stores and literally on the beach. I wished we could have stayed longer!
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review, Julia!  It's lovely you enjoyed your time with us so much! We strive for excellence and your praise for our beautiful rooms and friendly service lets us know we're doing our job. That's what we like to see! We're thrilled to have provided such a memorable and fantastic experience for you.  We can't wait to see you again soon! Have a great day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: From arrival to departure, every moment at this hotel was immaculate. The staff always greeted us with friendly smiles and were extremely accommodating. The restaurant was a good time and great food throughout the day and night. The General Manager sets this property well above the rest. We had the pleasure of speaking with him. We will be back along with all our friends as we will recommend this property any chance we can. Thank you for an amazing experience!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review, anndU9301HX!  We are very pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable experience with us! We appreciate your praise for our team; they work very hard to ensure every guest feels right at home. We are delighted you felt welcomed and valued during your time with us! It is also wonderful that you enjoyed the delicious food from the restaurant. That's what we like to see!  We'd love to share another positive experience with you in the future! Have a beautiful day, and thanks again for sharing!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: I purchased 2 nights at Pacific Edge Hotel on Groupon
Summary: The price was attractive, and I got exactly what I paid for. The furniture is simple, modern, functional. The room was spotlessly clean, and the cleaning staff was most accommodating. The photo in their ads faces the beach, and I assumed that possibly even without an ocean view, it would be nice.  Well, it was not.  The room faced other buildings, a parking lot. In the ad it was called: Village Delaxe Queen Room.  The word "Village" lead me to believe  I may have at least a pleasant view on some historical structures.  Parking,   Very Important:  The hotel has a very limited parking,  available at additional cost.   Most guests parked on the street, with meters running starting at 8 a.m. Swimming pool, small, facing a noisy street and mostly shaded by the building. Overall, if I
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, Wanda.  I'm glad that you liked the refreshed rooms and the service of the cleaning staff. The view itself is not an ocean view, but you're steps away from the ocean to relax and unwind. I'm sorry that your stay wasn't as relaxing as you expected. Try the oceanfront room next time. The waves will put you to sleep. I hope this isn't the last time as you stated and give us another try. Thanks again for your feedback.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Great view but the quality is lacking....
Summary: My first visit to the Pacific Edge and I rented a renovated Surf room.  While it was recently renovated, the room was not very warm or inviting.  It did have a refrigerator, coffeemaker and a large flat screen TV.  The view was great, right on your beach.  The quality of the bedding, tissue and toilet paper was sorely lacking.  There were also a lot of gnats in the room.  I was disappointed considering the price vs. value.  On the positive side, it is easy to get to the beach and the Deck is tight next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this feedback, Mary.  We are always working as hard as we can to provide the best stays for our guests. We regret to hear about your experience. We will share all of your concerns with our team moving forward. We hope you plan on staying with us again soon. We'd love to improve your opinion of us.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We stayed in the Ocean Reef room. Nice setup, fridge, keurig coffee maker, satellite TV. But the best thing about the Reef rooms is the view. Right on the sand, away from the Deck Bar so it was quiet  (except for the surf, but that is the best kind of noise). The rooms are a little loud, could here the shower from the room above us, and I swear they were bowling in the room. Maybe a lot of kids? All dies down by 10 so all you could hear was the ocean to put you sleep. Bed was ok. King bed and ottoman for lounging, plus a table and 2 chairs on the balcony.  Wonderful stay for the price. Well worth the upgrade toa Reef room. Lots of food options within walking distance. Mandatory valet and resort fee (40 plus 16). Still a valid price. Shout out to DJ on the beach for helping with
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review, geoteter!  It's outstanding your time with us was so fantastic! We're thrilled you enjoyed our beautiful ocean view so much. DJ is the best at the beach and I'm glad that he was able to enhance your experience. We've already shared your comments with him and he was proud and pleased with your comments. Thank you for that. We can't wait to see you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you!  Have a beautiful day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: The rooms were perfect. My girlfriend and I stayed for one night, and the experience was good. the only down side is that they took $100 from my card as a "deposit". They told me that that I will take about ten days to get my deposit back in my account. It has been two weeks and nothing in my account. I called the hotel, and even spoke to accounting, but they tell me that the money will be in my account soon. At the end they told me to contact my bank, and the bank told me that they were unable to help me. I gave up.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. I'm glad that you were able to enjoy the room. Please give me a call at the hotel so we can resolve this deposit issue. I'd be happy to assist you on getting this deposit released. Thank you.    Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: I always look forward to staying at Pacific Edge the views are amazing and the staff are always willing to assist with everything to make my trip a pleseant one. I was recently welcomed by Javid a very professional and courteous employee. Thanks Pacific Edge for hiring great people and I look forward to my next visit.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review, Cowboyandcurry!  It's excellent you had such a fantastic experience with us and enjoyed our gorgeous views! We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests and your praise for our team lets us know we're doing our job. Javid is a valued member of our team so it's no surprise he took such great care of you. That's what we like to see!  We look forward to sharing another splendid experience with you soon! Have a lovely day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: A beautiful night in Laguna Beach
Summary: This stay has been my first to this hotel and we have been pleased beyond words! The rooms are very well kept and are very comfortable with a view that is simply gorgeous. Upon our arrival, we were met in the most friendliest of manners. Javid was simply spectacular in his efforts to accommodate our needs in making our stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. Simply stated, I would rate our stay as magnificent and would, without reservation, recommend this property to anyone wishing to spend quality time enjoying the beauty of the Pacific Ocean at Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for the stellar review, Steven!  It's outstanding your time with us was so amazing. We love sharing our excellent service with each person who walks through our door. It's team members like Javid who ensure our guests are getting the best level of service. That's what we like to see!  We can't wait until your next visit so we can once again share our high-caliber service with you. Have a beautiful day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Can't get a good nights sleep. No customer service.
Summary: In the past I have made many great reviews of this Hotel. I teach in the area and have sent close to 50 people to this Hotel in the past. No more. The rooms on the city side on both sides of the Hotel have very bright hallway lights in the hallways that legally can't be shut off and they shine brightly into the rooms and there is no way to have a dark room to sleep in. They have a vertical blind that doesn't cover all the light outside on all those rooms. After I spoke to the desk they hammered a nail above the door and put a hideous curtain/ rag in front of it and stapled it at the bottom not to cover the air conditioner. The next 2 night the room behind us had 3 drunk, loud women in it and security asked them to quite down. Impossible. I used heavy duty ear plugs that did very
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Marhea.  It's unfortunate your stay in our hotel didn't exceed your expectations. We regret you weren't entirely satisfied with the condition of our hotel as well as our service. We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address all of your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Girlfriend week - Best location in Laguna!!
Summary: The staff went above and beyond to make sure our stay was awesome.  The beach staff was very accommodating...our server Matt was simply amazing...front desk staff was helpful and informative and friendly.  I could go on and on.  The restaurant had the best Sea Bass I have ever eaten.  We will definitely make this an annual trip!!  Highly recommend and affordable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review, Kallen!  It's very pleasing to hear our staff took great care of you. We appreciate your compliments regarding our hardworking team. We pride ourselves on providing excellent service to our guests and we strive to go above and beyond expectations. We look forward to hosting you again in the future!  Thank you again for sharing your review. Have a wonderful day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay in a perfect location!
Summary: I had stay here a couple times, but my last stay was absolutely the best. Checked in with Brandon and he was very friendly and accommodated my requests for the room. Got a very nice studio with ocean view and it was a really great experience. The only thing is that the furniture could be updated. Would be a great improvement for this amazing hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your stay with us so much! We strive for excellence so we're thrilled you appreciated our accommodating service and convenient location. Your praise lets us know we're doing our job and I‚Äôm glad Brandon was able to exceed your expectations. We‚Äôll make sure to recognize him for his service.  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience! Have a stellar day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean room, friendly front desk, amazing views
Summary: Stayed here for my wedding night. Brandon at the front desk helped me with my stay. Very friendly and professional. Thank you!   The only reason I am not giving this 5 stars is because the valet employee who helped retrieve my car in the morning threw my ticket on the ground and stormed off in an angry tirade because I didn‚Äôt have any cash available to tip him. Very unprofessional. I probably wouldn‚Äôt come back to stay at this hotel just because of this reason.
Manager Response: Dear jskeith,  Congratulations on the nuptials and thank you for spending such an important night with us. We truly value the feedback and thank you for the great comments about Brandon. We'll make sure that he's recognized for his service levels. I'm also disappointed that your experience wasn't 5 stars. I've spoken to the team regarding the incident in valet and I can assure you that wasn't his intention. We will learn and grow from your feedback and I do hope that you change your mind about staying with us again. If you do, please let me know.  Thank you again for taking the time to share your feedback and congratulations!.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Edge Hotel. Location is great, walking distance to the center by walking on the beach or Coast highway. The beach is well maintained, and chairs/umbrellas are available for hotel guests. The adjacent restaurants are hidden gems. Rooms had a recent facelift and clean, but are old in nature. There are several buildings, so inquire where is your reservation to avoid surprises. Valet parking is $34 per day, no other parking options nearby...
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate the feedback. We're happy you had a pleasant overall stay with us. It's great you enjoyed our beautiful location so much. However, it's unfortunate your time with us was less than perfect. We do hope to host you again soon for a more positive experience.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: CUSTOMER SERVICE AND LOCATION WAS FANTASTIC
Summary: Its a little older place but the customer service, location, and view were just great. I will definitely be going back. Spent a couple nights, ocean front ( worth the upgrade), and walked to everything in town. Great location. Parking is a minimal issue. My recommendation is to park a couple blocks away on a residential street if you don't want to pay for parking or have visitors.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you review, Eric.  We're thrilled you enjoyed the stellar views from our prime location. We agree that we have the best placement in the city and we love sharing it with our treasured guests. We can't wait to see you again soon for another amazing experience!  Have a fantastic day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Great View from beach front- but old facilities
Summary: Just spent 3 days, beach front room, at this location. Pros: Great View, clean rooms, great staff, great restaurants nearby. Cons: "Pot heads" smoking pot and cigarettes made it impossible to sit at balcony, keep door open for fresh air and enjoy the view. Rooms are a bit old and need huge renovation. Bathroom real small and water pressure was low. $34 parking and $15 resort fee a big "OUCH".
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the feedback. While it's great you enjoyed our beautiful views, we regret the challenges you faced during your time with us and that our services didn't meet your expectations. We hold ourselves to a higher standard so we'll be sure to discuss your feedback with our team moving forward.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for a more positive experience.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Hear the waves from your room - right on the beach
Summary: We stayed in the Reef part of the hotel which hasn't yet been remodeled. While that section definitely needs a redo, we saved money and were still right on the beach. The rooms were always clean and cozy. I highly recommend the location as it's walkable to the major part of Laguna Beach. We only tried one of the restaurants on the property, DK Kitchen, and the black cod and risotto were the best I've had. Other places where we enjoyed the food were Tortilla Republic and Laguna Beach Brew and Grill (modern Mexican).
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words, LindaAZ2!  It's excellent you enjoyed your time with us so much! We pride ourselves in offering a clean and comfortable environment for all of our guests and your praise tells us we're succeeding. Thank you again for sharing your review with us!  We can't wait to see you again soon for another amazing experience! Have a stellar day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: This place was overpriced for the quality of the TINY room, bathtub that was broken, no microwave, burnt heater, ragged carpet and a deck that I felt like was going to fall off! Naturally the view was perfect but the room was absolutely nothing special at all. Our room keys rarely worked (had to get new ones) and when engineering came to fix our bathtub troubles, they never fixed it! The water pressure was terrible in the shower and the parking fee of $34 a night is just too much! For the price I would just do a partial ocean view you get way more room but the alley way is nothing but noise all day and night. Also note that the restaurant called the driftwood was very $$$ also all of the room service was as well!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, katiejomcpherson.  We were disappointed to learn that the condition of our hotel did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that this is not the standard that we aspire to and we will share your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We hope you allow us the chance to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel super last minute thru hotel tonight and it exceeded my expectations! The room was quietly located right next to the pool and jacuzzi . The ocean view rooms are GORGEOUS. The bed was comfortable, the location is perfect, I walked just about everywhere. The staff was super helpful and friendly (thank you Javid and Jay!!!) I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here!
Manager Response: Thanks for the excellent review, Vanessa!  We're delighted your time with us was so outstanding as providing our guests with an excellent experience is very important to us. It's fantastic you appreciated our beautiful ocean views, great location and the excellent service from Javid and Jay. That's what we like to see! We look forward to your next visit with us and Happy Holidays from all of us at Pacific Edge Hotel.  Have an amazing day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: The ads for this place are very misleading. The photos show an elegant place but when you get into the room it is anything but.We were very disappointed with our stay here. the town of Laguna is wonderful but this hotel isn't.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Peter.  We're disappointed to hear that you were not completely satisfied with your experience with us. We are dedicated to providing our guests with quality service. It's unfortunate to know that you felt we could have done a better job, but we're confident that we can provide you with a more positive experience in the future.  We'd love to host you again and give you the wonderful experience we have become known for here.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Such better hotels in Laguna for the price point.
Summary: I booked to stay on a Wednesday night, off season. A king ocean view room was $325. plus $24 for overnight parking. For the price point I had an expectation of a nice cozy room. I got to my room and it looked nothing like the photos on the website. It was sad and dated with chipped furniture, a rusty old heating unit in the wall, an old plastic tub and across from the sink the wall was sticking out. The bed was hard and uncomfortable. I called reception and asked if they had a more updated room, possibly with a softer mattress? He said " You could play Goldie Locks and try beds in different rooms, but I can tell you they are all the same. In a perfect world, what would you like?" Me-In a perfect world I would like an updated room that looked like the photos on the website that I
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, nikitaseye.  It's unfortunate your stay in our hotel didn't exceed your expectations. We regret that you had with our furnishings and accommodations. We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address all of your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We had spent a few days in Venice Beach, and were lucky to be able to spend a fantastic afternoon in Laguna. What a difference! We spent the afternoon on the deck, overlooking the beach and having a delicious dinner and cocktails with an old friend.  The staff was on cue every moment and the setting was perfect.  The Kids enjoyed the beach and occasionally would stop by for a drink or snack and back to the sand.  The hotel was full of old charm and elegance. It looked like a lot of  fun, Our next trip to California will include a night or two at the Pacific Edge!
Manager Response: Thank you for the outstanding review, IMC!  We're delighted your experience with us was so wonderful! We strive to make all of our guests feel welcome and relaxed during their time with us. It's fantastic our team could accommodate your needs and assist you in any way possible. We aim to please and your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We look forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon! Have a lovely day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We picked this hotel on booking.com  The hotel was presented by several pictures.  One of them showed the fa√ßade of the building with balconies faced the sea, the others ‚Äì showed the room, and  then ‚Äòa room‚Äô from outside, having the balcony.  True, we did not read description under: after looking on two pictures available, we assumed that since room has the balcony, it faces the ocean.  Not sure why booking.com presents the hotel this way, but it is misleading.    But misrepresentation was only one problem. After we got the keys to our room ‚Äì there were rooms not only without the balconies, but without the open air. It had door right to the swimming pool with all the chlorine odor, and, of course, very noisy.  We demanded the change, and were given the same price rooms with the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback, Janet.  It's unfortunate to hear you weren't completely satisfied with your recent experience, as we strive to provide all of our guests with a wonderful experience from beginning to end. Please know your feedback regarding our different types of rooms, as well as the air conditioners will be addressed with the appropriate members of our team so we may improve for the future.  We hope you'll give us another chance to provide you with the quality experience we're truly capable of sharing with our guests.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: CJ and Brandon are awesome! First of all I checked in late, coming in from my Spartan Run (ie, Spartans are muddy and dusty after their runs lol). These two weren't "judgy" like most would be, instead I was treated as any other guest would have been. CJ and Brandon turned my trip around within a couple of minutes. Thank you both for the wonderful customer service!!! I will definitely be back next year üåû
Manager Response: We appreciate the outstanding review!  We're so glad that you chose to stay with us. It's wonderful to know that CJ and Brandon had such a positive impact on the quality of your experience. I'm so delighted to know that they went above and beyond and I hope you were able to rest after that grueling obstacle course. Thanks again for that wonderful review and we'll see you again next year. Have a beautiful day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Stayed 5 nights in the surf building with a balcony and ocean view.   Cons: Toilet did not function correctly (wouldn‚Äôt flush) for all 6 days, had to use the restroom at nearby restaurants. Called engineering over 3 times to fix toilet, they gave a quick 30 second plunge each time and claimed victory only to have the same condition return 2 flushes later.   Surf was loud at night during high tide. Building looks beaten up and a bit like the sea is eating away at the foundation. Rust and signs of salt water corrosion on balcony.   The room was dark and depressing with curtains shut and blindingly bright with curtains open. Insufficient lighting in room, wet and worn feel to the carpet, likely from past guests and ocean water. Maids didn‚Äôt come by to clean rooms until 4-5pm most
Manager Response: Dear Guest, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We were disappointed to learn about the issues you faced with the toilet in your room and that your room didn't exceed your expectations. Please be assured that this is not the standard that we aspire to and we will share your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We hope you allow us the chance to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Booked an last minute vacation over Thanksgiving week, after researching an endless number of hotels and vacation rentals - settled on Pacific Edge due to beach location and the good rate per night. The location is awesome, right on the beach and steps to shops and restaurants. The room was clean, albeit small, and had everything we needed. The only downside is the parking, with valet only and $34 a night - was an added and unexpected expense for our trip. Service has been great. The hotel provides towels and chairs for the beach. The beach is clean and not too rocky. I seriously love this place and can‚Äôt wait to come back.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review Meghan! I‚Äôm so glad you had a great time with us and we can‚Äôt wait for you to come back and stay with us again! We appreciate the feedback and happy holidays from all of us at Pacific Edge!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Overnight Stay on my way back to LA
Summary: Stayed here overnight on my way back to LA. There was a private party going on when we got here so check in and parking the car was a bit un co-ordinated to say the least. Once that was sorted out things were fine. The room was clean and in good condition however the plumbing left a lot to be desired as the toilet its-self had difficulty flushing. The coffee machine stopped working as well. People going about outside the room were noisy but I managed to sleep. You get what you pay for in these places as there a lot of families about as well being a beach front hotel. Nice to paddle in the Pacific though.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Derek.  We're happy you had a pleasant stay with us despite our services not exceeding your expectations. We'll address your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We do hope to host you again soon for a more positive experience.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We stayed in the Reef building and had a large balcony that was virtually overhanging the ocean. The view was breathtaking. The hotel itself is showing some age and the buildings are all separate so there‚Äôs some walking involved. The deck bar also has a great view. It‚Äôs not cheap, but the food and drinks we had were great.
Manager Response: Thank you for the stellar review, Sarah!  It's outstanding you had such a wonderful experience with us! We're delighted you enjoyed our excellent location with its stunning and breathtaking views. That's what we like to see! We can't wait to see you again soon so we can share those beautiful scenes with you once more!  Have a fantastic day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We booked a "Village" studio Suite.  The village facing suites are between a parking lot and an alley that is also the valet stand.  The noise is constant including delivery trucks and workman starting at 5 am.  Also the "kitchenette" in the room was not stocked with cooking tools or even glasses for water.  The whole place is very tired and the staff is unresponsive.  When we checked out I asked to speak with the manager, I was told he was in a meeting and that he would call me.  3 weeks have passed, no call.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, we appreciate your feedback.  We're disheartened that your time with us was less than ideal. We regret that our noise levels and amenities failed to meet your expectations. We will be sure to alert the appropriate members of our team to rectify these issues. We care deeply about our guests and want to provide the best service possible. Thank you for bringing these concerns to our attention.  We hope you give us another chance to host you soon so we can share a more positive experience.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Great hotel. great location!!  Desk staff very helpful and friendly.  View from the room was so good, we did room service more than we normally do so we could enjoy sitting on our balcony....  Room service was quick, delicious and great selections....
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review, Johnasmith_51!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your time with us so much! We're delighted you appreciate our convenient location with its stunning views. We love sharing our breathtaking sights with our guests and your praise lets us know we're succeeding! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Have a lovely day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: My wife and I came to Laguna for the weekend and stayed at the Pacific Edge Hotel. We had a great experience due in no small part to the special attention and courtesy given to us by the front desk. Brandon could not have been more helpful in assisting us. Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review, Geoff!  We're delighted to hear that you had an amazing experience with us! We appreciate your compliments regarding our hard-working team. We will make sure to pass on your kind words to Brandon! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another stellar experience!  Thank you again for sharing your review. Have a lovely day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We got a 2 bed queen in the reef tower with an ocean front balcony. The room was a little pricy, the hotel had a old motel vibe. I did not like the forced $34 valet parking but the staff was pretty awesome. The room was fine, a bit small. Very clean but the views OMG! I would definitely stay here again for the view alone! Absolutely beautiful beach!
Manager Response: Thanks for the glowing rating, racheld28!  We're delighted you had such a fantastic experience with us and that our staff was welcoming and accommodating! It's great to know we left you with a wonderful impression and that you enjoyed our stunning views. We look forward to hosting you again soon.  Have a lovely day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: The rooms are out dated and not fresh. If you bring luggage get a ground level room, it's a pain for the bell guys to get to the room and it was a hassle when leaving. There's no parking at all, you have to pay for parking and they put your car far away. The staff was ok. We stayed at The Ranch at Laguna and that is really awesome!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, Carl.  It's disheartening your stay with us was disappointing. We strive for quality so it's unfortunate that the condition of the rooms and parking didn't meet your expectations. We also regret that the helpfulness of our staff was less than ideal. We'll be sure to discuss your concerns moving forward.  We hope to host you again soon for a more positive experience.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: The entire staff was welcoming, cheerful, knowledgeable and helpful
Summary: Although this is an older hotel, it's clean and comfortable - our stay was very pleasant. the hotel is within walking distance of the main town of Laguna Beach - beach, shopping, lots of different art, restaurants, etc. We had beautiful weather which made it even more pleasant to walk around town or stroll on the beach. Lots of fun just people watching.
Manager Response: Thanks for the 4-star rating and review!  We're thrilled you had such a pleasant time with us! We strive to offer top-notch service and convenience for our guests. It's fantastic you enjoyed our convenient location and welcoming service so much. That's what we like to see!  We look forward to sharing an even better experience with you next time. Have a lovely day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, shame about the rooms
Summary: Stayed one night here. Hotel was in a fantastic location on the beach and staff very helpful. Stunning bar/restaurant open air overlooking the beach.  Now the negatives that would make it one star save for the above. Rooms smelt of foist, a service road runs between the basic rooms and the better and beachfront rooms. If you have a room at the front it will be really noisy being on the PCH.   The rooms are very old all round save for the bed and linen. A kitchenette on my ‚Äúupgraded‚Äù room that like the furniture, a/c walls, bathroom, etc were from the 80‚Äôs and the TV was one of the first LCD‚Äôs! The pool area was like a motel.   I hear they are having a $15 minion refurb now they have been taken over. This should then send it into a decent class of hotel. You will still need a
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Gavin.  Thanks for the great comments about the location, service of staff and the restaurants. We appreciate that you were able to enjoy some of the amenities, but I'm disappointed that we couldn't exceed your expectations. If you see yourself back in town, give us another chance. We'd love to host you again. Thanks again for the feedback. Until then.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Took my grandson for his birthday on October 31st. To the Pacific Edge Hotel. The front desk employees Brandon and Lauren were great. The room was clean. Yes the hotel is old but it you can overlook that. Our balcony was over the water.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review, Sandra!  We're thrilled you had such a fantastic stay in our hotel! It's excellent your room was refreshed properly and that you appreciated our comfortable and clean facilities. That's what we like to see! We strive for excellence and your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We look forward to seeing you again soon for another stellar experience! Have a beautiful day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We stayed one night as a stopover. The place is a rip off. You get conned into paying $30 for valet parking when you can park on the streets free until .8am and then charge you $15 for wifi, the use of the gym and pool whether you want it or not.  The accommodation was like staying on a rusty oil rig. The only good thing is the location right on the beach
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, big-bill3.  It's unfortunate your time with us was less than perfect. We don't con our guests and everything is stated when reserving your room. We don't have any hidden cost so I'm disappointed that you felt this way. Valet parking is not mandatory and if you wish to park in the street, please feel free to do so at your own risk. The streets are narrow so there are times when you'll have a missing side view mirror parking on the street. Again, it is an option and our guests are not forced to valet if they don't want to.  I'm sorry that this stay wasn't what you expected. If you change your mind, we'd be happy to have you return and experience a better stay next time. Thanks again for your feedback.  Best, Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Hotel it old and rooms are dated and musty.  I think very overpriced.  Beach is small and not very swimable, not family friendly especially for my 4 year old.  There is no parking with the hotel.  You have have to pay $35 a night to park which I find unbelieveable.  Considering what you pay for the room and the distinct shortage of parking in general.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, r6796g It's unfortunate your stay in our hotel didn't exceed your expectations. We regret that you had with our furnishings and accommodations. We care deeply about the happiness and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address all of your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: I truly enjoyed my stay here, the views from my balcony/room were fantastic and service from hotel staff was spot on. I also liked that the location was within waking distance of a grocery store, scuba rental shop, great restaurants and very close to the trolley stop. All in all a great experience and I can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you review, SherylR123.  We're thrilled you enjoyed the stellar views from our prime location. We agree that we have the best placement in the city and we love sharing it with our treasured guests. We can't wait to see you again soon for another amazing experience!  Have a fantastic day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Hotel staff were friendly  but the rooms leave ALOT to be desired for. Old old old. Smelly  rundown lack of any character just like an old apartment that smells. Just consider yourself warned people this place might be ocean front but it‚Äôs not swimmable especially for kids. Water very rough and it sits on a hill so it makes it very dangerous for the small ones to enjoy . The restaurant that is attached is busy all the time and the prices are inflated . Not a family friendly place to eat, menu is not for kids . And then there‚Äôs valet. They were nice and efficient but the fact you must go to them every time you need your car and the fact that they work on tips , after you already pay to park leaves you feeling like this place is a money pit. Even the few water bottles they have
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, maregibbs.  It's unfortunate that you didn't have a great stay. We happen to be very kid friendly with an amazing menu that's I believe comparable if not lower than the other options around town. The beach itself is very safe to swim in. It could be that you were there during high tide or surf that was just a little rough for that day, but I'm sorry that you weren't able to enjoy it. We appreciate your feedback and if you decide to change your mind, we look forward to having you back. Thank you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Great staff, great location, great views
Summary: The staff here is great and so friendly. Right on the ocean and in the heart of everything so you can just walk to great restaurants and art.  If you are traveling with children like us then just a walk down the beach from this hotel is what you need. You hit the main beach with a playground and then tide pools with some great wildlife. Overall great experience. The only thing that kept it from 5 stars is on this stay we were in a room facing the road. There was a light right above the window and though the curtains were pulled when you woke from the noise on the road it seemed like it was daylight out.  Just moving that light would make a big difference.  The road is very loud too. We didn't have this last stay when we were on the lower building. The other item is the cost of
Manager Response: Thanks for the amazing review, Megan!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your time with us so much! We're delighted you appreciate our convenient location with its stunning views as well as our helpful staff. We love sharing our breathtaking sights with our guests and your praise lets us know we're succeeding! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another excellent experience!  Have a lovely day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Too many positives to mention! The location, service, beach, view‚Äîit was all amazing! This was the perfect place for us to start our California adventure. Our family spent three nights/ four days here before heading to Disneyland. This was the perfect place for us to relax, get adjusted to the time change, and soak in the beach. Pacific Edge exceeded our expectations and left us dreaming of a return trip. My only negative experience was that they overbooked the weekend of our stay and we ended up having to stay two nights in one room, and moving our last night to a different room. They moved all our bags for us, but it was a little inconvenient. Other than that, every part of our trip was incredible‚Äîwe will be back!
Manager Response: Thanks for the excellent review, Christian!  We're delighted your time with us was so outstanding as providing our guests with an excellent experience is very important to us. It's fantastic you appreciated our location and friendly service as well as our amazing views. That's what we like to see! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another stellar experience.  Have an amazing day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We would like to thank the entire team for their kindness and customer service during our stay. CJ we can‚Äôt thank you enough for totally making our two night stay PERFECT! CJs team, Zach, Lauren, Lauren L, Linea, James, Brandon, and anyone we might have not met. You all made it a very comfortable stay.  The room was clean and the hotel was tidy. Valet parking options for a fee or street parking is free. It‚Äôs right off the beach and you can‚Äôt get better than this and at a reasonable price. This is a memory we will we never forget because we got engaged on the balcony at our room with a gorgeous Sunset and Ocean view we will remember and cherish for a lifetime!!! Thank you Pacific Edge Hotel Staff.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing the excellent review with us, Krystal!  We're so glad that you had an exceptional experience with us from beginning to end. It's wonderful to know that our staff treated you so well and made you feel welcome throughout the entirety of your time with us. We're also delighted that you enjoyed the beautiful views from your guest room. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Have a lovely day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Don't come here unless you want to party. My fiance and I are staying in an oceanfront room and the deck rooms below us are blasting music. They're loud and drunk. I called front desk and they informed us that there's nothing they can do because the deck rooks come with bluetooth speakers. The music is so loud that we can't even open the sliding door to listen to the ocean, which was the point of renting an oceanfront room in the first place. Save your money. Go somewhere else.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, lastnametea.  It's unfortunate your time with us was less than ideal. We're disappointed you had such challenges with the sound insulation in our rooms. The satisfaction of our guests is important to us so we'll be sure to discuss your feedback moving forward.  We hope for the chance to host you again soon so we can share a more positive experience with you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: They gave us a free upgrade to an Oceanfront room with a King bed! The room views were absolutely incredible and there was a heater on the balcony so it kept it nice and warm for you to sit on the balcony and enjoy the sunset and the sound of the waves crashing! The hotel was clean and cozy and the view was incredible. Also room service food is from the Driftwood kitchen next door and the breakfast was absolutely amazing! I will definitely be back for more celebrations! Great location in the downtown area as well!
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review!  We're delighted your time in our hotel was so fantastic! We care deeply about the happiness of our guests so it's amazing we could share our beautiful views with you. We aim to please and your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We look forward to seeing you again soon for another stellar experience! Have a lovely day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: You can't get a better location. It's not a 5 star resort but it has a 5 star location. Clean and friendly. Perfect for a long weekend. I have stayed here many of times and never have been disappointed.
Manager Response: Thanks for the wonderful review, jscsmc!  It's fantastic you had such a lovely experience with us. We're thrilled you enjoyed our prime location and proximity to so many of the city's best attractions. That's what we like to see! We're looking forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon!  Have a beautiful day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We visited on a recommendation from a friend. The location is really amazing you are perched above the beach looking out over the Pacific.  The bar served really good food. We had some tuna and squid. Both really fresh.  The room was well priced clean and comfortable, a little tired but we got it at a good rate. We were looking over the main road but the noise was ok.  I have only given it three stars because the noise from the interconnecting room was ridiculous. We could hear there conversations as I am sure they could with ours. Conversations are one thing but when they were being extremely amorous (read between the sheets) for the third time at 3 in the morning it gets a little dull. There wasn‚Äôt anything left to the imagination. They had a brilliant night. And so did I when
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, drobo12000.  We regret the problems you had with the sound levels in the rooms and that your stay didn't exceed your expectations.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: It was good in the past and has gone down hill ever since. The prices have tripled as the rooms are dirty and doors and locks and lights don‚Äôt work. Pay a lot for the room with torn curtains and a main building is now condemned. Don‚Äôt stay here. There are plenty of other places in Laguna Beach
Manager Response: Bob S, thank you for sharing your experience.  I can certainly see how frustrating it may be to check into your room and have something so simple as a working light or door lock not functioning.  It sounds like you are a frequent guest to the Pacific Edge Hotel and we appreciate your patronage and loyalty. I can assure you we can do better. We pride ourselves in making sure all items in the room are in great working condition and the cleanliness is top notch but it sound like we missed the mark in a couple of areas during your stay. My apologies for not having the room properly inspected prior to your check in.  I truly do hope you give us another opportunity to show you the dedication we have in creating a positive and memorable guest experience.  Victor Gonzalez Director of Rooms

Summary: My husband and I stopped here for 2 nights as part of our honeymoon road trip and it was amazing and we didn't want to leave!!   We got there and found out we had been upgraded to the suite and were given a bottle of champagne! :) The room was amazing! And over looked the sea, we also got there just in time for the sun set! Laguna Beach has the  best sun sets I have ever seen, it was so beautiful!  The hotel is also very close to bars and restaurants and even has its own places to eat with a balcony that over looks the sea!  They have two pools and a Jacuzzi! And the staff were amazing!  I would 100% stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review, Marie!  Thank you for spending a portion of your honeymoon with us! It's outstanding you enjoyed your time with us so much! We strive for excellence so we're delighted you received and appreciated an upgrade to celebrate your recent marriage with us here at Pacific Edge Hotel. It's important to us that our guests feel welcome and valued.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for another amazing experience and even more breathe-taking sunsets! Have a fantastic day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Okay hotel. Fantastic location. Right in the middle of everything. The have also a fantastic terrasse ocean front with good food and drinks. Reasonable rates. Room with nice terrasse and parsly oceanview. We love this location. Walk right on the beach, restaurants and shops right there. Fantastic.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic rating, Susan!  We're delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We pride ourselves on providing exceptional service to our guests at all times so it's very pleasing to hear that we were able to accommodate you during your stay. We look forward to hosting you again in the future!  Thank you again for taking the time to share your review. Have a wonderful day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We arrived on Saturday morning to be told that there was no room available for us at that time so "come back later" and we will check you in then, later that day we eventually got our room, when booking this hotel we asked for a beach view, which we didn't get instead we got a pool facing room with a bin outside our door. We had a door to get into the room next to us which everyone that stayed in there tried there best to open. There was no safe in the room for our valuables.  The bathroom was ok except every time I used the shower it felt like the bottom of the bath was going to fall out. The room itself was clean, bed was comfy. I did notice that there was dirty plates left for 2 days outside of our room round the bin. The guys that ran the valet were brilliant with us they
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this feedback, Laura.  We are always working very hard to provide the best experiences for all of our guests. It's unfortunate to see that we could have done more for you during your stay. Our oceanfront rooms are usually sold out during the weekends due to the amazing weather we have year round. If you see yourself back, I would definitely recommend booking an oceanfront room. Thank you for your kind words about valet. We would love an opportunity to host you again if you're back in the states. We look forward to that chance. Thank you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Overpriced with no appreciation for guests
Summary: I am so disappointed. The only positive aspect of this hotel is the beach access, which is not unique to Pacific Edge in Laguna Beach. The most disappointing part of Pacific Edge is their complete lack of apprecation for loyal customers. My mother and I have been staying at this hotel 1-3 times per year for almost a decade. During the initial years of our patronage, the staff was friendly and we felt appreciated. On special occasions and when the hotel was at low occupancy, we'd be offered partial-beach view rooms or exta amentities. And for that kindness, we ignored how crappy this hotel really is.  The hotel has only deteriorated in value and asthetics over the last few years. Though I tried to talk my mother into trying a different hotel this year to celebrate her 60th
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to give us feedback, Nicole.  Our staff takes a lot of pride in the one of kind service we provide. It's very disappointing to see your experience with us was not the standard we're accustomed to sharing. We always strive to exceed all of the needs of our guests. We'll be sure to address your concerns internally and we would love to show you how hard we work to give our guests the best service in the future.  We hope to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: I decided to spend my birthday weekend at the beach. No better place than Pacific Edge Hotel.  Great hotel right on the water.  I'm sitting on my balcony listening to the waves as I write this. Great staff,great service, Great location.  We are repeat customers and will continue to return.
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review, Tammy!  It's fantastic you had such an excellent experience with us and that our team took such great care of you. Our team will love to hear they made such a wonderful impression on you.  We look forward to hosting you again soon so we can share another amazing experience with you. Have a beautiful day and HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Check in went smoothly and staff were nice. Our ocean front, Reef building, 2 queen room was on the beach with spectacular views. At first, I was worried after walking down 2 floors down a dingy, poorly lit stairwell. The room was light and bright with surfer, beach chic vibe. The bathroom is quite small but serviceable. The door to bath around handle was dirty as was the small table next to lounger(fingerprints, smudged from use). Once I cleaned with a towel and soap I could relax. The bed was comfortable with nice white linens. Pillows aplenty but flat. The chairs on balcony comfortable but our balcony had a small table with raw fiberboard edging. Down on the beach, service by the beach attendants was excellent. Enjoyed the loungers with terry cover, towels and umbrella.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your feedback. We're glad to hear you enjoyed our prime location and top-notch service. We truly value your feedback. We look forward to hosting you again next time you're in town.  Thank you for taking the time to share, have a great day.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Expanded but still needing some improvement
Summary: The hotel has expanded into multiple buildings, with some on PCH and others more towards the water. Thus, what you think you are booking and what you are actually booking may not in the end be the same. The newer building is towards the ocean with a pool immediately next to the ground floor. It is a bit of a labyrinth to get around the complex, as you are traveling between multiple buildings. The room is OK, but for the price, I would have hoped for more. It is essentially a cheap beach hotel room, but at ritzy beach prices. The rooms away from the road are quieter. There is a slightly musty-smell, but probably to be expected at the beach. The parking is valet only, and be prepared for a shock. I didn't even ask about in and out priviledges, because whenever it is valet, you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this feedback, Lester.  We are always working as hard as we can to provide the best stays for our guests. We regret to hear about your experience. We will share all of your concerns with our team moving forward. We hope you plan on staying with us again soon. We'd love to improve your opinion of us.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Scam, charge $2K in unauthorized charges after I already paid for the room
Summary: Thieves, scam, con artists who need investigating. I Purchased a Groupon....that was huge mistake. When I arrived to the hotel, no one offered to assist me with my luggage and I was provided a room without a working door. So then after having to make a huge fuss and exert my energy (after driving 9 hours from NorCal) trying to convince the front desk that a dingy room without a working was not pictured when I booked. When I finally convince the guy that people need working friggin door, I was finally moved to another room.  It looked fine from the surface but made me itch after 30 minutes. The shower was abominable, all the furnishing were old and cheap, the beds are horrible...the room disgusting to say the least. Then, the next morning, after hearing a bunch of deflecting each
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback, Amanda.  We're sorry to hear that you had so many challenges, but we know that your concerns were addressed during your stay and our staff went above and beyond to make your stay as comfortable as possible. If you have any further questions or feedback, please feel free to contact me directly. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your reply and hopefully, a return visit.  Thank you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We were frequent visitors to this hotel before it was transformed into the current "Pacific Edge". Back in the early 2000's, it was ..very basic but super inexpensive. We decided to return for our anniversary to the room we previously loved. Honestly, it is absolutely the same- only now has a cool paint job and nicer furnishings/decor. The same little bathroom, open closet, sliding doors....frankly, for us, it wasn't worth the big price tag. There is always something to be said for listening to the waves crash below you though, or sunset from your balcony.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and for spending your anniversary with us. I'm glad that the location and room was to your liking, but disappointed that we couldn't make it an overall great experience due to the price. I hope we were able to give you a great service experience as well and hope that you keep us in mind for future visits. Thank you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Booked from 9/3/17-9/10/17  First of all, I booked the room at the hotel which was a bad move as it took 1 hour to Book. not sure what he was doing as it was not busy. He did answer a few calls, but still.  Should of booked online!!!  We were staying an extra week cause of my work, we stayed at the Laguna beach house originally, but they were fully booked  so had to move hotels.  As it was labour day weekend  most hotels were fully booked. we booked the only available room at the Pacific edge  for the Sunday which was a city view and for the rest of our stay we moved to a beach front room.  The city view room was the worst room I have ever stayed in, the carpet was disgusting, shower doesn't work properly, no kitchen utensils, no netting for the windows, looks like a quick pop
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, Andras.  I'm sorry that your entire experience wasn't a great one. It seems like you had booked a couple reservations with the final 6 days reserved in the waterfront king room. I'm glad that you got to experience what it's like to be so close to the water and have the waves put you to sleep. I must apologize for the confusion with the restaurant and charging to the room. I will work with the team in rectifying these inconsistent communication. When it comes to the beach chairs, we are set on a public beach and we want to make sure that we have these amenities for our guests only so it makes it hard for us to preset these beach amenities. In regards to the seaweed, the city usually tries to clears them off the beach, but unfortunately, the tides dictate when they can be cleared. During the 3 days of when we had the seaweed, the tides were high and were not accessible with the tractor. I also wanted to thank you for the outstanding service comment about Linnea and our security officer. I'll make sure to share your comments with them. Thank you again for your feedback and I really do hope to see you again. Thank you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Great place to hang with friends and family. Room are pretty reasonable for downtown Laguna location. Walk to everything from here. Great bars and restaurants in the hotel complex too. Be sure to have a drink at The Deck!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent rating, Michael!  It's fantastic to hear you enjoyed your stay with us so much! We're delighted we could accommodate you during your stay and that we left you with a wonderful impression. Your praise for our hotel is much appreciated! Thank you for taking the time to share.  We look forward to hosting you again soon! Have a great day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Pacific Edge hotel is beach front hotel located about  1/2 mile  from main beach and downtown Laguna beach .It is a pet friendly  hotel .which is both  good and bad.It has 2 pools and 2 restaurants  attached to it .Rooms are  nice beds are a little uncomfortable  and the pillows are a little flat.it has a $50 a day resort fee which includes  $34 a day valet parking  regardless if you take out or not. In my case my car never moved in the 3 days I was there and was charged $100 separate from my room charge.When you stay at the Pacific edge hotel .you are paying  for the beach front  location  which is nice and nothing  else .Heed my mistake and think twice before booking  here. Jason
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate your feedback. We're glad you appreciated our beach front location, but we're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. Parking in Laguna Beach is very limited and our parking rates are comparable to our neighboring hotels. Street parking is an option but comes at a cost per hour. I'm sorry we couldn't exceed your expectations this time. We hope to have you stay with us again so we can share a more positive experience with you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Great place to watch the sun go down. The rooms are of average quality, the beds are small, set up more like a motel. But reasonably priced and Fairly clean. The food experience was ok for dinner. Only stayed one night.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback, Sand.  While it's great you enjoyed watching the sunset from our hotel, we regret that our accommodations and beds didn't exceed your expectations. Additionally, we're disappointed that your dining experience was anything less than perfect. We hold ourselves to a higher standard so we'll be sure to discuss your feedback with our team moving forward.  We look forward to hosting you again soon for a more positive experience.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We booked to stay at this hotel via a UK travel agent.  Fortunately for us, we'd booked 'premium' rooms with ocean views.  I dread to think what the other rooms were like if our rooms were premium.  Firstly, the staff were really helpful and the location is great.  The views from our rooms were fantastic.  However, the beds weren't very comfortable, the decor was tired, the bathroom didn't feel very clean, there were stains on the carpet etc.  Glad we only stayed for one night.  Perfect location for the beach, views were magnificent.  Such a shame that the room felt like motel standard, so glad we booked 'premium rooms' although they didn't feel it.  Given three stars due to views from Ocean views rooms.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Wendy.  While we're happy you appreciated our prime location and stunning views, it's unfortunate our bedding and accommodations didn't meet your expectations. We regret your challenges and inconvenience so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: The hotel occupies a premium position in  Laguna Beach. The Pacific Edge is actually a collection of buildings cobbled together around the Driftwood restaurant.  The direct sea view / beachfront  buildings are well presented and exploited by the beautifully crafted hotel website, as is the not inexpensive but remarkably popular Driftwood Restaurant.  However a significant portion of the collective is not beachfront and is wedged between the highway and the "Sleepy Hollow Lane " sounds charming but is effectively a valet parking area and delivery zone for the Driftwood.   This area, called "the Bahia village"  opens directly onto the front car park or via the balcony,  overlooks Sleepy Hollow Lane and  gives immediate access to: A)The delivery lorries that can physically be
Manager Response: Plavi98,  Thank you for taking the time to give us so much feedback and how detailed you were. I'm happy to hear that we were able to impress you in some ways, but disappointed that we weren't able to make it an overall great stay. Give us a call next time and we'll make sure that your room is on an upper floor so that you're not disturbed by some of the noise that you mentioned. Thank you again for your detailed feedback and I look forward to your return visit.  Thank you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We reserved a partial view suites for 3 nights. The room we were given was not at all as described online in print and pictures! When I inquired I was told this is the correct room. Since I was traveling with my sister the sofa bed and separate bedroom were important as described online. Well, the sofa bed was unusable and it was all open with no privacy. Additionally the room was dirty and the kitchen has no inventory so was useless. 3 requests for glasses and bedding, yet still never got pillows or glasses. We checked out after one night in this disaster. Do not stay here. Pay more or stay in a different city. Super expensive for one of the worst rooms I've ever stayed in!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, Brian.  We were disappointed to learn that the condition of our hotel did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that this is not the standard that we aspire to and we will share your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We hope you allow us the chance to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: Hey! I have stayed there for 2 nights. I have made my reservation, originally to a room not sering the ocean. However, I have upgraded my room for a very convenient price. In addition they have given me a bottle of white wine with my upgrade! The way to the beqch from the room was not so well taken care of but in the end, I have enjoyed the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for the great review. We're happy you enjoyed your experience with us! The happiness and satisfaction of our guests is important to us and we endeavor to offer quality comfort and service for our guests. It's fantastic you appreciated our excellent services and your upgrade so much. That's what we like to see!  We look forward to sharing an even better experience with you soon! Have a lovely day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: my felow trip advisors , stay away from this hotel !!!!even if they offer it for free!!!! you will know once you try it and it does not worth it ! by far the WORST vacation in my entire life.stay away !!!! you are better off sleep in your car than stay in this motel !!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. Your experience is not up to the quality and standard we usually provide for our guests. It's unfortunate we failed to exceed your expectations. We hold ourselves to a much higher caliber of service so we'll be sure to discuss your concerns moving forward.  We do hope you allow us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: At monday august 14th we arrived. First impression was OK; friendly staff. The room (17) looked OK when we came in. At night it became clear that the beds were the worst we've ever had. Matresses should be renewed! After one hour in our bed, we went to the reception and asked for a roll away bed.They told us ik will be there very soon and that they would talk to us next morning to find a solution. Within 15 minutes the roll away bed was brought to our room.  The next morning we heard nothing... at 1 pm we decided to call to an other hotel (where we should stay a day later), At 2 pm we packed the car and went to the reception that we we're leaving. The lady at the desk was surprised about our story, her colleague hadn't told her about the situation. She said that she will contact
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Richard.  I'm sorry that the mattress was not to your liking. We would have flipped the mattress for you to see if there was an improvement. I'm sorry that it was too soft for you. Thank you for the kind words about the staff. We're constantly looking at our operations and what we can improve on and we will make sure that we are communicating better in the future. I appreciate your feedback and your time. I hope your time in Laguna Beach was pleasant and had a great holiday. Thank you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for our honeymoon a couple of weeks back. We opted to stay in an oceanfront room. It was quite expensive but we wanted the proper honeymoon experience.  On arrival we were delighted with the view from our room as well as the food we ordered via room service. The air con wasn't working but we didn't raise it as we were quite jet lagged and stepped comfortably regardless.  Unfortunately the day after the food from the night before had not been collected so I rang reception. I had to ring every day of our stay to get the room service tray collected as it wasn't starting to stink but it remained there all week until I delivered the tray to reception myself.  We contacted reception about the air con and they sent a fan up. Unfortunately it was very loud and
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Conor.  We're deeply disappointed that we couldn't provide you with a better anniversary experience. We regret that our service didn't meet your expectations. Your experience is not on par with the standard we're capable of providing our guests so we'll be addressing your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We hope you give us another opportunity to demonstrate the high-caliber service we're capable of sharing with our guests. Thank you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Well at least the view was great........
Summary: We have stayed here before...it used to be a part of the Joie de Vive Hotel chain....we had our friends stay here in the past, taken our family here, etc....It seems the place was way better cared for back then. The prices here are insane for the room you get. Motel 6 hotel (with a great view) for Ritz Carlton prices.   The views ARE GREAT! Also most of the staff is wonderful!! That is where the good part ends.  We arrived in our room and noticed some sand on the floor, kinda gross. We then found a dirty wash cloth on the top shelf of the closet as we were unpacking. Ugh.  We got unpacked and went out for a while and around 11 pm when we get back to the room AND decided to take showers. Ummm, there was no shower curtain on our bath tub so we had to call down to ask them to put
Manager Response: Dear Ms. LDRM,  I appreciate your feedback and I'm disappointed that you had to experience these challenges during your 4 night stay. The lack of cleanliness that you experienced is not indicative of the level of service that is considered normal to us. My apologies for the cleanliness and for the lack of responsiveness that you received. I will definitely address the team regarding your comments and make sure it's resolved moving forward. If you would like to speak with me personally regarding your experience, please feel free to contact me at the hotel. I welcome your insight and your experience. Thank you.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful! I can‚Äôt wait to come back!
Summary: They say that a company is only as good as its customer service. Well, if that is the case than the Pacific Edge Hotel is as good as it gets. Last week, my wife and I went down to Laguna Beach for a relaxing weekend getaway and we had the best time! Our entire experience was first rate. The biggest reason for that is because of the service received courtesy of Javid and the staff. I stayed at this hotel several years back and didn‚Äôt have a very good experience. But after giving the hotel another try, I can honestly say that I can‚Äôt wait to come back! For starters, we were able to check-in early and the top floor room was spacious with all the amenities you'd want! The balcony outside our room provided the best seat in the house with a breathtaking view of the beach. The hotel
Manager Response: Dear Ninortiz,  Thank you for the amazing review! It's excellent your time with us was so fantastic! We're thrilled you enjoyed our rooms and amenities and that our team took such wonderful care of you. Javid is a superstar so it's not surprising you felt so welcome and comfortable. That's what we like to see! We're delighted we were able to provide you with such a memorable experience and we can't wait to welcome you back soon. Have a great day!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: I gave this place 3 stars because we definitely paid for the view. The room was upwards of $600/night then add $50 for dog $38/ valet and $15 resort fee $700/night. The room looked like a Motel 6. Very modest decor. Loud wall air conditioner. The grounds leave much to be desired. If this hotel was not on the Ocean it would be $89/ night or empty. The location is incredible and they are pet friendly. It seems as if they know what they have with the location so they don't try too hard. For price next time I will go for an Air BNB or VRBO. Although they are pet friendly you can take the dog on the beach before 9am or after 6 p m. The restaurant do not allow dogs as far as we now. The front desk let someone cut right in front of me. The valet was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, Cherie.  We're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. It's unfortunate our rooms and quality of our accommodations failed to meet your expectations. We care about the comfort of our guests so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We hope for the opportunity to host you again soon for a more positive experience.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: So we call Friday morning August 11 to book weekends in  Pacific edge hotel in Laguna Beach for our 17 years anniversary we go there every summer So we called  The same number we always call to book  and a lady answered the phone and she made it sound so easy and booked the weekend that we want in Pacific edge hotel in Laguna Beach and I got ready all excited went to work came home start looking at my email  guess what she booked us in and Pacific Hotel inHonolulu Hawaii When I clearly told her we live in San Diego and we're driving next day to Laguna Beach so I called Pacific edge in Laguna Beach who is part of this hotel it's one of their hotel and they told me they can't do nothing about it and they didn't even want to help me in anyway  The first person told me that's
Manager Response: Nicole,  I'm so sorry that you even had to go through that process. Our centralized reservation center really messed up and I'm sorry that you didn't get a chance to celebrate your anniversary with us again. We would have loved to have you stay with us, but it seems like it was already sold out for the dates you wanted. Call me the next time you want to stay t Pacific Edge Hotel. I'll make sure to personally take care of your reservation so there's no mix up next time. We want you to be in Laguna, not Hawaii. Thanks again for your feedback.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We booked 3 nights at this Hotel 1st Aug - 4th Aug 2017. It was 2 adults and 2 children aged 2 and 11months. This was the end of our 2 week stay in the USA and meant to be our relaxing time. We paid a lot of money to have nice accommodation as we were planning on spending a lot of time there. Unfortunately it actually turned out to be the most expensive accommodation we have ever paid for and the worst. Before we arrived we read some bad reviews about this hotel (the village suites) and we realised that this is what we were in. We rang to see if there were any oceanfront rooms available as one person suggested. We decided to pay for this upgrade. The hotel is very run down, it has the ugliest and cheapest d√©cor and while it looked clean, our 11 month old pants were black from
Manager Response: Dear Kstead2017,  Thank you for your feedback. We're disappointed to hear that you were not completely satisfied with your experience with us and had to end your holiday in such a manner. We're here to make great experiences and I'm so sorry that this wasn't the case. If you see yourself back in the states for another visit, please don't hesitate to contact me directly. I can personally oversee your reservation back in Laguna Beach and make sure that you come back and leave with a great impression. Thank you for your time and your feedback. I look forward to hearing from you in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: I just stayed at Pacific Edge this past weekend , Friday to Monday and I want to thank all the staff I came in contact with . Our room for the first two nights was a deluxe village room , it had a partial ocean view but mostly looked out over the alley . The room was clean and spacious enough , the hotel was gracious enough to upgrade us to an Ocean front room for free on Sunday night to make the last night of our anniversary celebration extra special. The ocean front rooms are really spectacular , sleeping with the slider door open , falling asleep to the awesome sound of waves crashing right below you . The front desk, valet, beach staff and all the staff at The Deck and Driftwood were fantastic. Food and drinks were great at both places with an amazing view .I had read quite
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing the excellent review with us, Kenny!  We're so glad that you had an exceptional experience with us from beginning to end. It's wonderful to know that our staff treated you so well and made you feel welcome throughout the entirety of your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Have a great day.  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary: We recently stayed at Pacific Edge (1 Adult, 2 teens).  Booked via a 3rd party two weeks before and flew in to LAX arriving at hotel around 8pm.  Upon arrival, CJ the Hotel Manager advised us that the Hotel was sold out and the 3rd party reservation had not been validated or sent to them on time.  CJ was trying to reach them and us to no avail, as our email was not included by the booking agent, only an email link to their own system - which was not working!  We were never advised by the agency and we were enroute so no access to emails  However, CJ knew this would be a problem and that we would arrive late and likely tired from out trip.  So before we got there, CJ arranged for us to stay at a nearby hotel for FREE that night and then CJ told us they would honour our booking
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review!  We are very pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable experience with us! ¬†We appreciate your praise for our team; they work very hard to ensure every guest feels right at home. ¬†We are delighted you felt welcomed and valued during your time with us!¬†  We'd love to share another¬†positive experience with you in the future! ¬† Have a beautiful day, and thanks again for sharing!  Alex Yi General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic Hotel if you get the right room...
Summary: We visited Laguna beach and stayed at this hotel as part of our 28 day road trip from Seattle to San Diego via the PCH (Pacific Coast Highway).   Ok let me keep this simple this is a spectacular hotel if it get the right room which for us ended up being a ocean front beautiful room where the waves pretty much come under neath you and the views are out of this world it was truly AMAZING.   Now initially we had a Normal room which was in the building by the reception & road as the hotel is split into two buildings one by the beach and one behind it (You need to be in the one by the beach big time even if it costs you more).
