Summary: We've been coming to Laguna Beach for about 12 years now to see the Pageant of the Masters, to enjoy the food, the boutiques, and most of all the ocean. We've tried at least 7 of the hotels, but for the location to the surf sights & sounds, and shops/restaurants, and a bit more affordability than the Surf & Sand, also a perfect location for ocean views & sounds, we keep returning here to Pacific Edge. It has almost all of the basic needs including air conditioning, private patios, lounge chairs, umbrellas, towels, toys, etc. What I've found it doesn't have, and I wish it did, is a safe to put valuables, and a safety bar so that we may leave the sliding glass door ajar all night long to hear the waves that lull us to sleep. Both of which amenities are found at the Surf & Sand,
Manager Response: Michelle, believe me -- it's always an absolute pleasure to welcome you back. Thank you so much for your continued support and I'm glad that you were able to escape the Las Vegas heat to visit us again.  I hope you had an amazing time at the Pageant of the Masters and most importantly, we were able to make you feel at home.  Thank you for the great feedback and I look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another pleasant, well-deserved break.   Warmest regards, Alex Yi, Assistant General Manager

Summary: Having read some not too good reviews about this hotel, particularly the dated Village rooms, we decided at the last moment to phone ahead for an upgrade.  It was well worth it.  Although the only room available was an apartment with a partial sea view, the partial view was enough.  The apartment was spacious and comfortable enough for 4 people (2 adults and 2 teenagers), the decor was clean and modern, and the kitchenette adequate (it could have done with a kettle).  Some noise was present from the Valet parking for the attached restaurant, but this died down after 10pm, and road noise was minimal.  What did make the stay great was the staff.  They were always pleasant, helpful and knowledgeable.  We got some good advice on where to look for surf lessons from the lady we
Manager Response: I'm so glad you ended up upgrading, and enjoying such a wonderful stay with us -- it sure was a pleasure to have you! You deserved that wonderful service, and I certainly hope I'll be getting the chance to welcome you back, and show you an even better experience. Thank you so much for your valuable feedback, as well as your kind appreciation of what we do.   Best regards, Alex Yi, Assistant General Manager

Summary: I got in kind of late. Imagine my surprise and joy to find two friendly staff members, Stacie and Javid, ready and willing to help! They were awesome in every sense of the word. They anticipated my needs, clearly explained how to get to my room, and did it all with a smile. Definitely made my visit. Can't wait to stay again!
Manager Response: Justin, believe me when I say it was a pleasure to have you stay with us. I'll be sure to let Stacie and Javid know just how much you appreciated their service -- thank you so much for your kind, appreciative words.   Hope to welcome you back one day,  Alex Yi Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Pacific Edge in Laguna beach :) Javid
Summary: We were visiting for a sisters vacation and booked at  Marriott :(. Reservation was all messed up. Called Pacific Edge in Laguna Beach and was assisted by Javid. Not only did he save our trip but he was super nice and accommodating. He helped build a memory that will last forever. Javid went above and beyond for us. Will definitely be back and will refer people. Thank you sooooo much Javid :)  you guys are AWESOME!!
Manager Response: I am absolutely thrilled Javid could help you get your trip back on track, Peg! I will certainly let him know how much you appreciated all he did, and I'm confident he'll be just as pleased as I am to hear it. Can't wait to see you next time you visit Laguna Beach!  All the best,  Alex Yi Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Vacation and Home away from Home
Summary: I visited the Orange County area regularly over the past 2 years and made The Pacific Edge Hotel my regular home away from home. It is a unique piece of the past brought up to date.  It was convenient to my work locations and when the work day was done it was like I was on a Vacation.   The location is great.   It is right on the beach.   Great Sunset views.   Dozens of restaurants within walking distance as well as two great dining options at the Hotel.   The Front Desk staff always greeted me by name and were very accommodating.   The Valet team is friendly and always had my car brought up quickly.  Finally, the staff members at The Deck and The Driftwood restaurants are great and treated me like family.   I am no longer working in that area but I will Vacation at the Pacific
Manager Response: I'm so glad we could make you feel at home here, Vic! It means a lot to us that you've enjoyed spending so much time here, and we're happy we could provide a convenient home-base for you to work from while in Laguna Beach. We can't wait to see you for a real vacation soon!  All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Truly could not have asked for a better stay in Laguna Beach. The staff is beyond helpful, even before we arrived. We had an ocean front suite in the Surf wing. The views are to die for. The room itself was modern and super cute, and very clean. Location is perfect as everything you need is within close walking distance (groceries, shops, restaurants, etc). We are missing Laguna already! After 12 days of staying SoCal, in various cities, from SF to SD, Pacific Edge tops every place we've stayed in so far.
Manager Response: I cannot tell you how incredibly gratifying it is to know we were able to make you feel so welcome, Amy. It's our pleasure to make your vacations as wonderful as we can, and I'm so happy our team did that for you. It sounds like you had quite an adventure touring SoCal, and I'm glad we managed to be a memorable stop along the way. Hope we'll have the opportunity to host you in Laguna Beach again sometime!   All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Birthday Weekend celebration for my wife and son...could not pick a better spot to celebrate. Amazing ocean views...sunsets that you want to take 100 pictures of and everything so close to walk to .amazing places to eat and hang out at. The Deck resteraunt on property is a must!!  You will not encounter a better ..friendly staff that makes you feel very special during your stay !!
Manager Response: It's such an honor to help you guys celebrate, Jeff! We're thrilled we could host your family this time, and I'm even more excited you all had such an amazing and relaxing time here. Hope we'll see you again sometime!  Best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Love the hotel and staff was great! I would stay again. Close to all the restaurants and bars. We live local but wanted to do a quick bday beach get away. It was perfect! I would recommend eating at the hotel restaurant The Deck. Room had amazing view of the water. We rented the beach bungalow during day and played on the beach and had a great dinner that night. All around a great stay.
Manager Response: I'm so happy you decided to celebrate with us! It's phenomenal to hear our team was able to make your birthday beach trip even more enjoyable and I hope you'll spend it with us again next year!  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My family and I reserved two apartments, with two rooms in each unit, for a long weekend and made these reservations 8 months or so in advance.  Upon arrival, the staff was great, and we thought that the location was very good and were looking forward to our rooms until we opened the door.  What we viewed were lodgings that were dated back to the 60's or so in terms of furniture, lighting and colors on the walls that had not seen new paint in more than 20+ years.  The carpet in the rooms were filthy(my 3 year old twin grandsons had black feet from walking barefoot on them) the balcony doors didn't slide very well until I soaped the tracks, I had to call the front desk for pots and pans.  Needless to say, I and the rest of my family weren't happy at all with these type of
Manager Response: As happy as I am our staff could make you feel welcome, I'm so sorry you were disappointed with your rooms, Ed. We always want to make sure every aspect of your stay is phenomenal, and it's obvious we had some room for improvement this time. That said, we are doing some work to upgrade some of our rooms, and I hope you'll be willing to come see us again once that's done. I know we can show you a better time, and we look forward to that opportunity.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Definitely worth upgrading to the sea view
Summary: So for room layout / amenities this should only really be a 3 out of 5 but the location with waves lapping under your balcony makes it a 4 out of 5 easily.Location is great, the view is fantastic but room itself is a bit tired and in need of a refresh. It was Father's Day when we were there so very busy. We ate at The White House and Nicks whilst we were there - both very different but both fab.
Manager Response: I'm so happy you chose to celebrate Father's Day with us, Sue! It's a joy to know you were able to relax while you were here, too. We are in the process of upgrading some of our rooms, so I hope you'll come back and see us once that's done. We can't wait to have you again!  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We drove in from Marina Del Rey. The traffic was very light so we arrived about 11:00. I pulled in their valet lot and they let me park even though check in is at 3:00. I gave them my cell number at the desk and they said they would call when the room is ready. We went walking and checked out an art gallery and a beachfront shopping center. We walked through the beach park and then crossed the street and started to look at options for lunch. About 12:15 we settled on a Mexican restaurant. I had amazing Carnitas. Just as we finished, my phone rang telling me that the room was ready. We walked back and checked in. Javid took care of us. We got a rather large, ocean peek room. We were very happy. We rested a little and then to the Free Shuttle to the Ritz Carlton. Well worth a
Manager Response: I am so sorry your first night was interrupted by another guest, Harriet. I can completely understand how frustrating that would be, and I just want you to know that we do everything we can to make sure each and every guests enjoys their time with us in peace. That said, I'm absolutely thrilled Javid could show you that by getting you a new room! He really is phenomenal, and I'll be sure to pass your thanks on to him when I let him know what a great job he did for you. I'm beyond happy that the rest of your visit in Laguna Beach was wonderful, and I hope we'll get the chance to host you next time you're visiting.   All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Fantastic location the staff could not be any more friendly from behind the desk to the valet to the servers in the restaurant great service! Front building has some road noise but not too bad, would prefer the back building towards the water even if you don't get the water view. The restaurant food was very good no reason or need to go somewhere else breakfast or dinner very good
Manager Response: I'm so happy you enjoyed your stay! It's our pleasure to make your time on the beach as comfortable as we can, and I'm so pleased every member of our team was able to do that for you. Hope we'll see you again soon!  All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect Location....but needs a good cleaning.
Summary: I originally booked a bungalow, too small and upgraded to beach view suite. The composition of the buildings is scattered. I unfortunately walked in to a open rehab building by mistake and a soaked and dirty diaper fumigated the hallway.   Finally got to the right building, the threshold had a lot of sand, I found hair in the fridge, some type of metal in the coffee maker, lamp shade was torn, the remote batteries were dying and we asked for a pull away bed and they told me it was a fire hazard ( I saw a pull away in the electrical room & through out the premises the next morning).  The Jacuzzi was filthy, the edges have accumulated sun screen/human residue film all around the edges. The poor guy who gave us towels had a torn blue bin where he was dispensing them from.   This
Manager Response: I'm so sorry you didn't see our very best this time. We work hard to present clean facilities to each of our guests, though, and we are in the process of updating a lot of our equipment once construction wraps up. While I'm disappointed we had some room for improvement, I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us overall. I hope we'll have a chance to show you some of our upgrades next time you visit Laguna Beach.   Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We've stayed here a few times, but this was by far the best! Newly remodeled Oceanfront room in Surf building was amazing!! So convenient to walk right down to beach. Also they have umbrellas, chairs and loungers for hotel guests which we used everyday of our 4 night stay! We enjoyed the people watching at the restaurants below but if you're looking for a quieter stay, this may not be the building for you. Highly recommend and can't wait to return!
Manager Response: I can't tell you how much we appreciate you coming back again and again, JRG -- it's great to know this was the best visit yet! We'll be looking forward to having you back again soon.   All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Mu husband and I stayed here for one night getaway form our little one in an oceanfront room it was very clean, quiet and amazing to stay on the water. I would love to come back here again. One thing I would do to save money is park on the street nearby to save $30 on valet parking. We also enjoyed dining at the deck for breakfast and also the driftwood kitchen for dinner. The food and service was really good. We will definitely be going back to the restaurants.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you and your husband picked us for your getaway trip, Heather! Always wonderful to hear our guests can relax with us, and I'm certainly pleased your visit was no exception. We're already looking forward to your next visit!  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Short trip from Costa Mesa down to Laguna for the night. From the time we were greeted by the valet to the front desk and finishing off the night with room service this place delivered! We in the ocean front king room and it was very clean and updated. We will be back for another staycation very soon. Thanks to everyone at Pacific Edge for a great time!
Manager Response: I'm so happy we helped make your staycation so much fun, Robert! It's always great when our guests can relax while they're here, and we're looking forward to hosting your next trip soon!  All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Major Disappointment from the time we checked in
Summary: What a major disappointment. I would not recommend this hotel at all.  From the moment we tried to check in, it was just a disastrous and even after the hotel manager knew about it and nothing was done, truly tells you that customer service is not there priority at this hotel. All we got was an email stating It was just a comedy of errors, that was there response.    It took over 45 minutes to check in and get into a correct room, after numerous tries, first checked into the wrong room type, as our reservation was a oceanfront and they tried to give us a street view room, then we go back to the front desk and they check us in a room that guests are already in. After the third try, and over 45 minutes later we finally got our room.   We were there for my daughter birthday and
Manager Response: I want to sincerely apologize once again for the series of unfortunate events you had to deal with while you were here. While I know there's not excuse for what you experienced, mistakes like this are completely out of character for us. I certainly do care about customer service, and I'm so glad our team did reach out to explain the situation to you. I'm so sorry that wasn't enough, though, and that your daughter's birthday was impacted so severely by this. I hope she was still able to enjoy some of her time on the beach, and we wish you all the best.   Take care,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: How does one spend their first week of retirement?  I wanted to down load my brain. After 53 years as a Government employee, hurts to think about it now, my wife made reservations for Laguna Beach's Pacific Edge Hotel.  Over the years we have stayed there - back when it was know as Vacation Village.  It's the only place to date the we've found to have a room with a balcony where the water during high tide  come right under the balcony.  So with the tide coming and going and my brain down loading I started to relax.   Pacific Edge has it all.  Great room with a great view; whales, dolphins, seals, and more birds than I could ever name.  Then there's the dining, oh!! the food.   With just a short walk your in down town Laguna Beach with shops, restaurants, art enough to keep you
Manager Response: I'm so happy you were able to celebrate your retirement by relaxing on our beach, Ken! It's a joy to know you and your wife have had some fun times with us, and I'm really pleased we were able to make you feel welcome once again. I'm especially glad you got to spend some time on the balcony -- there's really nothing more soothing than listening to the waves crashing on the sand. I hope we'll be able to host many more trips to Laguna Beach for you, and we want to wish you a happy retirement once again!   All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Yes, it's close to the water, staff is friendly and valet is good.  If it weren't for the seriously outdated rooms, dirty carpets, old showers, popcorn ceilings and ridiculously cheap and old furniture it would get better reviews, especially for the price.
Manager Response: I'm sorry you weren't happy with your room, Reggie, but it's great to hear we could take such excellent care of you while you enjoyed your time on our beach. I hope we'll have another chance to impress you next time you're in Laguna Beach, and wish you all the best.   Take care, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I love this hotel. Is it perfect? No, but the location is excellent and you can walk short distances to shopping, stores and restaurants as well as having the pacific ocean at your feet. The beachfront rooms are clean and freshly painted. There have been some upgrades to furniture that was sorely needed, so that was a plus.  Honestly, the only thing I despise about this hotel is 30.00 a day to park my car. And the valets park so close to other cars, the valet gave us our first "ding" on our passenger door. It was handled in a timely manner, but it was a pain. (The hotel did wave the parking fees at least, but nothing but a slip for our insurance.) :/  Overall, I'll come back again, but that parking situation is horrible.
Manager Response: We love that you love staying with us! It's wonderful to hear you've enjoyed spending time in Laguna Beach, and I'm glad we've been a convenient and reliable home base for you while you've been here. I'm so sorry about your experience with parking, though. We are required to offer valet in LB due to the limited space in town, but we do waive resort fees in an effort to alleviate this burden for our guests. Still, you should absolutely be able to trust us with your vehicle, and I'm incredibly disappointed we let you down here. I assure you we will do a much better job next time you visit us, and we're looking forward to seeing you again.  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Currently staying at this hotel, the rooms are very nice clean and comfortable, bathroom a little cramped not enough counter space.  We have a sea view room, the view is good but the downside is the noise, there is a bar and restaurant below and the noise is constant.  Whilst these close at 10:00 it is not possible to spend a few peaceful hours in your room or sitting enjoying the view from your balcony in the afternoon.   The restaurant and bar are very nice and the staff are efficient and friendly, we have enjoyed the food and cocktails, and of course we must have contributed to the noise! The position of the bar needs  a rethink or it should be mentioned on the website that the rooms can be noisy so that an informed choice can be made.  One other thing, the rooms are
Manager Response: I'm so sorry you haven't had much peace in your room, Misdy. That's definitely something we want to note, and I appreciate you bringing it to our attention. On the other hand, I'm pleased to hear you've enjoyed spending some time in the bar as well! We're always glad to make you feel comfortable here, and I hope you won't hesitate to let us know if we can do anything else for you while you're with us.   Enjoy the rest of your stay, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Stayed here one night in the older building facing PCH. Luckily our room is on the other side facing the ocean w/ a view of the ocean over some roofs. But it was a nice location.  Room size is standard w/ a queen size bed. It has a functional kitchenette with an antique cooktop w/ oven and a fridge. Bathroom is on the small side but it has a small separate dressing area. It's like a studio apartment.  Room was clean. Furniture is functional and clean but not modern. Bath tub could be upgraded but functional. Bed was comfy.  My room was connected to another room, separated by a door. I can see the light coming through from the other room as well as hearing their conversation. Luckily they were just talking, no partying. I felt bad in the morning because I had to do a conference
Manager Response: Hi again, Jackie! I saw your note on Yelp already, but I just wanted to say again how thrilled I am that you enjoyed your stay with us. Hope we'll get a chance to host you again!  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I go here 2-3 times per year just to get away...to rest, relax and reboot. The staff, Brian & James, are the best! They are courteous, helpful and accommodating to my needs. Always a wonderful and enjoyable place.
Manager Response: I'm really excited we've been a place of rejuvenation and rest for you, Bob. It's wonderful to hear Brian and James have been able to take great care of you, too, and I hope you know we'll always be around when you need a break.   All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Lovely beach front hotel, we stayed in an ocean view double room. The room wasn't very spacious but the view and sound of the ocean in the morning made it all up. The beds were quite comfortable so we woke up all rested. Great breakfast though.
Manager Response: I'm so pleased you enjoyed your stay with  us, Kasia! There's nothing like taking in a beautiful beach view while enjoying your morning coffee, and I'm thrilled you got to experience that while you were here. Hope we'll see you again sometime!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Loved the beach balcony - slept with the sliding door open and listened to the ocean all night!!  The room was nice, and adequate for 3 women.  The staff was really nice -- brought us an extra chair for the deck very quickly.  We didn't use much at the hotel as we only stayed one night but I would recommend the ocean view room for sure!
Manager Response: I'm so happy you found the waves to be so soothing, Jamie! There really is nothing more relaxing than listening to the ocean in my opinion, and I'm glad you and your friends got the chance to enjoy that while you were with us. We hope to see you for a longer visit next time!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This hotel is nothing like it looks on their website. It's the size of a small college dorm room with stains everywhere and very outdated amenities. Room has a weird smell and offers very little privacy. They also charge you $30 a night just to park your car at this crappy place.
Manager Response: I'm so sorry you weren't happy with your room, Brittany. We always want you to feel comfortable when staying with us, and I'm very disappointed that wasn't the case for you. As far as our parking situation goes, we're required to offer valet because of the limited space in Laguna Beach. That said, we try to offset this cost by not charging resort fees, and we always make sure to explain parking to our guests. Still, I'm sorry you felt it wasn't worth the cost. I'd love another chance to impress you if you're ever visiting Laguna Beach again, though, and I wish you all the best.   Take care, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The Pacific Edge Hotel is an eclectic grouping of several previously owned hotel buildings.  The best for your money are the Reef and Surf  high rises with oceanfront rooms.  We had  an ocean front on the top floor and the view was priceless.  If you don't want oceanfront, then you will be facing the pool, street or parking lot.  Our room was recently renovated with a nice bar with microwave, coffee maker, courtesy bar and fridge.  The bathroom was small, with shower, toilet, single sink, granite countertop and tiled, glass enclosed shower. King bed had a light duvet, perfect for the cool spell when we were there. The staff were exceptional..Sylvia in housekeeping; Brian and Kate on the Front Desk.   The outside of the buildings could use a fresh coat of paint and that is the
Manager Response: I'm completely thrilled by how much you enjoyed your time with us, Karen! We put a lot of work into renovating those rooms, so it's especially wonderful to hear you appreciated those details. I'm also pleased our team at the hotel as well as our restaurants could take such great care of you, and I will certainly make sure Sylvia, Brian, and Kate know you mentioned them by name. We all look forward to your next trip to Laguna Beach!  Take care,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I stayed there with my family in the villa. The service was great from the moment of arrival up until we left. The Staff was super friendly. The room itself was outstanding with a great beachfront view. Truly enjoyed my stay.  Whenever I go back to California to visit I will definitely go back and stay at Pacific Edge.
Manager Response: I'm delighted you and your family enjoyed staying in our villa, Arturo! It's always our pleasure to take great care of you while you're here, and I'm happy you saw that during this visit. We're already looking forward to your next trip to Laguna Beach!  Take care,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The friendly staff made my stay a real pleasure. Not to mention the outstanding location right on the water and all the shopping surrounding the hotel. The hotel itself was clean, comfortable, had quality amenities, was easy to find, and valet made parking a breeze. I will stay again and would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: I'm so glad our team could make your stay even more enjoyable, Jacqueline! We're all very proud of our little slice of beach, and it's wonderful that you had such a great time relaxing with us. We can't wait to see you next time!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful place to stay but felt uncomfortable
Summary: Stayed there May 18th and 19th 2016.  This was my 2nd visit since we loved it so much the first time around.  However, this visit was spoiled because a couple of hours after the beach attendant set us up with chairs and towels on the 19th, a 2nd beach attendant came over and said he had to ask if we were guests of the hotel.  I may be oversensitive but it made me very uncomfortable, especially since he didn't say why he had to ask, and he didn't ask anyone else.  We left the beach shortly after that, and went back to our room.   As I said, it is a beautiful place to stay, but considering the amount of money you spend for the ocean view from the best rooms, you shouldn't be made to feel uncomfortable, and unfortunately because of that incident, I will probably look for another
Manager Response: I'm so sorry you were made to feel at all uncomfortable during your stay, Valerie, especially while you were trying to relax on the beach. Our attendants are responsible for ensuring that unauthorized visitors don't take advantage of our beach amenities so they'll be available for our guests, but we never want this process to offend or impact your time here. I hope your previous experience at our hotel will be enough to earn us another chance next time you're here at Laguna Beach, and I wish you all the best.  Take care,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This is a series of separate buildings that are one property. There are two pools and one hot tub. I first stayed in the "village room" that is right along hwy 1. It could be a little noisy with traffic noise, but with the AC on, we slept well. It was a basic room. For the last night, we upgraded to a beachfront room and it was WELL worth it! A balcony and peaceful views of the ocean. Whichever room or building you choose, you'll have access to the amenities, including the pools, the bar/restaurant, and best of all, the beach service - where a friendly staffer will set up chairs and an umbrella for free!
Manager Response: I'm so, so happy you enjoyed your stay with us! It's wonderful to hear you felt your upgrade to our beachfront room was worth it, and I'm glad you got to relax by our pools and hot tub while you were here. I hope we'll get the chance to host you for another beach vacation soon!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My mom and I stayed here for 2 nights and we were both extremely impressed with Pacific Edge Hotel. The staff were all very friendly and the room surpassed our expectations. We had an ocean front room in the reef building and loved listening to the sound of the waves crashing at night. The room was spacious and clean. We have nothing but good things to say about Pacific Edge and will be staying here again if we ever come back to Laguna Beach. I would definitely recommend splurging on the ocean front room if possible - it's worth every penny.
Manager Response: I'm so happy you and your mother had a great time staying with us, Shannon! I always say there's nothing more relaxing than the sound of the waves lulling you to sleep, and it's so wonderful you two got to enjoy that while you were here. We'd be thrilled to have you again should you decide to return to Laguna Beach!  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Located right on the beach and walking distance from surf breaks in Laguna
Summary: Pacific Edge, like the Shorebreak (in HB), is part of a family of hotels that provides an upscale, 4-star experience that is pet and geared toward more active lifestyles (surfing, etc)  We found a discounted rate via Hotels Tonight, and if you find a deal (mid-week is better), you'll be rewarded with a great view of the water.  This hotel is ideally located for exploring the beach community in Laguna or heading out on the town and finding a little night life.  Parking is Valet but I have really enjoyed both this hotel and the other hotel property in HB.  If you get the chance, I think you'll be pleasantly surprised with the experience.
Manager Response: Hi again, Avi! I saw where you left another kind note after your visit and responded there, too, but I just wanted to tell you again how happy I am that you had such a great time with us. We hope we'll get the chance to host your next visit to Laguna Beach soon!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I came here to get away from Vegas, the heat and the people, just to relax on my own. I got here yesterday and my room wasn't ready (I was early) but they got my room done 2 hours before check-in time! Great staff so far. The room is clean, needs some updating, but still very nice. I could not believe the view!! It is like I'm right on top of the ocean!  I listened to the waves roaring all night. It was the best night I've had in years. I will definitely come here again. A little over my price range but the atmosphere is well worth it.
Manager Response: Hi again, Tracy! Thanks for leaving these kind words for us here, too -- reading them really put a big smile on my face. Again, I'm so happy you could relax with us, and we're always here when you need to get away for a while!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Sisters stay overnight and enjoy all of the amenities offered by Pacific Edge.  From a chilled complimentary bottle of champagne to a private spectacular ocean beach front balcony. Staff made the choice easy as we room shopped in Laguna Beach with it's many hotels. They were friendly and true to their word. Allowing us time after checking out to explore the areas many shops and eateries while they safely watched over our baggage.  Truly a blessing.
Manager Response: I'm so delighted we could make your sisters' stay special, Ruharpole! We're glad you chose us to host your visit and that we could take great care of you while you were here. Hope to see you and your sisters again someday!  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We had a terrible experience at the Bungalows over the weekend. Our host, Andy, was awful (arrogant and forgetful). Our patio heaters didn't work and our toilet didn't flush. When we asked our host to remedy those two things, he said the engineer was called but couldn't help us. Well after two hours (6-8pm) of asking repeatedly for him to try again, we finally got an engineer down (CJ) who said he had only been called 5 minutes prior...it took him 2 seconds to start the fire and it was 8:00pm and time to check out at that point. When we asked to see a manager upon check out, we were told by Andy that they didn't have one. I'm not normally the type to leave a bad review. But given the cost of our bungalow and the limited time we got to spend there, we expected great service and
Manager Response: I am sincerely sorry we weren't able to take better care of you during your stay in our Bungalow, Caissy. Between the technical difficulties, which should have been repaired much sooner, and the attitude of your host, which is completely unacceptable, we definitely dropped the ball this time, and I cannot apologize enough. I am disappointed that your relaxing beach weekend wasn't relaxing at all -- especially because I know we can do better than this. I only hope you'll be willing to give us a second chance so we can show you that.   All the best,‚Äã Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful view of the ocean but servise is irresponsive
Summary: This hotel offering a very nice view of the ocean and nice clean rooms but service was not responsive and not justified the price. Asked front desk for coffee cups and never got ones. Obviously bad management.
Manager Response: I'm sincerely sorry we dropped the ball on your coffee. That's very unusual for us, as we always prioritize quick and friendly service, so I'm disappointed you didn't get to see that. I hope you'll trust me when I say we are capable of making you feel at home here, and we would very much appreciate another chance to show you that.   All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: So lucky to stay here, only because I couldn't find another hotel to take large dog.  Though not the most high end hotel, absolutely the best beachfront oceanside location & room.  Great stay, warm, friendly, casual atmosphere with amazing staff & service.  Very much appreciate the rates & value, highly recommend on that basis!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the recommendation, Terracana! We're happy we could accommodate you and your big furry friend, and I'm thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you if you're ever back in Laguna Beach!  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Love this place, has such a local flair and excellent location. Go for the beach front rooms, right on the water front. Watch the sun set over the water or check out the surfers. Also can not beat "The Deck" for drinks or dinner" . It is not your luxury type stay, as the interior finishes are eclectic, but if you want the local beach vibe, this is your place.
Manager Response: I'm so happy you enjoyed staying with us, Sherry! I'll admit I'm biased, but I believe our Laguna Beach sunsets are the most beautiful, so I'm really glad you got to enjoy those during your visit. We hope you'll be back to see us (and our views) soon!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Loved the vibe staying here. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The rooms are quite dated but you're not staying at this hotel for the luxury rooms. The location and views of the ocean are why you stay here. I'll for sure stay here again the next time I'm in OC.   Hotel is very reasonably priced too.
Manager Response: I'm so happy you enjoyed your stay with us, Ryan! It's always so great to hear how much our guests love the beach views, and it was our pleasure to add to that in any way we could. We're already looking forward to seeing you next time you visit Laguna Beach!  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I found the Pacific Edge online and booked a standard room for a couple of days.  I was not exactly sure what I would find, but I was amazed.  The staff was great and made me feel very welcome.  The location was perfect and right on the beach with a little separation from the main beach.  Great for relaxing and enjoying the beautiful views, but still very close to shopping and great dining.   I look forward to spending more vacations here.
Manager Response: I'm delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, Penny! It's always our pleasure to make you feel welcome, and I'm so glad you saw that while you were here. We can't wait to see you back on our little slice of beach!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: On the west coast for business and had a couple of days to kill, found the Pacific Edge online and booked a room for a couple days.  Great room, fantastic staff, stunning views from the room and the beachside bar.  Close proximity to all that Laguna beach has to offer from art, shopping and great food.  We will come back here for sure.
Manager Response: I'm so happy you enjoyed your stay with us! We love where we work, so it's always great to hear our guests love it too. Hope to see you again next time you're ready to visit Laguna Beach!  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect Location, Amazing Staff & Wonderful Restaurant
Summary: Just spent an amazing weekend at the hotel to celebrate our daughter's college graduation. We got an "Apartment" room because we wanted the extra space. These rooms do not have ocean views, but the 2 bedrooms with kitchen was big enough for the entire family. If you don't need a lot of space, spend the money and get an Ocean View room. I did stay in one last December and they are right on the beach with the waves crashing underneath you - amazing! We had her celebration dinner with 10 people in the Driftwood Restaurant - a 5 star experience! The staff and food were amazing. Thank you to Brittani for her wonderful service. We took pictures on the beach at sunset and then spent the rest of the night celebrating at the patio bar. It was a memorable experience for all of us to
Manager Response: I can't tell you how thrilled I am that your family chose to celebrate such a huge event with us! It's our pleasure to have made it special for you. Please congratulate your daughter‚Äã for her accomplishments for us, and let her know we wish her all the best in life.   Hope to see you again, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Great views, fun environment, and friendly staff! Will definitely come back again! Right on the ocean with spectacular views! We have been coming here for years and have never been disappointed. This will be our family's favorite vacation spot for years to come
Manager Response: I'm so happy you enjoyed your stay with us, Renee! It's our pleasure to make you feel welcome at Laguna Beach, and we can't wait to see you and your family next year.  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Amazing from check in to check out! Was excited just to have a place to crash after a night out in Laguna however this weekend was much more than that! Upon check in I was greeted with a bottle of Champagne and complimentary valet. The room was on the very top floor overlooking the ocean and a few rooftops, which were not blocking the view or the sound of the crashing waves at all! Our room had a kitchenette, pullout sofa and even a dining room area. We had about 10 people in the room for appetizers and champagne it was just right, people could hang on the balcony or the sofa plenty of room. We eventually went out in Laguna but found ourselves back in the room enjoying the crashing waves and fresh ocean air. We had no noise complaints because the walls are thick and the rooms
Manager Response: I'm so thrilled you enjoyed everything, Isaac! It's not often we get locals staying with us, so I'm delighted you landed here for your night in Laguna. We hope to have you and your friends back soon!  All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I very much enjoyed my stay at Pacific Edge over the weekend. The night auditor Ashfar was extremely helpful. Having previously worked for a hotel, it is rather common for those working the graveyard shift to not be around when a guest walks in during odd hours. However, he would show up as soon as I walked in or already upfront, even though it would be at 2 or 3am. He also knew the area well enough to  provide me directions.   Asia was also quite friendly, as I had left my shoes on site. When I came back she had already anticipated my arrival, being aware that a guest was picking it up. It is so easy for staff to no longer entertain guests that have already checked out. And yet, she was still as welcoming as she had been during my stay.   Since I previously worked in
Manager Response: I can't tell you how thrilled I am that Ashfar and Asia took such great care of you, Al! I think if they're changing their names, you should get an A+ as well for letting me know how much you appreciate them. I'll be sure to send your compliments their way -- I know it's going to make them so happy to hear. We're looking forward to seeing you again!   Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Nothing nicer than an ocean view room over looking the Pacific Ocean in Laguna Beach. Add great food at "The Deck" restaurant and a great staff that takes care of your every need and you may never leave the hotel and restaurant. Although a morning walk along the beautiful beach and ocean shouldn't be missed......
Manager Response: I'm glad you were able to get out on the beach for a morning stroll, but I'll admit I'm even happier we could make you feel so comfortable here. We'll keep our ocean view rooms ready for your next visit!   Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This hotel is in a great location - right on the beach! We got an apartment. I thought it was a little expensive because it was a little dated but it was perfect for a stopover. The staff were really friendly and helpful. I'd recommend getting a room with a view so you can watch the sunrise!
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your apartment! I'm proud to hear our team made you feel welcome, and we hope to see you back for another beautiful sunrise soon.   Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I was SO exhausted after a 6hr drive with 2 kids in the car! When I finally got to pacific edge hotel I was immediately greeted by Zack! Zach made my stay so Pleasant! I can say nothing but GREAT things about the way Zach & Javid treated me and my family!(-:  I main reason I will be returning to this hotel is because of the Wonderful hospitality!U where amazing Zack!(-: Thank you, Christy R.
Manager Response: I'm absolutely thrilled that Zach could make your stay so wonderful, Christy! I'll be sure to tell him how much you appreciated his hospitality, and I know he'll be as happy as I am to hear it. We hope you'll brave the long drive to see us again!  All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My husband and I have stayed here several times.  We always select beachfront or ocean view.  The room, the view and amenities are great.  The location is perfect, we can walk to local restaurants and shopping.  The walks down the beach are beautiful as well.  Laguna is one of the most beautiful beaches in the world and Pacific Edge is a great value to enjoy this area.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you and your husband have enjoyed staying with us! It's always a pleasure when guests return, and we're happy you've enjoyed our beachfront rooms.   Hope to see you again, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Convenient location right on the beach. A little dated but the price is right and was upgraded to an ocean view (could see a sliver of the ocean). Staff was very friendly. Rooms were clean. They charge for parking but there is ample street parking (metered during the day).
Manager Response: I'm so happy we were able to get you in an ocean view, Lindsay! It's easy to be friendly when we're this close to the beach, and I'm glad our service contributed to making your vacation great.   Hope to see you again, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The hotel is placed in very good location, near the beach. The room we stayed was not big but you dont go to Laguna Beach to stay in room:)) The best experience for me was to go to Whole Foods, get take away sup and enjoy nice sunset on the beach.  And of course not far away is park where you can do workout in the morning.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your time on the beach with us! I hope you saw enough sunsets to last until your next visit.  Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This hotel fronts a great stretch of one of the best beaches in California. There is a great deck overlooking the beach where you can drink (of course) and eat very well (surprise).  Come early or expect to wait to to be seated on the deck.  Every guest drove there, of course, and so everyone pays the $30.00 per day valet charge. There is no self parking.   When you visit the website you will see a picture of the least expensive room, called a "village room."  The photo suggests that these are nice rooms, but . . . no. There are a couple of pieces of ugly furniture that Goodwill would not accept. There is a tiny table (much smaller than a card table but similar construction) next to the "kitchen area." This "kitchen" includes a stove top without any pans, and no microwave. In
Manager Response: I already reached out in response to your Yelp review, Dean, but I wanted to apologize again that you were disappointed with your Village Room. I look forward to your next visit when we will have a second chance to show you our best.   Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: For what we paid for this place was gross. It reminded me of a place we stayed back in college for $48/night. The carpet in our room was gross and stained, as was the ironing board and sheets. As soon as we arrived there was a drunken man chasing his dogs and screaming obscenities. Oh joy that this man was a guest here and knew the security guards so he was permitted to stay. My husband and I went on a beach walk after this crazy man situation, came back to the room and were told we were being too loud. My only response is well when your walls are made of paper and there's connecting doors to other rooms you're going to hear things.   The valet took forever every time and the view from our room was of the back of a building.  The beach area to hang out on a chair and under an
Manager Response: I'm very sorry you didn't enjoy your stay, Julie. While it's true that some of our rooms are economic options, we always clean them thoroughly in preparation for new guests. That said, it sounds like some of our amenities could use an update.   I'd also like to apologize for your run-in with another guest in our hotel.  We can't always control what others do, but we can certainly make sure our valets take care of you quickly.   I'd you'd be willing, we'd love another chance to give you the vacation you deserve.  All the best,   Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Great price, great location. Good for what you pay
Summary: We stopped at Pacific edge for one night en route to LA from coachella. The hotel staff and valet guys were super friendly. The hotel was a great price for the location. The rooms are small and cramped for 4 people in a double, but they're right on the beach in an amazing location in the middle of the main strip. As a hotel guest you get sunbeds and parasols free of charge and one of the lovely lads on the beach will set you up anywhere you want. The beach was super clean and lovely too.   The hotel pool is small, but again, for what you pay in such a prime location, we couldn't really complain.   The valet guys were also pretty beautiful. Would 100% stay here again next time I'm in Laguna.
Manager Response: So glad you took a rest from your travels with us, Paige! I'm happy you found all of our amenities to your liking, and we look forward to seeing you for a longer stay in the future.   Till then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: A pleasant stay by the sea!
Summary: The hotel was cleaned to excellency before the time I needed it and their staff was corteous and friendly.  This made me feel at ease after rushing to be prepared for my older son's wedding.  Excellent valet services and the view of the sea from my room for one night only couldn't be better!   It was a very pleasant stay and I enjoyed listening to the waves in the quietness of night time and admire part of the sea in daylight.  Lucky there was great weather with clear blue skies and it was slightly warm.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your son's marriage, Elizabeth! We're so honored that you spent such an important weekend with us, and I'm happy we could take care of everything for you. While we can't take credit for the beautiful weather, we're certainly glad Mother Nature cooperated as well!  Come back and see us soon, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We stayed one night on the beach.  The sound of the waves put me in my  happy place!  They did a nice job on the remodel, cute and kitchey.  The restaurants The Deck and The Driftwood were excellent!  We only wished they were open a bit later and earlier.  Breakfast opened at 9 and we were ready to eat at 8.  Everyone from the front desk to the valet parkers were nice as can be.
Manager Response: I'm happy you enjoyed everything, Melanie! I find the sound of the waves so soothing as well. Sorry you had to wait a bit for your breakfast, but I'm glad it was worth it. Hope you'll come back to relax by the beach soon.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The Pacific Edge Hotel was a nice place in Laguna Beach.  My Husband and I stayed for 3 nights in an oceanfront room.  The view was incredible!  We loved having a balcony to sit on every night and in the morning.  There were steps just outside of our room that took us directly down to the beach.  We walked along the beach every morning to get breakfast (Laguna Coffee Company).  During our stay, we also utilized the lounge chairs on the beach.  It was very nice to have this amenity included.  One afternoon we had drinks and appetizers at the bar, these were great as well.  A little pricey, but you are also paying for the view.  The front desk and cleaning staff were very attentive and friendly.   The room/valet parking were the downsides.  The room was nice enough, but nothing
Manager Response: I'm so glad you came to stay with us, Lauren! We're in love with our little slice of beach, and it really makes us happy to share it with others.   Unfortunately, we are required to provide valet parking as a way to ensure the safety of your vehicles. In an effort to alleviate some of this, we do not charge resort fees that other hotels in the area do.   I'm happy to say that we have begun a few renovations, and we hope to address some of the minor issues you mentioned regarding the rooms. We'd love to see you back when we get everything finished up!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Can't vouch for all rooms but the Village Room was a disaster
Summary: I literally feel like I was robbed staying at this hotel in their Village Room.  The room was so disgusting we were afraid to walk across the floor is our bare feet, not to mention floor wasn't even level, the ceiling with water damage and school chairs for a table in the room.  The walls are paper thin and I could hear the employees talking in the floor below me as this room was positioned over the offices.  I've stayed in nicer Motel 6's for a heck of a lot less money.  We were schedule to stay two nights, but we left after one night even though we didn't another place to go. I would imagine they must have nicer rooms that this one or they would be out of business by now.  No one would pay $255 + $30 for valet at this place twice.
Manager Response: I'm very sorry you weren't happy with your Village room. While I want to assure you we thoroughly clean and prepare everything for our guests, it sounds like we could have done more this time. I do believe we provide a more luxurious vacation experience than other economic motels, though, and hope you'll give us another chance to prove that in the future.   All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Stayed here just for a couple of nights. I did lots of research online before booking my hotel in Laguna. This one offered beach and ocean views and had a good value/price. I'm glad I only booked two nights because they charge $100 per night as a deposit! When traveling on a budget, that can break the bank for some! We didn't get an ocean view room as we requested.   The room was very small, close to dorm room size. Bathroom was okay but the tub had drainage issues. Water kept gurgling back up during my showers. The door connecting to another room was paper thin and I could hear almost everything the neighbor was doing or was saying.   The only perks of this hotel was the private beach and on site coin laundry. It was valet only at $30 per night. No self parking spots at all. We
Manager Response: As I indicated in your other review response, I'm truly sorry that you didn't walk away happier with your room with us. Again, I intend to look into each comment you included here, Mary. On that note, thank you for bringing this to my attention.  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My first to Laguna to visit a friend.  Found this hotel in maps.  Didn't have a reservation and the front desk clerk named Ashraf couldn't have been more helpful.  He gave me a good rate on one of the smaller queen rooms with a peekaboo view of the ocean in the "Surf" building.  Worked fine for me.  The sound of the waves is all I needed.  Ashraf gave me suggestions for breakfast and was very helpful to deal with.   The queen room is adequate for one person, a bit tight for two.  Comfy bed.  Clean room, clean bathroom.  Good value and choosing this room in the "Surf" building puts the road noise far enough away not to hear.
Manager Response: Thanks again for the review! I'm so thankful for you sharing it here, too. See you next time you're in Laguna Beach!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Micheal was awesome so happy and nice!! This is my new favorite hotel on the coast!!
Summary: Went to cali for the night from Vegas to catch a cubs game. While all of my friends  to went to the hyatt in Huntington beach..We decided to stay in Laguna ..Wow I never thought that I could get a great room that close to the  beach for sooooo cheap ;) the best part by far was the service everyone I mean everyone was nice and polite no attitudes.. We are both in customer service and it was soo refreshing to have truly chill nice service. Nice Job everyone
Manager Response: That polite service is something we pride ourselves on, Jessie, so I'm really proud of the team for making sure that was apparent for you. I'm hoping you'll come back by next time you're in Laguna. We'd love to welcome you back in!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: you can usually tell how good the service at a hotel is going to be by the service on the phone.   I called to make a change to our reservation and was so impressed by the friendly guy who answered, said "no problem", quickly addressed the changes I needed and listened patiently to my needs.   I told him to have an awesome day and he replied "you have an even more awesome day".  Looking forward to my stay in early april.
Manager Response: I'm thrilled to be reading this. Excellent customer service is a top priority here, so I'm glad the team delivered just that. At the risk of sounding repetitive, I have to say -- I hope you have an awesome day.  See you next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We had an amazing 20 year wedding anniversary!! Everything was perfect..the front desk helped plan our special day at the beach...unforgettable sunset..food and drinks...The Beach front rooms are a must for a special occasion. Everyone is so friendly and helpful from the guys at Valet the front desk ..room service...the staff at the restaurants on site. If you are planning a special get away Pacific Edge Hotel is a must stay!!! Thank you for a very special Anniversary.
Manager Response: Thanks for spending your anniversary with us, Jeff! I know that those sunsets are pretty impossible not to fall in love with, so I'm happy you guys got to enjoy them with us. Looking forward to seeing you guys for your next special occasion!  Cheers, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We booked our room based on the pictures on the website and the experience I had had at other Joie de Vivre Hotels in San Francisco. The first room we were booked into was their Standard Room. When we opened the door and saw the room, we were appalled and stunned and immediately called the Front Desk and and asked to move. The room did NOT look like any of the pictures on the website. It was run down, unrenovated, and old. There was no way we were going to stay in a dilapidated room with bugs in the bathroom, for the amount of money we had paid for our stay. Moreover we were told that gosh, this was an un renovated room and that the renovated rooms were all booked. Fortunately, they were able to move us to a slightly larger room, but it too was un renovated and NOTHING LIKE THE
Manager Response: We'd never intentionally lead you to believe you were reserving a room other than the one you had in mind -- I'm really sorry that yours wasn't closer to what you were expecting. It sounds like you understand that we're renovating parts of the property, and I apologize that those rooms were booked so we couldn't get you the transfer you asked for. All of this said, I want to let you know that I'm taking each line of this review very seriously. Regardless of if the room is renovated or not, it should be perfectly clean and welcoming. Hearing that wasn't the case is concerning, and I'll be taking a closer look to see how we can prevent this from happening in the future.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location.... Don't expect a fancy hotel though
Summary: The location of this hotel is great!  Easy walking distance to many restaurants and a grocery store.  Also the convience  of having th beach right there is awesome. If you go out in the morning they will put out lounges or chairs and umbrellas for you. Make sure you get down early though, because they will run out.  The hotel itself is NOT fancy.  We stayed on the economy side. The rooms are the smallest I've ever been in, and though they have tried to update the rooms you can tell it is an old hotel. The bathroom has the sink shower and toilet all behind one door, so only one person can get ready at a time.  While we were there our toilet plugged up twice, but they did come to fix quickly. Others in our group also commented that their toilets were having problems too. The worst
Manager Response: This was a very thorough review, Cori, and I really appreciate the time you took to write it. I'm so happy that you had a great time here in Laguna Beach. Still, it sounds like there were a few aspects of your stay that weren't what we want them to be. As far as the outlets go, I'll be sure to look into that. That said, I hope you'll come back next time you're in town. We'd love to see you!  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice staff, rooms, dog friendly and very courtious.
Summary: When we first checked into this hotel my son and I were given a free bottle of wine then shown to our room. Our room was very beautiful, orderly, cleanly and had an outstanding ocean view. We were very pleased with the service we received. The staff were all very nice to us. Overall this an awesome place to stay and I would highly recommend it.
Manager Response: You and your son are welcome anytime, Michelle -- I'm looking forward to your next visit! As far as this past one goes, I'm thrilled you guys enjoyed your room and that view so much. I'll have to tell the rest of the team that their service truly impressed -- they'll be happy to hear it!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My wife and I arrived right as the sun was setting. We had a room with a balcony that had an ocean view. So you can imagine the feeling when we opened our room door for the first time and the blinds were wide open exposing the amazing sunset. The sun beamed on our bed which in turn instantly brought our attention to the amazing gift left for us on the bed. It was a metal bucket full of chocolates champagne and snacks. When I called the front desk "freaking out because I didn't buy this" a nice gentleman by the name of Brian Dougherty (I think it was) said to enjoy the complementary gift and happy anniversary. I was beside myself.   This place is amazing. Not only did Brian win me over with his top notch customer service, but the room and food were amazing. Best food around. No
Manager Response: What a beautifully written review, Joshua! I've got to say that reading it made my entire day. I'm so happy that you and your wife spent your anniversary with us here -- I'm even happier that you enjoyed everything from those views to the customer service!  Looking forward to next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: You will love this place from the moment you walk in. Right in the middle of it all. Grocery store right across the street very convenient. Tons of stores to shop along and restaraunts. The hotel has pool with big spa. The beach is awesome. Only minimal amount of people. They have umbrellas, beach chairs, towels and sand toys for you to use. The rooms were clean with comfy beds only downfall is no table, microwave and kind of small. Ours was not ocean view but we could hear ocean at night. Ocean and beach is 50 steps from our room . walk down beach to volleyball court and playground. I would say the only downfall is the $30 a night parking or meter parking that's $4.50 and you have to renew every 3 hours during day. Free after 8 pm-8am.other than that truely amazing relaxing
Manager Response: I'm so happy that your vacation here with us was a relaxing one. There's not much more we can hope to hear -- except maybe that you enjoyed your room and our proximity to the beach. I just hope you'll be back for another visit soon!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Impressed with perfect location and impeccable service!
Summary: What an amazing experience I was able to share with my husband and my parents on a recent trip to Laguna Beach.  Our decision to stay at Pacific Edge was confirmed by a local shop keeper that I reached out to while making arrangements for our get-away.  We could not have been more pleased!  Our trip was in celebration of my husband and my dad's birthdays, and they felt celebrated from the moment we checked in.  Special welcome birthday treats awaited in our rooms, and the extra touch made them feel great!!  Our rooms were in the "Reef" building and had stunning ocean views as far as the eye could see!  Rooms have been updated to a mod surf theme, and while there is still a retro feeling to them, they are perfectly comfortable and very clean.  Bathroom space is limited, but was
Manager Response: I couldn't be more pleased to hear that you were pleased -- especially since your family was here celebrating two very special occasions. It was a joy reading all about your stay, Ashley, and I'm just so happy that everything from the parking to those views left a five-star impression. Can't wait for your next stay with us!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Before I moved to Laguna Beach in the early 90's, my son and I used to visit Laguna often, and always stayed at Vacation Village.  Loved it there.  Now, decades later, having retired and moved to New England, I returned to Laguna for a vacation, and stayed at Pacific Edge, which was Vacation Village back in the day.  Still love it there!   First: There are parking places right in front of the hotel, so you can get off PCH to register at the hotel. Then you can give up your car to the parking valets (also great guys) who will park it nearby behind the hotel. That was a wonderful service and makes your stay so much easier, as the guys are there day or night to get your car for you. Second, when you walk into the lobby, you find very nice and helpful employees at the registration
Manager Response: What a detailed review, Stephanie! I really appreciate how thorough you were here -- it was awesome getting to read all of your thoughts about your most recent visit. Of course I'm happy that you enjoyed your room, but I'm especially thrilled to hear how great the service was. I'll have to let everyone know they got special shoutouts here!  See you next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We had booked a room with partial view which was on top floor of the not remodeled building.  we moved to a smaller newer remodeled room because a lot of rooms (with partial views) don't have elevator access which would have been hard for my older mom.  room by pool was nicely remodeled with no view but was so close to beach it didn't matter!
Manager Response: I'm glad we got you that room that worked for you and your mom, Nalini. It's even better knowing how much you enjoyed our proximity to the beach! Thanks for those room tips, by the way. I'm certain other reviewers will find them helpful.  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Our third trip to this beautiful awesome hotel & once again... perfection! From the Front Desk Staff of Kate, David, & James to our sweet wonderful room attendant, Sylvia, and of course Donny & the hard working Maintenance Staff, this place is paradise and spotless and right on the beach!  Restaurants, hiking, shopping all within walking distance!  Not a better place in our opinion...would recommend to anyone that wants to relax, rest, and view one of God's amazing places on earth!
Manager Response: This review is perfection -- thank you for all of these shoutouts! There is nothing better than knowing that the team did all they could to make your visit a great one. I'm proud of them for that, and will be sure to pass your compliments along to them!  See you next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I just want to say , I debated on this hotel with other hotels. I had an amazing experience, before I got there we received a check in email, that allowed me to let them know to put extra towels and hypoallergenic bedding. It also let me tell them when I would arrive between 12-1 so our room can be ready. We arrived about 20-30 minutes early and our room was ready. We had an ocean front two queen bed room (located in the shark reef) and it was absolutely beautiful. On the outside it looks iffy, but from the lobby I was impressed. The customer service was great! The valet guy was awesome! I mean I wish I could give 5 stars +++++ I work in the resort/hotel industry and I was impressed . I can't wait to come back to Laguna as this was my family's first time and my 4 year olds first
Manager Response: It was truly a joy having you and your family stay with us -- especially since it was your kid's first beach trip! It's even better to hear that the service the team provided was beyond five-star worthy. I really look forward to sharing that with the team. I'm also looking forward to your next visit! I hope it'll be sooner rather than later.  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed at the Pacific Edge for a little getaway. We were meant to stay for two nights but ended up staying for one night. We had booked and stayed in a King Reef room. It would have been a total disappointment, but the redeeming quality was the proximity to the ocean and ocean breezes.   First, what I liked:  -Proximity to the ocean, beach, and downtown - overall location is ideal in Laguna Beach -Dinner/drinks at the Deck - great, fun, delicious spot with nice selection of wine -The balcony overlooking the ocean was very nice- nice place to hang out even if you share your conversations with neighbors  What I didn't like: -The rooms do not look like the pictures at all -Our room was on the bottom floor of the reef building. There was substantial and
Manager Response: It's definitely wonderful to hear that you enjoyed aspects of your visit.  We consider ourselves lucky to be so close to the ocean, and I'm glad you enjoyed that, too! Still, I'm sorry that there were a couple of factors that didn't wow you quite the same way. As we always want to improve over time, I'm appreciative of your critical feedback, difficult as it was to read. We're working on some renovations here, so I'm confident that should you choose to return, we'd be able to leave an even better impression next time. That said, I'll be keeping your other feedback in mind moving forward -- thank you for taking the time to leave it.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing Views!!! Without an exuberant cost
Summary: I thoroughly checked other nearby hotels with a similar view of the ocean and sand, I chose Pacific edge with a fear that it would not turn out to be what I expected as is common when booking a new hotel online. However, the experience turned out to supersede my expectations thanks to the great location, price and Javid who helped me check in and find a room that I liked from the available ones. I will definitely look up this hotel for my next stay in Laguna beach in the future.
Manager Response: Mehdi, I'm so glad we could surpass your expectations and help you have a wonderful trip! To know you're already planning on making it back to see us someday is all we could ask for -- I can't wait to welcome you in again!   Until then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I'm staying currently at the Pacific Edge Hotel and I have to say, for the price you get what you pay for.  I'll start with the Pros and then explain how they can improve.     Pros:  staff very friendly and mostly helpful.   Nearly on a 4.5 star level but there were some major faults  Hotel is ON the beach.  Cons: 1)  rooms are very small.   Stayed in one that was barely 250 square feet.     The arrangement is awkward.    If you happen to stay on the side facing the highway, it can be very noisy especially at night when the bars close.  You can hear people loudly in the streets and the constant cards passing   2)  beds extremely firm.   Linens are simple and thin.  No thick comforter.  3)  age of rooms.   It's a small room...on par with a 2 or 3 star hotel at best.      The
Manager Response: While I'm happy the location impressed, I'm sorry that some other aspects of your visit weren't right on the mark. Improvement is definitely a priority of ours -- in fact, we're working on renovating the property to address some of the concerns you mentioned here. Your candid feedback, while disappointing to read, is really appreciated for that reason. Thanks for taking the time to leave it. All of this said, I hope we'll get the chance to make this up to you in the future.  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Our family stayed for a couple of days for our son's gymnastics meet. Although previous reviews were negative we did not share the same experience.   When we arrived the gentleman at the front desk could tell my wife and son were tired after the flight from Connecticut and the hour and a half drive from LAX. He gave my son a pail and shovel to use at the beach the next day and my wife a bottle of wine for us to enjoy during our stay.   The service was great from the front desk, housekeeping, on the beach and valet. The room and rest of the hotel was clean and comfortable.  I can honestly say we had a comfortable stay and no complaints at all.
Manager Response: It means a lot to see our team made you feel right at home after a long day of travel -- I know how tiring that can get! So glad the rest of your trip was just as enjoyable, and we really appreciate the kind words here on Tripadvisor. We'd love to have you back any time!  Best wishes,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This place had amazing service. Staff very friendly. Beach is nice. Room was clean. We had to drag our luggage up stairs. No elevators. Seemed like an older place. Valet parking available. We would stay there again.  Jake
Manager Response: The team will be flattered to hear how impressed you were with the service, Jake -- I'll be sure to pass along the compliments! We certainly are lucky to be by such a great beach, and I'm glad you had a chance to enjoy it. However, I'm sorry our lack of elevators was an inconvenience, but it's great to see that didn't put a damper on your trip. We'd love to have you back any time!  All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Room radically different than other reviews.   Un-renovated room opened on to a heavily trafficked back alley.  No view & quite loud - and that's coming from a resident of NYC.  Did have a porch with 2 chairs overlooking the alley & the valet stand.
Manager Response: I'm really sorry you weren't happy with your room, GiGi. Like you mentioned, we're working on renovating parts of the property, and we haven't gotten to that building quite yet. I hope we'll get the chance to see you in the future, though -- I know we can leave a better impression next time around.  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We loved our stay at this hotel.  We enjoyed the beautiful views from our private balcony.  The staff was great there also.  Everyone always had a smile and a thank you for us.  We will back real soon.  The food at the Deck restaurant was also very good.  We ordered room service on Sunday which was very good also.  No complaints from me.
Manager Response: And this hotel loved having you, Dustin! I'm really proud of the team for showing you the kind of service we're about. I've got to agree with you about those views, by the way -- they definitely are beautiful. I hope you'll come back to enjoy them with us soon!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My hubby and I visited Pac Edge for our 10th anniversary.  We let them know prior ro arrival that we were celebrating our anniversary. Upon arrival we received an upgrade to an ocean front room (wow!) And when we got to our room there was a bottle of chilled champs and goodie bucket waiting for us!! So generous!! I could practically lean over our balcony and touch the ocean during high tide. Magnificent!  From Kate who checked us in and out, the friendly valet that stowed our car for us to the helpful housekeeping Houseman that saw us wandering for our room and stopped and helped us find our room (without having to ask him btw)....everyone was super helpful. It doesn't stop there... Brian and Michael at the FD were also epic friendly and helpful as well.  We had dinner at
Manager Response: I love that you and your husband had such a great time here, Susan -- especially since you were celebrating such a big anniversary! That great service is what we're all about here, and I'll be sure to let the team know that they got special shoutouts from you in your review. Can't wait for your next visit -- I hope it'll be sooner rather than later!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Javid helped us immediately when we arrived and offer a bottle of champagne for our anniversary :) it's so close to the best restaurants and night life attractions. The deck and driftwood are awesome and have the easiest beach access. We came here about a year ago and it made for a very relaxing and memorable trip. We for sure are making this a tradition to come often.
Manager Response: I'm thrilled to hear our place is going to be a part of your family's traditions! Helping you guys celebrate your anniversary was absolutely our pleasure -- thanks for letting us be a part of it. We'll see you next time!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Pacific Edge is our go to hotel in Laguna. The oceanfront rooms have fantastic views of the beach areas. We enjoy the nights listening to the waves through our open door to the balcony. In the mornings we ordered room service, and stayed on the balcony until the sun was out. I am allergic so I must have nonsmoking and non pet rooms. It's terrific that those rooms are right above the sand! For smokers there are designated areas outside. And for pet owners there are rooms for you. You must contact the hotel directly if you have any special requests. I accidently called another booking site, and when I checked that my specific requests were recorded, they were not. And, no, the reservation was only for a regular room. Luckily I caught this and was able to get a refund, and rebook
Manager Response: Thanks for the thorough review, Karen! It's wonderful hearing how we were able to accommodate you -- and it's almost as cool that we've become your go-to spot whenever you need a place to stay here in Laguna. Hope your next visit is before too long -- I have a feeling that balcony misses you guys!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We came to Pacific Edge to end a great day with the family and enjoy the night at the beach. Javid went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed to have an enjoyable night. Checking in, you can expect to be greeted with a polite attitude, but Javid made us feel like we had known each other for years and was such a genuinely kind man. We had such an amazing stay, we were very grateful. Highly recommend Pacific Edge, we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Glad to hear you had such a great experience with Javid! We're lucky to have him on our team. Thanks for taking the time to leave this review, Anthony -- I appreciate the feedback, and am happy you enjoyed your stay. We'd love to host you again in the future, so keep us in mind!  All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Stay at Pacific Edge Hotel
