Summary: What a great stay my wife and I had at Pacific Edge Hotel!  We spent four nights here and it was just what we needed.  The front desk staff was exceptionally accommodating as were housekeeping and the valets.  The property was clean, well maintained and right on beautiful Laguna Beach.  From our room (which was oceanfront) and lanai we could see all of Main Beach and the bluffs at Heisler Park.  We sat on the lanai nightly and watched the most beautiful sunsets.  The hotel has two restaurants that offer ocean views.  We had breakfast twice at Driftwood.  The food was great and seeing dolphins swimming in the ocean from the breakfast table was even better.  Finally, know this.  Everything that you want to do in Laguna is within walking distance of the property.  This includes the
Manager Response: James, it was great seeing you and Lee. I'm so happy that we were able to catch up during your much needed vacation and that you had an incredible stay with us. We look forward to your next trip out!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect from the first second we arrived.
Summary: We found parking immediately (in a beach town like laguna that is a huge deal). My wife and I were greeted at the front desk be Javid. I work out of hotels very often and i have never met a hotel rep as good as him. He made sure we had the best room available, made great recommendations about local restaurants (every recommendation had life-changing food). And he was one of the friendliest people I've met in a while,  a truly likable guy.   The room was also great: very clean (even by our ocd standards),  we had a great view of a beautiful beach, it was SO QUIET inside our room that i forgot we were in a hotel and the room was very stylish.   I usually don't write gushing reviews be this wonderful hotel deserves to be praised.
Manager Response: We all think Javid is awesome, Nate, and I'm happy you found the same thing to be true. It's wonderful that your room lived up to your standards and that you enjoyed your visit so much! See you next time you find yourself in Laguna.  Cheers, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We received excellent service at the Pacific Edge Hotel. Everybody was gracious and eager to help any way they could. Upon check-in Zach and Javid were wonderful. They upgraded our room to an ocean view with a balcony. We were thrilled. The room was large and well kept. Room service was also very good. We had a perfect trip and the accommodations were perfect.
Manager Response: I'm thrilled that you were thrilled! Providing excellent service is a definite priority of ours, so I'm glad that came across. I'll be sure to let Zach and Javid know they got a special shoutout here -- they'll be happy to hear it. I hope we'll see you back next time you're in Laguna Beach!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: this is a 3 star hotel that due to the staff makes it a 4 star hotel i was here on business so i stayed in a village room.. i assume the ocean view rooms would be much more romantic if i was staying for the weekend. the hotel is in a great location with an incredible restaurant (driftwood) next store. Rooms are comfortable.
Manager Response: I'm definitely happy to hear that the service hit the mark -- I'll be sure to let the team know that you said so! I'm sorry if anything about your room wasn't quite as impressive, though. We want everything here to be nothing short of five-star worthy, and we're in the process of renovating parts of the property to make sure that's the case. That said, I hope we'll see you next time you're in the area -- I have a feeling you'd really enjoy one of those rooms with a view!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This hotel is right on the water. The rooms are cute. Overall it is a wonderful hotel to stay at. It can be pricey so if you're looking for a place on a budget, this might not be the one you want. But still a great hotel.
Manager Response: It's just wonderful that you walked out of our doors with a five-star impression, and I can't thank you enough for stopping by our page here and letting me know as much. I hope we'll get to see you back next time you're in Laguna Beach!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We stayed at Pacific Edge for 4 evenings and experienced two different room types.  The first two nights we were in a King room (#129) in the Reef building, right on the beach. As others have said, you can't beat this location! The room was clean, updated, and the balcony facing the ocean was perfect.  The last two nights we switched to a one bedroom apartment (#13) in the Bahia building, which sits behind the beachfront buildings.  We were on the third floor and still had a fabulous view of the ocean. This room was clean, a little older, however, much larger than the first room. We had a nice living/dining area, small kitchen, and a larger bathroom. This was a surprise trip that my husband had planned, and after reading the reviews on Tripadvisor I had my doubts, but we
Manager Response: I'm glad that you and your husband enjoyed your stay here! It sounds like you guys had a pretty fun surprise visit here in Laguna Beach, and it's awesome that we got to be a part of it. I appreciate the feedback you left here, and can't wait to let the team know they left a great impression. I hope you and your husband find yourselves back in the area down the road sometime!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Our family gathered at Pacific Edge this Christmas to remember our my husband and my father, who passed away this year. It was the perfect family destination. This hotel deserves five circles in every category in which hotels are generally rated bThe staff is helpful, kind and hospitable in every way, making checkin, checkout, beach reservations and getting on the internet (important particularly to the teens) easy. The facility is incredible! Our rooms were on the oceanfront, and the thrill of watching the sun set behind Catalina is indescribable. Being lulled to sleep by the sound of the Pacific is also amazing. Some of our party did not have oceanfront rooms- they were great too. The hotel is within walking distance of downtown Laguna Beach but you never have to go anywhere
Manager Response: I know your visit was an incredibly important one for you and your family, Susan, so it's really heartwarming knowing that you guys enjoyed each aspect of your stay. Again, thank you for the reviews and support -- we're looking forward to welcoming your family back in next time.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Charming Hotel with Some Good Perks
Summary: Stayed here over Christmas. This trip was meant to be a relaxing holiday weekend getaway fully disconnected from technology and unnecessary distractions. What I was looking for: lots of space, ocean view, central location so I wouldn't have to drive for food, reasonable price, dog friendly, less than 5 minute walk to the beach. All of those expectations were met 100%.   What I liked: - Friendly, professional staff. The valet guys were exceptionally helpful. - I booked a 1 bedroom apartment so I had plenty of space. The bonus was the size of the sliding glass doors and balcony... I wasn't expecting so much sunlight and outside sitting space. - The rooms could absolutely use some updating but I personally really liked the old beach decor/vibe. It was really quaint to me. The
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the thorough review -- I really appreciate the compliments and candid feedback alike. It sounds like you enjoyed your visit for the most part, and I'm thrilled to hear that -- especially since you were spending the holidays here. Hope to see you and your pup next time you're in Laguna Beach!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Can't get closer to the ocean than this!
Summary: We had two nights in the OC in late October 2015, on the way back to Australia from a trip to Cuba and Mexico.  I had researched the accommodation for this leg fairly intensively, as we wanted to be on the beach without paying a ridiculous rate! So I found the Pacific Edge.  The other reviews are right that this hotel looks to have been assembled from a number of separate places. Having stayed here now and seen the property, I assume it is correct that your experience would differ quite a bit depending on which building you were in.   We had decided to book a room in the 'Reef' building and were very happy with it. You couldn't be closer to the ocean than our room was. In fact I am pretty sure that Australian building codes would not allow a building to be so close to the ocean!
Manager Response: It sounds like you guys had a nice time here in Laguna Beach, and I'm happy that you decided to stay with us! It's great that so much about your stay impressed -- I look forward to sharing your compliments with the team. I also appreciate the candid feedback, particularly regarding your balcony. I'll be looking into that. Again, thank you for the thorough review, and I hope we'll see you guys if you're ever back in the area!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This is a very friendly hotel, staff could not do enough for you and the free coffee in the foyer is a bonus, rooms are very clean but a little small, two pools that are nice and warm and great views if you are beech side. There is a parking charge as space is limited. I will be returning, loved it....  Plus a free bottle of bubbly when you check in.....nice touch
Manager Response: I'm so proud of the team for showing you the service we're about here, Steve. I'm beyond thrilled that you enjoyed everything from our foyer to your own room. Can't wait until your next trip to Laguna Beach!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: If you stay in this hotel, get an oceanfront room!! The views are stunning. I went with family, but this hotel would be an ideal place for a romantic get-away for a couple. The staff there are very accommodating. We needed a microwave to heat meals for a young child. Within minutes, the microwave was delivered to the room. The location is great, close to stores, a market and restaurants. The pool area was nice. We dined at two of their dining facilities. Although the service was a bit slow, the ocean scenes and pleasant atmosphere compensated for that. I would definitely return there.
Manager Response: I'm so happy to hear that guys enjoyed your stay with us, Debbie! It sounds like you fell in love with those views, and that's wonderful. I hope we'll get to see you back again -- the team would love to welcome your family back in!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: loved this hotel as it is located right on the beach!  the surrounding scenery is beautiful... the hospitality of the front desk is amazing!  they were so helpful during my stay there.  i truly appreciate the services of the gentleman at the front desk who assisted me with directions 3 times before i arrived.  his patience had not grown dim as when i arrived he presented me with a wonderful welcome including a bottle of very fine wine.  my spirits were lifted immediately by the staff and continued throughout my stay. you cannot ask for a better spot right on the beach or better service of the Pacific Edge on Laguna Beach team.  Amazing stay... I look forward to returning!
Manager Response: I love that you loved the location as much as we all do, Lisa. It sounds like the front desk showed you the kind of service we're about right from the get-go, and that's great, too. Looking forward to that return visit!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Enjoyed everything about this lil spot from super lax & friendly check in to beautifully presented breakfast our last morning.  Everyone we encountered were professional and courteous. Bryan and Zach, way to go, Keep wearing those smiles guys!
Manager Response: I'll have to let them know that you gave them a special shoutout here -- I know they'll be thrilled to hear it! It's just music to my ears hearing that you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay. I'm looking forward to the next time we see ya back in!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Stayed in the Reef section of this hotel Dec 12-13 with my brand new boyfriend.  Beautiful room, complimentary bottle of wine, sliding door and screen leading onto balcony over the sand and waves, facing the sunset.  Forever memories made in Room 125. Bryan upgraded the original reservation, and we are thanking him to the moon.
Manager Response: I'm happy that you and your boyfriend enjoyed your stay here, Sharon! It sounds like that sunset view won you both over, and that's awesome. Can't wait for your next visit!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel and it was great! When I first pulled up it looks like a small cheap hotel, but it's actually really cute an imitate. My room was spacious and clean. I even had a kitchen. My room was by a road and it was surprisingly quiet. The staff was so nice and accommodating. There are a couple of swimming pools on the property and the private beach is awesome! They have valet parking which is so nice. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay! While I am disappointed that our hotel didn't make a great first impression from the curb, I'm so happy to hear that you found our rooms to be cute, intimate, and our staff to be accommodating. When you're on vacation, you should be able to relax fully and we feel that a smiling, friendly staff is integral to that.   Thanks for spreading the word about our place in Laguna Beach and we hope to welcome you back soon!   Until then,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Extremely Disappointed - Stay Out of Room 74
Summary: I know Laguna very well, even lived there.  For positives, this hotel is in a great location near Main Beach between PCH and the beach.  The check-in was pleasant enough, although I got no info about the pools, beach access, check-out time, etc.  But the room - I truly believe that given a budget of $50 I could have done better (minus the mattress (not good) and the tv).  Very elderly carpet, thin cheap curtain, those 2-for-$5 pieces of foam pillows, very poor lighting, adequate antiquated bath.  Once burnt and no more, even though I plan to be in Laguna a bit this year.  Maybe there are nice rooms - not 74!!! And things are just in bad shape - broken tiles in elevator, old pools, etc.  Too bad.
Manager Response: I'm happy you enjoyed our location, but it's disappointing that other parts of your stay didn't impress quite the same way. We're in the process of renovating parts of the property, and I know that your concerns will be addressed there. That said, I can understand your frustrations and apologize that you didn't enjoy your accommodations as much as you should have. I sincerely hope you'll be back in the future so we can make this up to you.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This hotel is amazing!  We were staying for a night and my pregnant wife wanted a king sized bed, when I had booked a queen.  Despite the fact that it moved us to an oceanfront room, the supervisor, Javid, upgraded and even personally showed us to our new room.  It was excellent service and the room and the view was second to none.  I give this hotel, specifically its staff, my highest rating!
Manager Response: Although I'm certainly happy that you and your wife enjoyed your room, Dan, the best part of this review is hearing that Javid showed you exactly the kind of service we're about. I'm so happy that you walked away with a five-star impression in that regard, and can't wait to see you guys again in the future.  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This place is ALRIGHT when it comes to needing a place to stay in Laguna.   As other reviews have stated, small rooms, outdated everything, in-wall unit for AC, dirty bathroom tub, & very outdated, housekeeping will make your bed, take out the trash and that's it (empty wine bottles left out, clearly un-vacummed, etc).  Beds and sheets not comfortable.  I had to upgrade my room because I didn't want to face the busy and loud South Coast Hwy.  The doors and walls in this whole place are VERY thin,  making you hear EVERYTHING going on outside.   Okay, fine.   Upgraded $50 a night extra for a rear-building, but now facing the ocean between two buildings (there's an alley between the rear building and the building actually on the beach).  Real downside though was there were
Manager Response: It sounds like you had a bit of a mixed experience here, and I'm sorry that you didn't walk away with a better impression. Your room should have been perfectly clean, and I'm so sorry if that wasn't the case. Rest assured I'll be looking into that further. As far as your other concerns go, we're in the process of remodeling parts of the property, and I'm confident that should you decide to say with us again, you'll walk away with a much better impression of what we're all about here. All of that said, thank you for the feedback, and I hope we'll see you sometime down the road.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Location is great!  3 blocks from downtown and very close to a grocery.  Stayed in the 2 bedroom apartment (number 7).  Although it was a great value for the location we were surprised at how "dated" the apartment is.  The lobby of the hotel is quite charming but the pink bathtub, tile and paint colors in the room didn't mirror the charm of the lobby.  We'll stay at this hotel again due to the location.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us while you were in Laguna Beach, Janagg! I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay -- thanks for the feedback about your reactions to the room. It's always helpful to hear what our guests think.  Looking forward to your next visit, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We reserved an ocean view room.  We had a wonderful balcony with two chairs and a table.  The view was wonderful, the sound of the surf coming in was just what I wanted.  Great sunset and moon set!  Loved it.  Staff was very helpful and efficient.  Room wasn't luxurious, but comfortable and clean.
Manager Response: From the service to the views you got to enjoy from your balcony, I'm so happy that you walked away with a five-star impression of us here, Carol. Hope we'll get to see you next time you're in Laguna Beach!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: The Best Place in Laguna beach hands down!!
Summary: Have been staying as a family at this property for over 40 years...it is the most magical and beautiful place you can take your family to experience an amazing beach vacation !!! The rooms are amazing and clean with beautiful views of the ocean...the service is Awesome...and everything from great restaurants ..bars..night life ...are only steps away..the service and GM Thomas are very friendly and care about your stay..this is a must stay if you are in the Laguna Beach area !!!
Manager Response: Jeff, it has been a true pleasure having your family be a part of our family for the past 40 years. It's great having you share your wonderful experiences with all of our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back soon for your anniversary.  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: If you love the beach and hearing the waves from your room...a room in the Reef Building is magical!  What a special day and birthday with my wife.  Check-in was wonderful as we were given a choice of several available rooms and later called in our room to confirm that we were happy!  Will be coming back... and back again.  Our favorite ON THE BEACH hotel in Southern California.
Manager Response: This is awesome to read, Peter. Of course, it's always great to hear when a guest has enjoyed his or her stay, but this is especially cool since you guys were here celebrating a birthday! Thank you for the support and for coming by -- we're looking forward to your next visit!  Warmest wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Gorgeous views!! The bungalows are an amazing place to spend an evening, even this time of year. Enjoy a sunset, dinner and a drink at the restaurant, cuddle up and listen to the waves. The sunset and Catalina views are unbelievable. I will definitely be returning. Would be a great place to throw a party!!
Manager Response: So happy that you enjoyed those sunsets and views here with us, Brooke! It was a pleasure having you come stay with us, and I couldn't be more grateful for your support here. Hope we'll see you again before too long!   Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: If you want to be right on the beach, Pacific Edge is the place to be
Summary: My husband and I and our family have been coming to Pacific Edge for 30 years.  We love the ocean view rooms as they are as close to the beach as you can get.  The Staff are excellent and bend over backwards to make your stay as comfortable as possible.
Manager Response: Wow, Marilyn, I'm so proud of the team for leaving this kind of impression on you. Thank you so much for sharing this here on Trip Advisor -- we really appreciate you helping us spread the word. Can't wait until your family's next visit!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Tiny, ugly room. Bathroom in terrible shape. Slow, incompetent front desk. Worst of all was the hidden valet parking charge of $30/night (plus tip of course). They do not allow self parking at all so you're forced to either eat the charge or gamble with street parking and meters.
Manager Response: I'm really sorry to hear that you weren't happy with your room, Devin. I'll have to look into those concerns about the bathroom and the service -- as difficult as it was to read your comments there, I appreciate the candid feedback. That said, I know we have what it takes to leave an outstanding impression, and I really hope we get the chance to do so sometime in the future.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The whole wall is a window so all you see ocean. We had an ocean front view and it was definitely breathtaking.I went to bed with the sound of the ocean crashing against the rocks....so soothing....great place to stay
Manager Response: I'm glad you got to enjoy the ocean here with us, Monique -- both the view and the sound of it! Thank you so much for leaving us these stars. I can't say how much we all appreciate it. Hope we'll get to see you again soon!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This hotel is right in the center of Laguna Beach.  The beach is within walking distance and there are several restaurants within walking distance.  The hotel's parking is very small but there is valet parking which makes it easier.  The trolley picks up right in front of this hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for coming by and for letting us know a little bit more about your visit. I'm happy that you had a positive experience here with us -- hope we'll get to have you back in before too long!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: One of the best hotels for location that we have stayed. We had a sea view room which was literally right on the beach.  Quite difficult to get to sleep at first with the crashing waves, but lovely to hear.  An absolute surfers paradise. Lovely room and bathroom, good shower.  The only draw back was no room safe, so you have to leave your valuables in your room or carry them with you!! Two lovely outdoor pools and Jacuzzi. The staff were wonderful and couldn't do enough for you.  Our only disappointment was that we only spent one night there.  Had we known it was paradise we would have stayed longer, but were moving on to San Diego.
Manager Response: I've got to say it's pretty cool that you found our spot to be a surfer's paradise -- I know the team will really enjoy hearing that. Although I'm definitely excited that you enjoyed your room, the coolest part about this review was hearing how much the staff impressed. I'll be sure to give them an extra pat on the back. Hope we'll get the pleasure of seeing you next time you're in the area!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Got an amazing price for a hotel that's  literally ON the beach. Hotel is located in middle of town with all the restaurants and boutique shops. Valet parking $27 night or try to find meter on the street because it's free at night after a certain time. Remember to feed the meter at 8am! Free wifi, business center, and small pool. No pet fee or weight restriction. The Deck and Driftwood restraint are excellent, appropriately priced, and with an amazing view. Try the Benedict for breakfast -- so good! Hotel guests can rent beach towels, chairs, and umbrellas. Very clean and private -- walked our dog (leashes) along the ocean and it was perfect weather.   Now for the room... Since we booked with Hotwire I knew there's a reason it's so cheap and thus wasn't expecting an ocean view
Manager Response: While I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay for the most part, Myrna, it's concerning to read about your room. I can assure you, the health and safety of our guests is our top priority, so I'd like to personally apologize for any bugs in your room. I'd really like to resolve this for you, so if you'd like to discuss this further, please feel free to give us a call.  Thank you, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: beautiful hotel with amazing views right on the beach. Laguna beach is my favorite. i stay here whenever possible I LOVE IT! I recommend this place to de-stress and enjoy the beach. within walking distance of everything. lots of fun in the sun.
Manager Response: Thanks for the recommendation! I'm so happy that you enjoy your visits as much as we all do. Thanks for the loyalty, by the way -- we all appreciate it so much.  Looking forward to next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Close to the beach, that's it
Summary: I was visiting for work and thought I would take advantage of my proximity and stay by the beach, all I can say is that the pictures of this place are deceiving.  Room - I disliked every single thing about this room, I can't wait to leave - walls are grey and the paint is chipped - my only window was a sliding glass door exposed to the street, I'm traveling alone so I had to close it - everything about this place is depressing to me, its grey and brown and dark - shower is like a trickle and the tile is dirty - the towels show stains from previous guests - the $4 waters were opened - fairly positive it wasn't vacuumed or cleaned  Amenities - nice aromatherapy products - pool and spa area are cute - free wifi - 2 restaurants on property, beach facing  Location - to be honest, I
Manager Response: I'd never want you to walk away anything other than completely happy with your room, Elysia -- I'd like to sincerely apologize that wasn't the case. We'd never intentionally deceive any of our guests, and I apologize if you felt that way upon seeing your room. We're in the process of addressing many of your concerns by renovating the property, and I hope you'll give us another shot in the future so we can get you that five-star experience you were expecting from us.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Room extremely tiny and a definite no thrills. Pretty pricy for what you get, as that late in October should be way cheaper. We paid $500 for 2 nights. Yikes! The only reason we would consider going here again is that it is on the beach + they actually have lounge chairs with cushions and umbrellas!
Manager Response: Cristie, I'm disappointed that we didn't prove our value to you when you stayed with us. Our prices are reasonable given location, level of service, and the overall quality of your stay -- but it sounds like we weren't at our very best. I hope you can give us another chance to give you the experience you were looking for.   Thank you,  Thomas Lee, General Manager

Summary: This hotel is fantastic, they wait on you to the inth degree.  The front desk staff, Stacie, Javid and Kelvin are the best, EVER!!!!! Housekeeping is the gretest, like having your own personal staff.  Stay here, you will fall in Love.  Thank you for being the best.
Manager Response: Thank you for being the best, Cheryl! This review put a smile on our faces -- we really appreciate you sharing it here. We're looking forward to your next visit already, so we hope it'll be sooner rather than later!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Our getaway to the Pacific Edge was fantastic!! We never had a disappointing moment. The beachfront room was amazing. Very spacious and quiet. The view was awesome. Bryan D and staff went out of their way to make our stay very relaxing. The guys in valet were always very friendly and ready to send us in the right direction. We will be returning thanks to all at The Pacific Edge.
Manager Response: How awesome to read that your getaway was fantastic, Kim! I'm thrilled that we helped make your visit relaxing and peaceful -- thanks for letting me know how everyone did.  See ya next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We only stayed 1 night, wish we would have stayed a couple more. The rooms were decent, it was clean and we really enjoyed the balcony and the great view of the ocean.  Front desk was friendly. Never used the pool but took a great photo of it. Everything is pretty much walking distance. I would love to go back and spend some more time there.
Manager Response: We'd love to have you back again, too! Thanks for this review, by the way -- it was great hearing your opinion about everything from the balcony to the service at the front desk.   Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Room was decent but great location!
Summary: Was able to check in early as we had a voucher from Travel Zoo for a standard room with parking included. The building faced the ocean but our room did not so we heard very little road noise which was a concern after reading some reviews.  Every worker we met was helpful and friendly. From the front desk people, the valet service, housekeeping and the beach chair guys.  The location puts you steps from the beach and they have complimentary chaise loungers and towels which was super convenient. The town of Laguna was steps away as we wandered throughout the town daily before and after our beach time.  The room was small like most mentioned. The beds were good, the linens were great and it had free wi-fi and it seemed to have some of the room updated. The only negative we had was
Manager Response: How great to know that you enjoyed your stay with us! It sounds like the service in particular wowed you -- I'll let the team know to keep up the good work. As far as the bathroom goes, I appreciate the feedback and will look into it immediately. Thanks for speaking up about it!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic location on the beach but lackluster rooms
Summary: Since the Pacific Edge is a Joie de Vivre hotel property, I was surprised to discover how worn out the rooms were. Surface treatments such as vintage beach posters and nice linens were great but the room itself looked frayed around the edges. The lobby and reception area were beautifully renovated in a coastal chic style and the property has a killer oceanfront location.
Manager Response: I'd like to apologize if your room didn't impress like it should have. We are in the process of renovating parts of the property, as you mentioned, and I'm confident that your concerns will be addressed in that process. Thank you for coming by and for the honest feedback -- I really appreciate the time you took to share it with us. Hope to see you next time you're in the area! I'd love the chance to leave you with an even better impression next time around.  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This property is AMAZING!!! We would definitely stay here again!  The front desk staff was super friendly - Javid learned this was our first stay and gave us a warm welcome. He give us lots of tips for vegan restaurants and things to do. His hospitality made us feel terrific!  The location is perfect. Literally ON THE BEACH!! :) And when we went down to enjoy the sun, there were beach chairs, towels and a sunbrella! :)  Lovely, really lovely.  Once we checked in and parked the car, we could walk to all the shops and restaurants. We didn't need to drive again until we checked out.  This hotel gets our 5-star rating. We loved it and would definitely come again :)
Manager Response: This review is amazing, and I love that you think the same thing about our property. I'm proud of the team for showing you the hospitality we're all about here and can't wait for your next visit!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed here last month for his birthday. We had an exceptional experience. What really made the property stand out from other hotels was the employees. They are all extremely gracious, professional and appear like they genuinely want to be there. Michael who checked us in gave us great recommendations for where to eat and drink. He was well informed about the menus for both of the hotels restaurants and Laguna Beach in general. Have to mention the young men at the beach, Brendon, Eddie and I think Hunter was the other guy who went above and beyond for us while we enjoyed the lounge chairs provided to us. They even gave us bottles of water and sunscreen!  We received a bottle of red with a hand written note for my Husbands birthday which was a great touch and
Manager Response: I'm seriously happy that the customer service we're all about really came through for you and your husband, Tracy -- especially since you guys were here celebrating his birthday. Thanks for the great review, and we're looking forward to your next visit!  Warm wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: the pictures are a bit deceiving
Summary: I visited this hotel/motel for 4 days. I was eager to stay here due to the pictures posted on various sites as well as some of the jargon used(specially about the gym). The lobby is very cute and inviting and the staff extremely friendly. However, the room i received looked NOTHING like any of the pictures posted. Sadly, when i opened the door my expectation went out of the window into the ocean. Beyond old rooms and furniture. The tv would cut off by itself. the partial ocean view room was mostly parking lot and the building behind the hotel. when i quietly voiced my concern that this did not look like the pictures online, i was advised i could get moved to the renovated room for an additional price per night. As for the state of the art gym. Well that's actually a day pass you
Manager Response: While I am very proud of the team for providing excellent service, I'm sorry you didn't walk away happier with your overall stay. We'd never intentionally mislead you -- as you mentioned, we're in the process of renovating parts of the property and are confident that many of your concerns will be addressed there. Still, I hope you'll consider coming back next time you're in the area. I'd really like the chance to leave you with a better impression.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: What a fantastic hotel for a Laguna Beach visit!
Summary: The incredible hospitality shown by the staff of the hotel,and our stay in a waterfront room made this stop over on our California road trip to Baja a real highlight for us.  Kate and Javid  made sure our Laguna beach visit was all it should be and there is no doubt that we will be back to stay here again.   Get an ocean front room if you can. There was no tub in our room but the large shower was excellent.  The non ocean front rooms can work for you if on a tight budget or just passing thru but a holiday is about experiencing the best a vacation area offers and the waterfront room ambience epitomises what a California beach holiday stay is all about.... late afternoon relaxing on your patio watching the waves roll in, having the sound of the ocean lulling one to sleep, and as a
Manager Response: I'm thrilled that the location of our place impressed, Darryl! It's always great to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay as much as we enjoyed having them, so thank you for leaving this review. I'll let the team know what a great impression they left, by the way!   Hope to see you back before too long, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Great for an evening of fun
Summary: The hotel was located in the heart of Laguna and allowed us to walk to all of the attractions and restaurants we wanted to go to. The rooms are super small, think New York, and the view is well less than desirable unless you splurge for the ocean view. The pool is not on the ocean side and the amount of people coming from the ocean means there is sand and kids sand toys everywhere even the walkways. However, for an evening of funning Laguna it was perfect.
Manager Response: I'm sorry if parts of your visit weren't right where they should have been -- I want each of our guests to leave with nothing short of a five-star impression each time they stay with us. Still, it sounds like you appreciated the location and had a fun time here in Laguna, and I'm really happy to hear that. I hope you'll come back to see us for another visit down the road!  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Good but nothing to write home about
Summary: I stayed here for a wedding for which we got a room rate of $160 with tax.  I split a room with a friend so we had two double beds.  The bathroom was very tight and could only fit one person at a time.  The refrigerator was wedged into the closet area which was next to a door which adjoined the room next to us.  The adjoined door was not able to be opened but you could hear everything next door if you were in the closet area.  Luckily, it was other friends from the wedding in that room, so we weren't too concerned.  The location and convenience to everything is a plus.  The pools are good as are the restaurants. I just don't think it was anything special, but served it's purpose.
Manager Response: It's really great that you appreciated the location of our place, as well as the pools and restaurants! I'm sorry if a couple of things about your room didn't leave quite as positive of an impression, though. We're in the process of renovating parts of our property, so many of your concerns will be addressed there. All of that said, we hope to see you next time you're in Laguna Beach -- I know we have what it takes to leave an even better impression next time around.  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: We had a wonderful four days....
Summary: We had an ocean view room and it was really very nice.....bathroom could have had more space, but that was only negative.  We were there for our daughters wedding and the whole experience was perfect...the hotel is very willing to assist in all your needs.  The food and service was also very good and moderately priced .....people at the front desk were very friendly and helpful.  They made the wedding a very special moment in time   Thank you staff at hotel.
Manager Response: I'm so happy you enjoyed your stay, Carol -- especially since it was for a once-in-a-lifetime experience! I appreciate the five stars so much, and hope you and the family will be back next time you're in the area!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My husband and I had an amazing night's stay in the Pacific Suite. Started off great with the friendly staff and even greeted by the general manager. We got to the room to find ice cold beer waiting!  We had an awesome dinner at The Deck (The Deck shrimp tacos are the best I've ever had). And of course the view of the ocean is second to none. Even the Valet service was outstanding.   Overall, the best experience we've had at a hotel. I can't say enough good things about our stay, it was perfect. Pacific Edge is a cool, surfer vibe hotel with high end touches and 5 star staff. Check it out.
Manager Response: Best experience you've had at a hotel? I can't say how great that was to read, Jacqueline -- thank you for sharing! The entire team was just as thrilled as I was to read this review, and it's safe to say that we're looking forward to your next visit!  Warmly, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: choice of two fabulous restaurants overlooking the beach
Summary: although the rooms are average, the food at both restaurants was excellent and the service in the bar was superb, great choice of cocktails and bar staff happy to make cocktails not on the list to suit your taste. the location of the hotel more than made up for average rooms and I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: I'm happy to read that you enjoyed your visit with us, Karen! It sounds like you're as much of a fan of the location as we are, and that's awesome. Looking forward to your next stay!  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Room was nothing special, but the location was great for a reasonable rate at the last minute. Close to the beach and nice people at the front desk.  Restaurant and bar with a beach view part of the hotel.
Manager Response: I'm so glad that you enjoyed the location as much as we do! I'm sorry if the rest of your visit was just average, though. We're working on renovating parts of the property, and I'm certain that we can leave you with a five-star impression next time around!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We stayed in Laguna Beach for 1 night at the Pacific Edge Hotel/Motel. The room was very tiny located towards the noisy freeway. Our neighbors were very noisy. Nothing special or worth mentioning about this motel. I would look elsewhere for a room; we will not be back for sure. Luckily we left the next day.
Manager Response: I'm so sorry if your room wasn't as peaceful and relaxing as it should have been, Daniela. We're actually in the process of renovating parts of the property, and I'm sure you'd enjoy some of those updated rooms -- I hope we'll get the chance to give you a five-star impression sometime down the road.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Pacific Edge for 3 days for my daughters birthday. We checked in very late at night. The lobby seemed very clean and cute. Our room was much smaller than expected, bathroom was dirty, ironing board broken, circuit couldn't handle 2 items plugged in. The  employees are hit and miss. Some of the front desk staff are very professional and pleasant, some are not. The gentleman at vallet was always friendly and acknowledged me each time we passed by. The employees sent to help with the ironing board were very helpful. The best part of the trip was the day we spent on the beach. It is beautiful on this beach. Rafael and Hunter were the most helpful and accommodating employees we encountered. They made our day!  I recommend paying extra for the beach front room and
Manager Response: I'm so happy that you fell in love with the beach like we all have! I'd like to apologize if your room wasn't as impressive, though -- rest assured that I'll be looking into each of those concerns. I'm pretty disappointed to hear that some of the staff wasn't as accommodating as they should have been. I'll regroup with them about that to ensure that we're continuing to provide the excellent service we're all about. Hope you'll come see us again in the future -- we'd all love to welcome you back!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Beach Front Room Just what we were looking for
Summary: We reserved the beach front room and that's what we got! It was perfect. Just what we were looking for. Glass balcony, little table and chair were all perfect to enjoy the day and apertif with the sun setting. We were glad we paid up for the beach front room. Frankly it would have been a huge let down to have stayed anywhere else but right on the beach in laguna beach. Worth every penny to splurge and get what we were looking for. Beds were comfy. Wifi worked fine. Bathroom tiny but sufficient. Pools nice. Restaurants serve excellent food. The little girl charged with seating was incompetent but easy to overlook in such nice environment. No real need to test the service since we were looking for beach vacation and that's what we took advantage of. Kids built sandcastles all day.
Manager Response: Thanks, Barbara, for the great review! I'm so happy to hear that so many aspects of your visit were perfect. It sounds like the entire family enjoyed their stay, and that is just music to my ears. I'm already looking forward to seeing you guys next time!  Warmest regards, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for one night whilst heading South on a California road trip and after a long day travelling, this beach front location with its laid back vibe was just what we needed.   The welcome was warm and the manager on duty was great for recommendations and all the info we needed.   Valet parking was quick and efficient and $27 seems reasonable to me for peace of mind and a secure vehicle.   Our room was lovely with a balcony overlooking the ocean - room 131 in the Reef building. The decor is modern with some nice original touches and although the bathroom was tiny, the room was not and everything was spotless. There was a fridge and great coffee!   We could hear the sea and it's pretty loud if you're a light sleeper but well worth it for the chance to drink morning coffee
Manager Response: I'm so happy that you had a warm welcome and loved your room, Sorellina! I'll be sure to give the team an extra pat on the back for leaving such a great impression. It's so cool that we got to be a part of your visit here to the States, and I hope we'll see you next time you're in the area!  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Ritz Carton prices for Ritz Cracker crumbs. More like a three storey motel than a hotel.
Summary: Cars parked outside your front door in the ugly blacktop parking lot overlooking the Pacific coast Highway. The two pools located in the parking lots have no towels or lifeguards. After waiting over an hour for beach towels to be delivered from the front desk, I had to retrieve them myself. Beach is fantastic if you could get a chair umbrella or a towel. Overhead a mother dropping off her children state, "just tell them your guests." Later they were picked up by their father from the pool and all left in a truck with the beach towels in tow.  Night One:  Given a 8x12 jail cell overlooking the highway and parking lot. A plastic 4x3 dated shower stall. Two double beds, one night stand, no dresser, no table, no chair, small closet with an old curtain for a door. TV did not work.
Manager Response: I'm so sorry to hear that you didn't leave with a better impression of our place, Red. From the issues with your room to the wait for your meals, I can certainly understand your frustrations there, and would like to sincerely apologize that we weren't able to take care of those concerns in the moment. I'll most definitely have to talk with the team that worked the dates of your visit to make sure we're continuing to do all we can to make our guests comfortable. This kind of experience is absolutely not up to our own standards, though, and I hope we'll get the chance to prove that to you down the road.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: On the beach. Perfect for us.
Summary: Pretty beach, walking distance to shops, restaurants, surfing and beach volleyball.  We stayed here for friends' wedding weekend.  The place was reasonably priced and we could hear the ocean waves all night long.  Gorgeous sunsets were a plus!!!
Manager Response: It sounds like you fell in love with the beach just like we all have, Katie, and I'm happy to hear that! I'm glad that you enjoyed your visit here with us -- especially since you were all here for such a special occasion. I hope we'll see you next time you're in the area!  Warmest regards, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Yes, great location, friendly staff but accommodations are a complete let down!
Summary: This is NOT a boutique hotel by any stretch on the imagination.  Furniture chipped, scraped, dented, carpets stained, mold in the bathroom, toilet backed up, tripped a circuit with the hair dryer.  In the end, the pictures on the website tell a great (marketing) story but reality feel short by a long shot.  We are planning our next trip to Laguna in November and will not stay at the Pacific Edge again.
Manager Response: I'm so sorry if you had some issues with your room here. The team would have been happy to address those concerns for you in the moment had they known about them, but I can understand your frustrations there. While I can assure you that we'd never intentionally mislead you, I sincerely apologize if your room wasn't what you were expecting.   Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: great staff, great location,  great city,  good value
Summary: Loved the staff here,  super friendly,  loved the location right on the beach,  the room was a bit musty and small but clean.  the price was great for waterfront.  I would definately stay again.  Also we all loved the shampoos/conditioner and lotions.
Manager Response: I'm proud of the team for giving you that warm welcome, Karen! It sounds like you fell in love with that with that view of Laguna Beach -- I've got to say I'm with you there. I still haven't gotten used to it myself!  Hope to see you again down the road! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The staff at the Pacific Edge Hotel couldn't have been nicer.  From the front desk to the bellman, they all were 100% service with a genuine smile.  I checked in on a Sunday evening, and had a Beachfront King room in the Reef building.  The rooms are nicely redecorated.  A little young and basic for my taste, but still clean and new.  Three+ stars for the room, 5 stars for the staff, 5 stars for the location. I would not stay in any of the other rooms.  Beachfront makes all of the difference.  You're in Laguna Beach; you should be on a balcony over the sand if you aren't actually on the sand.
Manager Response: I'm so happy to hear that the team left a five-star impression. I'll be sure to pass this along to them -- I know it'll make their days. It sounds like you enjoyed your stay here with us in general, and that's great. I hope you'll stay with us next time you're in Laguna Beach!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I believe the experience is quite dependant on where your room is located. Unfortunately for me I was in a room in what seemed like " the old building" ..really a run down motel room. Old . Busy road on one side and valet stand on the other side of the room. Thin walls to hear every bathroom.
Manager Response: I'm disappointed that you left with this impression. Had we of known you felt this way, we would've happily switched your rooms. As you may have noticed, we are currently in the process of renovating so I hope we'll get another chance to show you how great we truly are.   All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Boutique hotel?! More like boutique reception with motel rooms!
Summary: We had this 'hotel' booked through a third party and upon visiting the website, we were really looking forward to beginning our special holiday here. Right on the beach and with cool, contemporary designed rooms. Excellent! Wrong!  When we arrived, we were told it was compulsory $27 a night valet parking. Not a great start as we were told it was free parking. When checking in, the staff were very friendly, really welcoming and I was impressed with the reception area. When we went to our room, it was another matter. Two small double beds with hardly any space for cases and a tiny little bathroom, right on the end of what looks like a block of UK council flats. We immediately drew the blinds as we felt on show to the road and pathway right outside our rooms, which was real shame
Manager Response: I'm really happy that the staff left a great impression on you guys, but am disappointed to hear that some other parts of your visit didn't impress quite as much. As far as the parking goes, the spaces are limited around here in Laguna Beach. Because of that, we do offer valet parking to ensure the safety and security of your vehicle. I can certainly understand your frustration had you not been informed of the fee ahead of time, though, and I apologize for that. I'm also very sorry if your room wasn't what you were expecting. Like you mentioned, we are working on renovating the property and we're excited about the future there. I hope you'll give us another chance down the road at giving you a five-star experience -- I know we have what it takes to do so.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 6 nights 20th to 26th August in a party of 8.  Check in was fine, we all had rooms at the front of  one block near reception.  There is an extremely busy road right in front  and you can hear the traffic at all times during the day but especially at night.  The walls are paper thin and lots of them have an adjoining door to a room behind you which is locked but we could hear someone snoring quite loudly.  The room was not very big, the bathroom is tiny and very narrow with a shower, no bath. Hardly any shelving to put your toiletries on and no towel rail to put the hand towel on.  There is a fridge and kettle there with tea and coffee supplied.  There is hardly any room whatsoever to hang your clothes up.  Our bedside table lamp was not working. We asked on the
Manager Response: I'm very sorry to hear that you and your party didn't have the kind of experience here that you should have, Ann. It sounds like there were a couple of issues with your room, and I'm disappointed that we weren't able to take care of them in the moment -- had the team known you were unhappy, they would have done whatever they could to address your concerns then. That said, we're in the process of renovating our property, and I hope you'll get the chance to see the improvements we make for yourself sometime in the future.   Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My hubby and I went here as part of a stop on our honeymoon and we LOVED it.   The beach view room was gorgeous!  The room was huge, modern decor and a very comfortable bed. Pools were the perfect temp and easy access to the beach.   It was exactly what we wanted for a nice getaway.  We had a light dinner at The Deck, it was beautiful as the sun was setting and the food was great!
Manager Response: I'm so happy that you and your husband both enjoyed your stay, Adele -- especially since you were on your honeymoon! It's great that you found what you were looking for in a getaway here with us. I hope you'll be back next time you're in the area!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Best Value you will find ON THE BEACH in Laguna!!
Summary: We got an ocean view room which in my opinion is a must! The room is basic, but clean and modern. The staff is great and the parking valets are avail 24/7. The location is good and the view is perfect. We opened the sliding door and slept to the sounds of the  waves crashing.
Manager Response: Perfect views and a good location? I'm so glad you found both of those things to be true of your stay here! It's even better to know that you enjoyed the staff, too -- I'll be sure to let them know that you gave them a shoutout in this review!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This hotel was formally called Vacation Village and is located in the heart of Laguna Beach and is located directly on the PCH but on the beach side.  Be sure to ask for a Beach room as they are directly on the beach with a perfect view. It is not a top of the line hotel but for access to the village shopping and the beach it is by far the most perfect location in Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: I love that you've enjoyed the location! I'm sorry if other parts of your visit weren't quite as impressive as they should have been, though. Please feel free to let anyone on the staff know if there are any issues with your accommodations when you're here -- anyone on the team would be happy to help you out!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I selected Pacific Edge due to the reviews, photos, and recommendations from friends. When we arrived to the property it was not what I was expecting. {The property is split up very weird} It was cute and beachy, the birds in the cage added a nice warm feeling to the "lobby." We had room 16 which was just two mini stair flights up. The room was ok, nothing spectacular. From the patio I could see the beach and the alley way which takes you to the beach/restaurants/other towers of the hotel. Naturally we decided to go to the beach...it was confusing to get to due to the property layout. Its a quick 3 minute walk but just a little awkward to get to. The beach was very nice, there was someone helping with towels/umbrellas/lounge chairs. He was great! Very relaxing once you get
Manager Response: I'm so happy that you enjoyed your vacation here with us, Richelle! It sounds like you're as big of a fan of the beach as we are -- and that's saying something! Sorry to hear if the layout of the property was confusing, though. Anyone on the team would have been more than happy to give you some additional direction had they known you weren't clear on the layout! In any case, I'm glad that you'll be back in the future. We're looking forward to it!  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, relaxing atmosphere, beautiful views...
Summary: Stayed here with a couple friends last week to make the best of the heatwave. Finding cheap parking was annoying, but there are some spots nearby for $10... Otherwise it's like $30 to park on location.   The room was very clean and comfortable. And THE VIEW was gorgeous. I didn't know what to expect after reading mixed reviews online, but I was impressed.  Highlight of our stay... other than the view... was the super cool and kind Australian guy, Brendan. He was so friendly and welcoming, and provided excellent service. He was quick to set up our lounge chairs, and so hospitable, giving us cold waters (which were much needed, it was HOT out). He came off as a genuinely nice person, not just fake-nice because we were guests of the hotel and he was obligated to be... Just a truly
Manager Response: As they say, when California gives you heat -- time to head to the beach! I'm so glad you and your friends enjoyed those views and your stay in general. It sounds like Brendan left an especially great impression, and I can't wait to let him know how much his excellent customer service wowed you guys. I'm so glad to hear that you'll be back again in the future!  See ya next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We stayed in the reef building on the 2nd floor on the south corner.  If you are staying in the ocean front units check in at the lobby but keep your luggage in your car and then you will drive around behind the lobby to go to valet parking.  We took all of our belongings out and lugged them into the lobby to be told to drive around for valet.  It was kind of strange to not have anyone offer to help with the luggage at the lobby or to leave the car.  Only found this to be strange when we were using the car that night and I asked where to return it and the attendant said you can leave up at the lobby or bring it back down here which ever you prefer.  I am rating this a 5 because of the view, the bed was great, wifi was great, Kerig in room with refrigerator, no microwave.  Seems
Manager Response: It sounds like you guys enjoyed the view and your room in general, and that's really wonderful to hear. I'm sorry if you felt as if our customer service wasn't right where it should have been, though. Although you liking your room is certainly important, we're about more than that here -- I apologize if that didn't come across. I hope you'll come see us again next time you're in the area -- I'd love the chance to impress you in terms of our service, too.  Warmest regards, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Where to start - first of all I should say I booked this hotel based on Tripadvisor reviews and made the decision that the negative ones were from especially picky people whose expectations were too high. Unfortunately I was proved wrong.  I traveled with my husband from NZ for our anniversary and we had booked a deluxe village room for four nights. We arrived early and checked in just before four. The hotel staff were lovely and took our bags to our room. I was slightly nervous when we were led to the "Seas" block of rooms as it was akin to a UK block of flats. The first thing I noticed was no outside patio, however I imagined there may be a seating area in the room. The room we had was extremely dated, the furniture was chipped and scratched with not a single comfy chair never
Manager Response: I'm so sorry to hear that you weren't completely blown away with your rooms here, Louise, especially since you and your husband were here for such a special occasion. It's pretty disappointing that you didn't enjoy your stay here as much as you should have, but please know I'm taking each and every one of your comments seriously. We're working on renovating parts of the property, and I'm certain that if you gave us another shot down the road, we'd be able to get you that five-star experience you deserve.  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Really nice hotel in a great location. Javid who helped us at check in was so amazing. We were getting together because of a death in the family. He was sensitive and caring. His treatment of us while staying at the hotel made us know we would book this hotel again.
Manager Response: I'm glad your stay here was a comfortable one, Elaine. I know the circumstances of your visit were tough, but I'm honored to hear that you found the service here to be sensitive and caring.  Take care, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I, like other reviewers, chose this hotel based on its location right on the water/beach.  Being a family of four we booked one of the two bedroom apartments.  I knew we would not have an ocean view and I was happy to make that sacrafice in exchange for the room.  I was so disappointed with the run-down decor of our apartment. Our apartment had the feeling of a low budget apartment: cheap linoleum flooring in kitchen and bathroom, frayed, stained arm chair and couch. As I am writing this review, I had to revist the JDV website to remind myself why I chose this hotel and room. I almost feel like a victim of false advertising, what is represented was not what the reality.  Which is usually the case with all hotels but with this hotel it was a big step down.  JDV needs to invest
Manager Response: I'm really sorry to hear that those rooms weren't what you were expecting. I can assure you that we'd never intentionally mislead our guests -- your trust is a top priority here. We're currently in the process of renovating parts of the property because we want you to have the comfort you deserve -- we're doing everything we can to improve incrementally over time. That said, I hope you'll give us another shot down the road. I'm certain we have what it takes to get you the experience you were looking for.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: My Favorite Place.!!!!! Soothe My Soul.!!!!!! Perfect Place.!!!!
Summary: Excellent- excellent place to stay. Staff so kind, helpful, wanting to please you-- Bryan Dougherty and Javid is at your service with big smiles..!! Such a delight.!! Great food, rooms are perfect, views are amazing, sun and sand, to die for, and sunsets are stunning, just a must.!!! If you are looking for a place in Laguna Beach, California--- you found it at Pacific Edge Hotel.!! Booked it and relax, and enjoy-- you will no
Manager Response: This review put a smile on my face, Bonnie. Thanks so much for sharing it! I'll have to tell those team members what a great job they did -- I'm sure they'll be just as happy to hear it as I was. Come back and enjoy those views with us soon!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We spent 4 days last week at this hotel in LB. I took TA Reviewer advice & booked a room in the Reef Building, away from the The Deck Bar. Good choice.The room had a large balcony overlooking the ocean. The room was large & clean with a small but adequate bathroom. The room & building are a little dated but the location of the property is excellent as DT LB is within walking distance. Umbrellas, lounges & sand chairs are provided for beach access. I looked at many other hotels during our stay and PE is the best combo of location, comfort, parking, bar & restaurant & beach access. One drawback: AC units vent to neighbor balconies with noise & hot air. Move them, PE! They take away from the gorgeous Pacific Ocean sunsets!
Manager Response: So glad those tips helped you find the right room! It sounds like you had a relaxing stay here with us, and nothing could make me happier than to hear that. I'll certainly keep your comment about the AC units in mind, though. Thanks for the feedback there. That said, I hope you'll be back next time you're in Laguna Beach!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Purely selected on their location and tripadvisor we booked this place through a travel agency. Being it our honeymoon we planned something special to end our further marvelous holiday in the States. We were utterly disappointed... At arriving with our 15 month old son we didn't receive any help with our luggage. My wife is 5 months pregnant, so I had to carried it all to the rooms. Rooms yes, because after checking in, it turned out we got a room with no view and so small that a baby bed didn't fit in. It wasn't even there btw, although we did reserve one.   After complaining at first they offered an upgrade for 50$ a night. We didn't want to pay that amount of money for 8 nights and suddenly a different, free option was available. We got into the new bigger room, only to find
Manager Response: As I want you and your family to feel completely accommodated here, Marc, you can imagine how disappointing this review was to read -- especially since you and your wife were here for such a special occasion. I'm extremely sorry about those mix-ups with your room and that we weren't able to agree on a solution in the moment. I'll certainly be talking with the team about some of those specific concerns, so I appreciate you bringing them to my attention. All of that said, I hope we'll get the chance to make this up to you by giving you a five-star experience that's up to our own standards next time around.  Warm wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Great way to have a staycation
Summary: Great hotel! Right on the water, this hotel is located on a nice little quiet town. Everything in walking distance. If you want a wonderful escape from Los Angeles that is about an hour away, this is the place.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for those five stars, Aries! I'm thrilled that the location impressed you, and hope you'll come see us again next time you need an escape from L.A.!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We got to the hotel earlier than expected. We weren't supposed to be able to check in until 3 and they let us check in at noon. From the parking valets, to the front desk, to all the maintenance and cleaning crew everyone was great.  We ate at the hotel's Deck restaurant right at sunset and it was incredible. The food was great, the entertainment was good and the wait staff was excellent.  All-in-all our experience at this hotel exceeded our expectations and we will definitely go back.
Manager Response: I am so happy that we exceeded your expectations! It sounds like the team really won you over with some great customer service, and I'm extremely proud of them for that. I'll be sure to let them know what an impression they left.  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Avoid this dreadful place if you can! This is one of those cheesy places in which no one has invested for years and which can only exist because of its location. Rooms are terrible and grossly overpriced. Staff admittedly friendly. The walls are so thin, you hear your neighbors unzip their pants...and worse. Most awful place! and which ca
Manager Response: I'm extremely disappointed to hear that your stay with us wasn't what it should have been, Oliver. I really apologize if the care we put into our facilities didn't come across for you. We're actually in the process of renovating some of the property at the moment. All of that said, I'm sorry that you didn't completely enjoy your stay, but really hope we'll get the chance to make it up to you down the road.  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Awesome Ocean Front Hotel and Great Service at Pacific Edge in Laguna Beach
Summary: Beautiful ocean views, amazing, fun and peaceful experience.  If you are looking for the sound of waves and a refreshing oceanfront relaxing experience with a wonderful team of helpful, kind people, then the staff at Pacific Edge are a super choice.  Drew V is the NICEST KINDEST HELPFUL person and the front desk with MARI, CADENCE and KATE are so helpful, genuine and really seek to make your stay at Pacific Edge a great one.
Manager Response: Tonya, I'm happy those views and the sound of the waves both left you with a peaceful, relaxing experience here. I'll have to give all of those team members an extra shoutout -- thanks for letting me know what a great job they did!  Hope to see you next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My wife and I had pleasant trip to Laguna Beach. I would recommend staying at Pacific Edge the view is amazing and the customer service i received from Javid was out of this world. My only recommendations is to upgrade the ac units in the balcony these were very loud and the TV would not turn on. We visited this area in August the weather was amazing. Aadtuionally Joey the valet provided us with some great local restaurants and shopping tips.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you and your wife enjoyed your time in Laguna Beach, James! From great customer service to those views, it sounds like you had a good stay here with us, and that's amazing. Hope you'll come see us next time you're in the area!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: we always stay here, we love it here. On the beach today, the pacific edge employee who helps everyone with loungers, chairs and umbrellas was Brenden was awesome. He brought us sodas and cold water and helped us rearrange our chairs. His accent is fun, and he always had a smile on his face. Thank you Brenden and thank you Pacific Edge for being a great place to be right on the beach.
Manager Response: I'll have to let him know what an impression he left! Thanks for sharing that compliment, and for leaving us this review. I'm so happy to hear that you enjoy your stay each time you come by for a visit.  See you next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I don't know what to say. The VIEW IS SPECTACULAR. The Pacific Ocean is virtually steps away. We had an oceanfront room with a "to die for" view. That's about it. We had been invited to "check in early" which we did. When we arrived, the desk said "nobody reads those". Thus, we waited for about three hours to check in. It still wasn't clean so they gave us another room which was OK, not lovely. THEN, the loud party next door to our room began at 10:00 p.m. and proceeded until 5:00 a.m. There were only two people in the room but I am almost certain some drugs were involved in their mischief which made it sound like a rock concert. Then the rains/deluge of the night before came into our room (literally) which flooded the entire entryway, bath & part of the rug. They sent one
Manager Response: Although it's great that you fell in love with those views, I'm very disappointed that you can't say the same about your room. Of course, weather is unpredictable, but I sincerely apologize if that water wasn't taken care of in a way that made you feel accommodated and comfortable. I appreciate this candid feedback, Patricia -- although it was hard to read, it's certainly helpful to know in what areas we may improve in the future.  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: As close as possible on the beach, very nicely decorated rooms, great food and all the service you need. What more to want from a beach hotel. Keep in mind that this is an outdoors hotel, don't expect a huge lobby and lot of facilities in the hotel. We had a great two days as the last part of our westcoasttrip. Laguna beach itself is a nice place with lots of restaurants. Book a room on the beachfront and you will have a great time.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! It sounds like you definitely enjoyed your trip, and that's wonderful. I hope you'll come see us for your next West Coast trip!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Just got done with our stay at the Pacific Edge and I think my poor room choice is the cause of our average review. We booked a few weeks in advance, chose the standard room. We arrived and checked in at about 2PM. There is parking for check in (for permanent parking read further) just off PCH...   Check in was easy. We were advised of the hotel amenities and how to park. For parking, you get back in the car and go around the block where the Valet is located. Its the only option and its $27 per day. There is no other parking in the area so plan for this. You can then leave your car and walk the town or take an Uber, we did both and both were easy. The hotel comprises a large piece of land between PCH and the beach.... Therefore, many of the rooms are literally on the sand. You
Manager Response: As I mentioned on Yelp, I'm definitely pleased that you enjoyed parts of your stay, John! Of course, I understand that there is some room for improvement as far as you're concerned, and rest assured that I'm taking that feedback seriously. Thank you for sharing it. I'm looking forward to your next visit, though! I know we can leave an even better impression this time around.  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Hearing the waves crashing on the beach was as comforting as when I when I was a kid growing up in my parent's house. The beach side terrace was great for drinks at sunset and the restaurant  food was also good. The one thing that bothered my friend and I was that the room decor was nothing as advertised on the web page.
Manager Response: This review was especially cool to read -- I'm thrilled that the sound of those waves brought you back to your childhood. I do apologize if the rooms weren't quite what you were expecting, though. I appreciate that feedback -- I'll definitely keep that in mind moving forward.  Hope to see you back soon! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This is an older property that could use a renovation/update, but it is clean, the staff is friendly and the prices are reasonable for such a great location. Great walking path adjacent that goes along the beach and through beautiful neighborhoods.
Manager Response: Thanks for the four stars! We're in the process of renovating some of our property, actually -- thanks for the suggestion there. That said, I'm happy the staff and location both impressed. I hope you'll come back soon!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The name of this hotel is a great description for my stay. Much of the property (including the room in which I stayed) is indeed directly on the Pacific ocean. I felt the need to specify that because I found that there are others that advertise as if they are on the ocean, but are not. When I arrived, Stacey was very warm and accommodating while checking me in. She has great energy! Because I am a writer, I was very specific about the kind of room I needed. I was also a bit early but had my dog with me so waiting around for a clean room would have been difficult. She found me a clean ocean-front room (which I is exactly what I reserved) in the surf wing. When I entered my room, the first thing I saw was the beautiful ocean right outside my patio window. The view was
Manager Response: I can certainly tell you're a writer -- this review is beyond eloquent! I'm so happy you had a relaxing, inspiring stay. Those views are definitely pretty easy to fall in love with, and I'm glad you found that to be true, too! I'm sorry about the music bothering you, though. I'm sure if any of the staff had known that was an issue, they would have been more than happy to address that concern. In any case, we're all looking forward to your next visit!  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I spent a weekend here for my friend's wedding and corresponding activities. What a great time! The food was delicious, the views were amazing. The rooms were hit or miss. Some guests had awesome rooms, others had tiny closets. Regardless, the entire group enjoyed themselves and were well taken care of by the staff. I will definitely return.
Manager Response: From the views to the staff, it sounds like you enjoyed your stays, and that's amazing -- especially since you guys were here for such a special occasion! Thanks for giving us a shot and for leaving this review. See ya next time!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Unfortunately, this place left a lot to be desired . . .
Summary: My husband and I recently attended a wedding in Laguna Beach and because a block of rooms was secured at Pacific Edge for attendees, we reserved a beach front room in the Reef Building, described as one of the better ones in the establishment. Important, I believe, is that the bed was firm but quite good (though the pillows were those hard foam ones), the size of the bathroom was only so-so, the toilet paper was that thin, cheap stuff (seems so stingy to stock it and makes me wonder why a guest is not worth spending an extra 25 cents per roll on for a much better product), the water pressure in the shower was great, and the towels were quite substantial and in fine condition. While I realize that this is the beach and one might expect a bit of wear and tear, the carpet had a
Manager Response: First of all, thank you for the incredible thought and detail you put into this review. As I am always looking for ways to improve, this type of feedback is so appreciated. I'm sorry that you didn't get the five-star experience that you were hoping for -- and the kind that's up to our own standard. We're in the process of renovating certain parts of the property, which explains some of your concerns. Still, I hear your feedback loud and clear and will be looking into each specific concern personally. I do want you to know that we appreciate each and every guest that comes through our doors, and I sincerely apologize for anything that may have indicated otherwise. That said, I hope you'll consider giving us another shot in the future -- we'd love to give you that outstanding experience that you deserve.  Warm regards, Thomas Lee General Manager
