Summary: Javid and Michael at the front desk exceeded my expectations. They went above and beyond to correct an issue with my room which was entirely my fault. I found them to be understanding, professional and genuinely friendly. The staff makes this hotel one-of-a-kind!
Manager Response: Providing that one-of-a-kind customer service is always our goal, Danielle, so I'm beyond happy to know that you experienced that here! I'll be sure to let Javid and Michael know that they especially impressed. I'm sure that will make their day just like it made mine.   Looking forward to your next visit! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Fantastic resort right on the beach at Laguna Beach, staff are amazing we got upgraded and had a bottle of bubbly waiting for us in the room. The deck bar is perfect after a few hours of sun bathing, cocktails as the sun goes down! Doesn't get better than that! Definitely would return
Manager Response: From the deck bar to the helpful staff, I'm so glad we helped make your visit to Laguna Beach extra special. We're looking forward to the next time you visit us!  Warm regards, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Lovely place to stay. Great staff, beautiful views, fun location. Big beautiful balcony with a view of the ocean. The rooms are huge and quite fun. Every thing you need is in the room. We had a kitchen, big sofa, and dinning table. Love the beach and so close to all the action in Laguna Beach. Would stay again in a heartbeat. LOVE- LOVE.
Manager Response: Those views definitely are beautiful -- so glad you fell in love with them, too! Thanks for the thoughtful review here. I'm really grateful for you taking the time to help spread the word. Can't wait for your next visit to Laguna Beach!  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Javid at the front desk was fantastic!
Summary: There was a mix up with our room and Javid immediately addressed the situation and gave us a new room that fit our standards.    He even gave us a complimentary bottle of champagne for our birthday weekend.  I recommend the Pacific Edge to anyone going to Laguna Beach looking for a hotel.  The staff really cares about their guests stay.  Major shout out to Javid for making our weekend!
Manager Response: I'll be sure to pass that shoutout along! Thanks for spending your birthday weekend with us, Kevin. I'm happy we cleared up that mix-up for you and got you into the room you were hoping for. I'm also really grateful for that recommendation!  Looking forward to next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Thank you for ANOTHER OUTSTANDING vacation Pacific Edge! This was our 3rd trip to The Pacific Edge this year and I am about to book another trip for October.   I have been staying at this resort for over 40 years, which should tell you a lot! The rooms are DIRECTLY on the beach, the oceanfront ( surf wing or reef tower) rooms are beautiful with big sliding doors that lead directly onto a HUGE balcony overlooking the beach and ocean. The sunsets are the prettiest in the world!  They offer room service or you can eat at The Deck or Driftwood which in on property. Or if you want to venture out... you don't need to drive anywhere. There is the amazing Whitehorse restaurant and bar right down Pacific Coast Highway to the left when you walk out the hotel. There are tons of shopping,
Manager Response: Thanks for this outstanding review! Your loyalty is simply amazing. It's so cool that you were married here and continue to come back so frequently! Getting to see the family each year is so much fun, and having you guys as regulars is our privilege. The detail in this review is incredible, by the way -- I'm sure fellow Tripadvisor users will find it so useful.   Looking forward to October! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Beautiful oceanfront place to stay. The staff service was wonderful. Laguna is a Really nice place to visit. Hotel has a Very eclectic look and cool coastal feel. I can recommend this hotel and especially the customer service we received.  Thanks to the staff we had a wonderful stay!!!!
Manager Response: It sounds like you enjoyed Laguna as much as we do, and that's amazing! I can't say how happy I am to hear that we were able to help make your stay extra special. Those recommendations are awesome -- we appreciate them so much.  Hope to see you guys back soon! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Loved everything about it.  Especially the terrific customer service from the "go the extra mile" staff at all levels.  Special thanks to Madison in the front office for great tips on hot spots in the area. Very helpful!!!  We will definitely be back Soon.   Cheers from the DIG sales Team
Manager Response: Let me start off by saying I love everything about this review, Christy. I'm so glad that our customer service left a great impression. I'll be sure to tell Madison that she especially wowed you guys with her helpfulness!  Looking forward to next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Where to start...? Let's try the location. I concede that the proximity to the beach is a useful plus, but right on the other side is a very busy road. Perhaps you can sleep with the sound of trucks, sirens and car horns serenading you, and making the floor shake, but it sure ain't easy. But that wasn't the loudest sound in the room anyway ‚Äì if you're in room 308 then there's adjoining door to the next room that means you can hear everything they say as if they're right next to you. Not their fault; just the thin walls and gap in the door provided by this hotel. I hope the guys in 307 like listening to my kids watching Alvin and the Chipmunks at 7:30. I'd love to turn the volume down on the TV but I can't: it's either on or off. And how about the bathroom? Well, it's the
Manager Response: As we want each of our guests to have a relaxing, comfortable stay, I'm pretty disappointed to be reading this. We're working on renovating parts of our building, but, of course, those changes take some time to see through to completion. I can understand how these concerns could be frustrating, and I'm sorry that the room wasn't what you were hoping for. Our staff would have been happy to help you with some of these concerns had they known there was an issue. That said, I appreciate your candid feedback -- I'll use it to see where we may be able to make some improvements.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The views are perfect from the rooms overlooking the beach and the rooms are cleverly done if not luxurious. The restaurant is great for breakfast.   We got a great deal with Trip Advisor and will look for them in the future.
Manager Response: I'm beyond happy that Tripadvisor sent you our way, Susan! Those views are hard to get used to -- I'm glad you enjoyed them, too. Please come back by next time you're in the area!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: this is the "brother hotel" of the old casa malibu inn on the beach in the sense that has the same authentic style, beautiful patio and very professional but friendly staff. I have been here as a guest of friends and really enjoy the location as well as everything regards the amenities of this hotel. Rooms are very comfortable and clean.
Manager Response: From the amenities to the location, I'm happy that your visits here have been comfortable. I'm glad that the professionalism and friendliness of the staff came through, too. Thanks for sharing that with me here!  Until next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: A Step Away from the Pacific Ocean!
Summary: The Pacific Edge has it all!!  Pools, Ocean view dining, steps to the beach, lounge chairs, umbrellas.  Our room had stylish furniture, comfortable bed, kitchenette, ample size bathroom with extra vanity area and mirror, new white double pane windows, newer carpet and all very clean except for the frig.  Someone must have caught fish and the maids missed it during clean up.  So close to the trolley and downtown.  Awesome time at the Pacific Edge!
Manager Response: This review was a pleasure to read, Diane! So glad that everything from the furniture to the size of the bathroom impressed. So sorry about the fridge, though! I'll definitely make sure our cleaning staff is making sure to check that, too. Can't wait for your next visit!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: From the outside it looks like a refurbished motel but as you walk around you get a good vibe from just being there. The staff is super friendly, location great, two pools, jacuzzi, game room, beach front chairs, lounges, umbrellas, beach towels are all included. Two ocean front restaurants are there for you so you don't have to leave.  We walked along the beach one night during sunset to a restaurant in town. It was really beautiful and I appreciated that I didn't have to drive or cab to go to dine, shop or just walk around the downtown. There is a free trolley that can take you to the arts festivals or to the other beautiful beaches in Laguna.   We spent three nights there and would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: It sounds like the view left quite the impression on you, Doug -- I've got to say that I'm a pretty big fan of those sunsets too! Whether it was the staff or the good vibes, I'm glad the team helped make your visit extra special. I appreciate those recommendations so much, and I hope to see you the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: The friendliest hotel in Laguna Beach.
Summary: You are welcomed warmly as you check in. Our reservationist Casey was just spectacular. The other Ladies were all great. This time we upgraded to a ocean front room with a balcony right on the ocean. The rooms were impeccably clean, as were the hallways, The beach attendant, Brandon was very accommodating  setting up our lounges and unbrella. It was such a relaxing and enjoyable stay, thanks to the stay that we will surely return again and again.
Manager Response: Of course you enjoying your room is so important to me, but you feeling as if the staff is perfectly friendly and helpful is just as important. That said, I'm beyond happy to know that we've succeeded in each of those areas -- I'll be sure to let the team know to keep up the good work. It sounds like you had a relaxing, enjoyable stay, and that's exactly what we always hope to hear!  See ya next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The first room we were shown was uninhabitable.  The second and last choice was also awful with absolutely no attempt made at interior decoration.  Do not believe the pictures of brightly painted rooms.  Ours was filled with Formica furniture.  This place is worse than a motel six, but cost $349 a night.  Stay away!
Manager Response: I'm deeply sorry that your rooms weren't what you were expecting. As hard as it is to hear that you weren't blown away with your rooms, I appreciate the honesty here. It's always helpful to know where we may improve in the future. That said, we're in the process of remodeling some of the buildings, and I'm confident if you were to give us another shot, we'd be able to find the perfect room for you.  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The good and the bad... The good: we were upgraded to a large room with en suite kitchen facilities which were great, big fridge, cutlery and plates in the room which meant we stocked up at wholefoods and saved on food. Fab coffee brewing, great bath products (lovely minty shampoo). The bad: the room was supposed to have a sea view, this was mainly blocked by the other half of the hotel, closer to the beach. Beach access is via the valet parking lot and feels grungy. Other guests were loud and the room smelled musty and felt dated. Valet parking was USD 27 a night which felt outrageous - we found metered parking on the road for USD 2. Laguna Beach may just be a bit of an expensive beach town where people get less for money.
Manager Response: I'm glad that most of the room seemed to be to your liking, but I'm pretty disappointed to hear that the beach access wasn't what you were expecting. I'll keep that in mind going forward -- I want each part of your stay to be as relaxing and enjoyable as it should be. That said, I appreciate you sharing both your compliments and concerns alike.  Hope to see you next time you're in the area! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times and always enjoy it.  It's location right on the beach with easy access to the beach and its being so central in Laguna is really great.  The friendliness of the staff, the non-pretentious, no frills, beachy feel of the rooms and decor are all great too.  Even the rooms away from the beach are very comfortable and nice and, of course, the rooms with a water view are fantastic.  I highly recommend it for folks wanting a nice, pleasurable, and relaxing place to stay in Laguna Beach.  Also, try the Orange Inn nearby for the best coffee I've had in town and great muffins!
Manager Response: First of all, thanks for the loyalty, Charles! We always look forward to your visits, so it's nice to hear that you enjoy your stays as much as we do. Those recommendations are awesome, by the way -- the entire team is grateful for you helping spread the word.  Looking forward to next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The main thing here is location, location, location - if you want to park your car for the trip, then walk right down to the beach, or to choice restaurants nearby, or to the grocery store, you can't beat this. We had been here in 1999 when it was Vacation Village and i guess the truth is, I was disappointed to see how much it was still like the ancient property it succeeded.   We were an adult couple traveling with a teenaged niece so booked a two-bedroom suite, and it was so old and dated. The bathroom was at the level of a Motel 6, the kitchen area had cracked and stained tile, old fixtures - there was worn carpet, etc. And no shampoo - we had body wash and when we called down to ask for some shampoo we got more body wash (which on the label did not specific for hair as
Manager Response: It sounds like you appreciate our location as much as we do, and that's awesome! Customer service is absolutely a priority of ours, so I'm very proud of my staff for making that come through for your last visit. Still, you should enjoy your room just as much as every other aspect of your stay -- I'm sorry if we didn't quite hit the mark there. We're in the process of renovating our rooms, so I'm sure that we'll be able to find something more to your liking for next time! I appreciate your review greatly -- thank you for taking the time to leave both the compliments and candid feedback alike.  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Brilliant hospitality and location with a throwback feel
Summary: Firstly, this review is made in light of the excellent value for money that the Pacific Edge Hotel presents.  It is an extremely well-located hotel with easy access to the Pacific that has the feel of a very well maintained 1960s seaside hotel.  The main hotel does not sit immediately on the beach - it fronts the Laguna Beach main road - the South Coastal Highway.  However, it is tucked back in a bit and isn't bothered by any noise or congestion.  It has a nice pool (open until 1000 pm) and exceptionally helpful and pleasant reception staff.  This is also the first time I've ever had a hotel text my UK mobile (cell) phone in advance of arrival to ask if there were specifics to the type of room, location and to confirm my arrival times.  I highly recommend responding this, as I
Manager Response: Wow, Mark, this detailed review is so appreciated! I'm so glad to hear that you not only enjoyed this last stay but also that you'll be back again in the future! I look forward to letting the team know that they all succeeded in giving you a five-star experience -- they'll love hearing that they helped make your trip a special one.  Looking forward to next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: If you're looking for the beach, it's right here! Perfect location, on the sand and easy walking distance to Main Beach or downtown area. Enjoyed the breakfast at Driftwood Kitchen. Beautiful sunsets from our balcony and a perfect spot to beat the heat!
Manager Response: From the breakfast to the sunsets, it sounds like you enjoyed your stay here, Jill -- that's just awesome to hear! Thank you so much for letting us know that you enjoyed your visit. We hope you'll be back for another soon!  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Very good hotel for our family of 5.
Summary: We stayed in the Bahia building and the the room was very spacious with a kitchenette and very a large balcony and very minimal ocean view. The large room was great because we were 5 people and everyone had a little space. The bathroom was rather small. The hotel is beachfront so there is easy beach access, with a great beach, and beach attendants.  The pool is OK and is sandwiched between 2 buildings with no towel service. You have to walk to the beach attendant to get towels for the pool. The beach attendants were ok, but not very service oriented.  Valet,  housekeeping, and front desk were all fantastic.  The rooms are quite dated with evidence of wear, but overall, very good value for a family vacation.  A word of advice, this "resort" has 4-5 buildings all in different
Manager Response: It looks like you and your family enjoyed your stay here, and I'm glad that you had a good visit! I also appreciate that tip -- I'm sure other TripAdvisor reviewers will find it helpful as well. As far as the customer service goes, it sounds like there may be room for improvement there as far as you're concerned. Because customer service is such a top priority for me, I'm sorry to hear that. Please know I'll bring that comment, as well as your other concerns, to the attention of the team -- we want to make sure that your next visit is nothing short of five stars!  See ya next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Once or twice a year I drive down from the Malibu area to get away from work and daily life to relax and chill here in Laguna Beach. The Pacific Edge is always my spot and James is always the best Front Desk Manager to take care of my stay. Great time...Thanks!!
Manager Response: I love that we're your go-to spot when you're trying to get some rest and relaxation! The entire team appreciates your loyalty to us so much. We appreciate this review, too -- those five stars mean the world to us.  Look forward to seeing you next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Laguna beach is a great pals for a beach vacation and this hotel is situated right in the middle. Avind and Luis are very helpful in reception and all amenities are easy to find and use The addition of a a full size fridge is really helpful in the room, as well as complementary coffee, sun beds and a great value valet parking service  Really enjoyed the beach front room with a view directly over the back to watch those great Pacific sunsets
Manager Response: We're definitely a fan of those Pacific sunsets, too, so I loved hearing that you got to enjoy them during your stay here! In addition to great views, we want to provide excellent service. It sounds like the team accomplished that for you, and that's just great. I hope you'll find yourself back in Laguna Beach soon!  Warm regards, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Came here from Northern California and love the beach...but our two queen room was so loud...you might as well be sleeping on the street. .not worth the money. ..Do not get the rooms facing the street!!!
Manager Response: I'm so sorry to hear that your room wasn't as quiet as you were expecting, Nancy. Our staff would have loved to help make your stay more to your liking had they known this was a concern of yours at the time. Ultimately, I want each aspect of your stay to be enjoyable and relaxing -- I apologize if that wasn't the case last time. I do hope you'll come try one of our other rooms again in the future, though -- I'm sure you'd really enjoy them.  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Called in for special request that is not the norm and even though difficult, Javid came up with a solution that I know helped me add a special touch to a couples romantic vacation.  Excellent customer service these days is found far and few.  So refreshing to work with someone that really cares and tries to do their best and he did.
Manager Response: I'm so glad that we were able to accommodate your special request, Eva! Customer service is absolutely a top priority of ours, and it's just really good to know that that came through for you -- I'm really proud of the entire team for making that happen. I hope you'll be back for another couples' vacation again soon!  See you next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Love this beautiful hotel right on Laguna Beach. I've actually been lucky enough to stay here both for work and pleasure now and it's the Laguna Beach hotel I recommend to all my friends. If you stay here definitely make sure to have a drink during sunset at The Deck, located right on the same property as the hotel. The hotel is also walking distance to a ton of other great dining spots and the bars downtown. Pacific Edge is a no brainer for folks looking to have a relaxing and comfortable stay in Laguna.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you've consistently enjoyed your stays here, John! Thank you for the recommendations, by the way -- they're really the best kind of compliment we can get. I hope you'll come back for some comfort and relaxation again soon!  See ya next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Room is very small - no space!
Summary: Employees at front desk, valet, reservations, very nice and helpful.  Disappointed in the layout of room, bathroom size Very small, and, quite a walk to restaurants (2).  Server very pleasant in the deck,  honestly believe for the price not worth it.
Manager Response: I'm really proud of my team for showing you the excellent customer service that we're all about here, Cheryl. That said, I want your room to leave just as positive of an impression, and I really apologize if that wasn't the case. Although it looks like you enjoyed parts of your stay, you should have walked away completely satisfied with every aspect of your visit. I hope you'll give us another shot to totally win you over and give you that five-star experience that's up to our own standards.  Best wishes, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Very well located in the downtown area and at walking distance of restaurants, shops, and galleries. We got an ocean front room and it was absolutely astonishing. At night we felt that our room was hanging on top of the ocean and the sound of the waves was very soothing.
Manager Response: It sounds like our location and the view from your room helped make your last stay really special, and that's really great to hear. I just love that you were as impressed with the views as we are! Thank you so much for taking the time to spread the word here on TripAdvisor -- the entire team really appreciates it.  See you next time! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Great Balcony and view of the ocean and the food was good.  Very small rooms, especially the bathroom.  No space to put anything in the bathroom.  Bathtub was plugged up.  I was told there was bike storage but in fact there was not.  So, overall, nice view but not worth the $522.00 for one night!!!!!!
Manager Response: Although I'm really glad that you enjoyed the view and the balcony, it sounds like a couple of other aspects of your visit didn't quite hit the mark for you. I want each of our guests to be happy with each part of their stay, so I'm really sorry if that wasn't the case for you. We would have gladly taken care of the bathtub had we known there was an issue, but I do apologize for that inconvenience. Thank you very much for this candid feedback, though -- we all appreciate you taking the time to share your opinion with us.  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We just returned from a two night stay at the Pacific Edge Hotel, and I must say it was just what we were looking for.  I admit, I was a little worried before our stay when I read some of the negative reviews but I am glad that I did not let them sway me because the Pacific Edge delivered the getaway we were looking for.  I will say, if you are in search for a luxourious hotel this is not the place for you.  The rooms are nice but they are on the small side and not terribly fancy.  However, if you are there for the view and the beach vibe, it will not disappoint. We stayed in the Reef Bldg. which was quiet and we loved sleeping with the slider open and listening to the waves crash below us.  I would recommend to the management that they find a different way to position air
Manager Response: It sounds like the vibes of the deck and proximity to the beach really won you over, and that's just awesome. I love that the Reef Building was quiet and peaceful so that you could relax and enjoy your vacation. I also really appreciate your recommendations. We're always looking for ways that we might improve in the future, so hearing feedback like that is so helpful.  Hope to see you back soon! Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Zach and Mike at the front desk really helped us out of a tough situation. I can't describe how thankful we were to have them at the front desk. One thing I can say for sure is that the staff at this hotel is an A+. Amazing view and very very nice rooms. Would stay here again for sure
Manager Response: It's just great to read that our customer service earned an A+ in your book, Langdon. I'll definitely have to share that with the rest of the team -- they'll be as excited to hear that as I was! I'm also so glad that your room and the view impressed, and appreciate you taking the time to share your opinion here with us.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This hotel (it is actually a motel) is great if you want to have a easy access to the beach. That is pretty much it! Our $450 a night room had a balcony which had a full ocean view.  Once you check-in they give you this complicated map that you need to follow to get to your room. It was actually 3 minutes walk, up and down the stairs with of course no elevators. The room/ bathroom was really out dated, the fridge was barely working, we had a sewage problem that we asked the staff to come and replace some parts. The cleaning crew were nice but usually showed up to clean the room around 2 pm.  Although they say that they have nice restaurants around, but we did not get lucky finding any good food that was Ina walking distance. The front-desk clerks could have been a bit more nicer
Manager Response: Although I'm glad you appreciated the proximity to the beach, Emil, I'm sorry that the rest of your stay wasn't quite as impressive to you. Customer service is absolutely a top priority for us here, and that should have come across -- I apologize if that wasn't the case. I'll regroup with the team to make sure we're continuing to provide service that's up to our own standards, and I hope you'll consider visiting us again in the future to get that five-star experience that we're more than capable of providing.  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: 1 Star Experience at a 5 Star Price
Summary: Very disappointed. Last year we stayed at Pacific Edge and were booked into a dated, but spacious room with a kitchenette and gorgeous view of the beach. We reseved our room for this year's stay well in advance, and told reservations that we'd like the same room or similar. Of course reservations could not guarantee it, but we were told that they would make a note to put us in a similar room. The room was in the identical category as our previous stay, and was more expensive, so we were expecting it to be at least as nice. Instead, we were given a tiny room, no kitchenette, with a puny  bathroom that barely fit one person (no room for a cosmetics bag and no place to rest a hair dryer). No full-length mirror, stinky gum stuck inside the clothes closet, broken sliding door lock
Manager Response: I'm so disappointed to hear that this past visit didn't live up to what you've come to expect from us -- especially since you really enjoyed your first stay here. It sounds like the room wasn't as spacious as you were hoping for, and I can understand how that could have been disappointing for you and your partner. I really apologize that you weren't completely blown away this time around, but please know that I'll definitely be looking into each of your specific concerns regarding the state of the room to make sure that this doesn't happen again. As hard as it was to hear, I appreciate you leaving me this feedback so that I can do so.  Sincerely, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We went to Laguna Beach for our honeymoon in February. The first room we had was a huge disappointment. It was hardly cleaned and the windows were left open during the day and there had been a huge storm. We had gone to complain and we had gotten a much better room at no extra charge to us! They were so nice dealing with the issue and were very apologetic. The view was spectacular and it was nice to be right on the ocean. I was extremely satisfied with the customer service and our second room.
Manager Response: I'm so glad we were able to get you the room you were hoping for, Meg -- especially since you guys were on your honeymoon! It sounds like you really enjoyed the view and proximity to the ocean in that second room, and I couldn't be happier to hear that. The fact that our customer service also left a great impression is just the icing on top of the cake. Thanks so much for spreading the word here!  See ya next time, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Can be great if you get the right room/building
Summary: I just stayed here for three nights with extended family.  The key to enjoying this very quirky hotel is to avoid certain rooms/buildings. The hotel is a group of 4-5 hotels/motels that have been bought up and run as one resort. Certain buildings are MUCH nicer than others and can color your whole stay.   Our experience is to AVOID THE VILLAGE VIEW rooms ("Seas" building) at all costs. This was probably a Motel 6 level place at one time. Rooms are tiny, face the very busy Coast Highway, and walls are paper thin. For a family, the "Bahia" building used to be apartments -- the rooms are not fully redone (though new carpet & new windows helps), but they are GIANT, full kitchen, and a great value. Some have nice views and all have big balconies. The "Reef" & "Surf" buildings are
Manager Response: Andrea, you should have a relaxing and enjoyable visit no matter which room you stay in, and I apologize that this wasn't your experience. While some buildings have been more recently renovated, it's our goal to keep each building updated and looking it's best. We also have some more projects in mind for the future.   Hope you enjoyed your time in Laguna, and we'd love to welcome you back in the next time you're visiting!   Until then,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This is the second year in a row that we stayed at Pacific Edge as part of our summer vacation. For that ultimate summer beach vacation experience, getting a Beach Front Room is a must! My family will be back again next year!
Manager Response: We can't wait to welcome you and your family back, Bobby! It sounds like you're doing your beach vacation right -- nothing beats some good rest and relaxation. Safe travels back to Indiana.   Take care,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Great Location; on the beach.  Rooms are nice. Rafaella, our room maid, was always pleasant and went beyond expectations to my our stay perfect.  The hotel is an easy walk down to central Laguna and Main Beach.  Excellent dining possibilities within walking distance.
Manager Response: James, we're so glad to hear that you enjoyed our location so much, and we'll certainly pass your compliments along to Rafaella. Hope to have you back next time you're in Laguna Beach!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Wow!! Let me start off by saying this place is a MOTEL. Not a hotel. Let me tell you what 500.00 a night gets you. An ocean veiw. That's it. A surly man (security.) telling me I can't leave my car where it was parked to check in. No late check out. No priorities in the restaurant for reservations. No safe in the rooms. Wall unit air conditioners on your balcony blowing hot air on you. A valet that asks "you can take your own bags right?" I haven't seen ANY of this customer service that everyone was raving about. Regretting not going to the Ritz.
Manager Response: Hey there, sounds like you may have had a sub par experience with us. I'm glad to hear you enjoyed the oceanfront view, but I sincerely apologize if you found the service in any way unsatisfactory. With regard to the bags, it sounds like we may have missed the mark a bit, and for that I apologize -- I agree that you should never have to carry your own. To clarify, we are actually a full service hotel, and we do everything we can to ensure our guests have the most comfortable experience possible. If security told you not to park on the drive while checking in, that's because it was in the best interest of safety, the hotel and our other guests. We apologize if you felt inconvenienced, but please know that our top priority is accommodating all of our guests in the most hospitable manner. With this in mind, we sincerely hope you'll give us another chance.    Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The location is perfect right on the beach. Our room was very clean and the room service was excellent.Be sure and pay a little extra and get a beach front view.Ask for Austin he will take very good care of you when lounge on the beach(chairs umbrellas etc) Please give these young men a tip as they are working there way through school. A 10 minute walk is the Orange Inn a great place for breakfast in business for 85 years check them out on facebook. Only negative our room had only one chair. Bottom line our room was clean and quite with an excellent view of the Pacific.
Manager Response: It sounds like you felt really comfortable in your room -- glad to hear that you enjoyed the view! We'll be sure to pass your compliments along to Austin. Hope to have you back next time you are in the area.   Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Day one was great...until later in the evening when the room next to us was out of control.  Way too many people were staying in the room next to Us (6-8) and they were loud, had unruly children that ran up and down the hallways and parents constantly yelling at them--all hours of the day and night. They slammed doors, were drunk, loud and obnoxious in the hallway--it was awful. And we were close to the lobby and security was on duty and nothing was done.  We were also charged for extra items 3 days after we Left that I had to call and dispute.   Billing takes way too long to process payment and lift the $100 hold per night on funds. We checked out 4 days ago and are still waiting.  Circuit breaker also blew when using the ac.  Location is great. Pool is great. While it is a
Manager Response: Hey there. I'm glad to hear that you were a fan of our location and that you enjoyed the amenities as well. I'm sorry to hear that you encountered a noise problem with regard to the next room. I apologize if we missed the mark there -- I assure you that this isn't typical of us. If you'd happened to alert someone on duty, we would have been happy to help out in the moment. As far as billing goes, we also want to apologize for the delay there, but do know that we serve many, many guests each week and strive to accommodate all of them to the best of our ability. With this in mind, we sincerely hope you'll give us another shot in the near future.    Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The room was small. Barely enough room for a bed. The bathroom had mold in the shower which was a huge turnoff. However, the view and the beach are amazing!  Love that they have chairs, beach towel and umbrellas on loan for guests. Super convenient.  I would not stay here again because of the bathroom alone. Yucky.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the view and the beach so much, but sorry that the bathrooms were not to your satisfaction. I completely agree that there should not have been any mold in your shower -- if you'd let a staff member know, we are always happy to better accommodate you in the moment. Since we always aim to provide a clean, comfortable environment for you to relax in, this definitely isn't typical of us. We sincerely hope that you will consider giving us another shot next time with this in mind.   Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Love Pacific Edge Hotel. All u need to bring is your swim suit & sunscreen. Towels, umbrellas, chairs are all furnished. The oceanfront rooms are pricey, but so worth it.  The staff is so accommodating. Can't wait to go back next year.
Manager Response: And we can't wait to have you back, Kathleen! Really -- these compliments mean a lot to me, and I'm thrilled that you felt so comfortable staying with us!   All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Excellent and then some!  Hotel was clean and the ocean view was just beautiful.  Staff members smiled a lot and the service was great.  We had dinner at the DECK and the food was delicious. We will stay there again.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you were able to enjoy our beautiful ocean location, Richard. A stay here should be entirely welcoming and relaxing, and I'm happy we were able to provide you just that!   All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My husband and I went to the Pacific Edge for our anniversary. We initially did not reserve a beachfront room, but when we checked in, we were upgraded to a beachfront room in honor of our anniversary.  The room was comfortable and clean with a king bed, a wide screen tv, a good sized bathroom, and a table and two chairs on the balcony. The hotel is situated right on the beach, so we heard the ocean waves very well. This may be too much ocean noise for some to sleep, but I found it relaxing. The hotel provides towels, lounge chairs, and umbrellas if you want to spend your day on the beach. The hotel is within close walking distance to Main Beach and many great restaurants. The staff is very attentive and the valet car service, though a bit pricey at $27 a night, is well-staffed
Manager Response: Thanks so much for celebrating your anniversary with us, Kim -- I'm glad to hear we were able to appropriately accommodate you in honor of that. It sounds like you really enjoyed that ocean-front view and the convenience of our location. Can't wait to have you folks back, no matter the occasion!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My husband and I enjoyed a most fabulous, spontaneous trip to the Pacific Edge over the weekend.  Ocean-front, immaculate room with a balcony, complete with beach loungers and an umbrella. From the moment we pulled up to the front door, we were treated like VIPS.  Impeccable service, gorgeous view, unbeatable location in relation to restaurants, shopping and sight-seeing.  The beach was clean, beautiful, relaxing, yet upbeat.  We will definitely return for a longer stay.  I also felt it was a superb value for the quality accommodations we enjoyed.
Manager Response: It thrills me to hear that you felt treated like VIPs, which is how we aim to treat all of our guests. It sounds like the location proved convenient for your stay and that you were thoroughly pleased with the room and the view. We'd love to have you back soon for an extended vacation!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place if you're in the right building
Summary: Fairly large, sprawling property that has street front and ocean front buildings. We stayed in an ocean front room in the Reef building. The other building with ocean front rooms is the Surf building. I suspect the other rooms are OK only if you're planning to spend most of your time exploring beautiful Laguna. The balconies are a little small but adequate for 2-3 people; however, from an ocean front room, you cannot beat the amazing view. The rooms are basic but nicely appointed. This is an older property with more of a beachy motel feel. It's not swanky but our room was clean and the location is fabulous. We walked to a few great restaurants (Watermarc, Tommy Bahama, K'Ya Bistro). There are two on site restaurants- we enjoyed the awesome view, cocktails, and live music at The
Manager Response: Denise, we're happy to hear that you enjoyed the view so much. It sounds like our location proved really convenient for your stay too, and that you felt comfortable in your room, which is exactly how we want you to feel. We'd love to have you back next time you're in Laguna!   Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We visited Laguna Beach and didn't want anything fancy but with a beach vibe. Pacific Edge Hotel fits that well with professional staff, clean rooms, excellent beachfront location, very unusual private beach lounge area and beachfront restaurant/lounge that satisfies. Rooms/bathrooms are small, inexpensively furnished, not quite great paint job but fresh, pillows are unacceptable foam. The Deck restaurant is very fun and open. A great place to unwind.  Talented bartenders and nice selection of products. The food was nice and well presented, however the cheese board selection came with assortment of inappropriate bread slices and went to waste. Tuna Poke was excellent. Restaurant doesn't open until 9am so breakfast for us was found elsewhere.
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear that you had such pleasant interactions with our staff, Alex, and that the rooms were to your satisfaction. It seems like you were a pretty big fan of our Bohemian ambiance, and that you enjoyed your time at the Deck restaurant in particular. We hope to have you back for a five-star experience in the near future.   Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We are a family of 2 adults and 3 kids and this was the last leg of our California adventure.  We booked into the 2 bedroom unit for the first two nights but I wanted to experience that legendary sunset and ocean view for the last night.  Both rooms were OK, the 2 bedroom unit was VERY spacious (which was great with two teenagers) and we thought it was pretty average. Kind of outdated and near the road. Not enough glasses/plates for 5 people but great large balcony! Nice for the kids to be able to use the games room with pool table etc. Then we stayed in an oceanfront room for the last night and I understood what everyone was raving about. Literally right over the ocean and the sunset was absolutely amazing!! The room itself was average as well, but oh man that view.  I still
Manager Response: Surf lessons are a must -- it's so much fun for the whole family! If you ever decide to start up a surf band, make sure to send us a copy of your songs. Can't wait to have you all back in Laguna Beach again!   All the best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We came for 3 days right after the 4th of July. Because we wanted two beds, there were no beachfront rooms available, so I elected to get the deluxe oceanview room, which is located above the lobby. From this vantage point, you can see the water on the horizon and from the side of the patio, the distant shore. This affords you a view of the sunset, which is nice. As others have said, this is a hodgepodge of buildings, joined by the driveways. You have to go up and down a number of stairways that don't interconnect well. This is somewhat of a pain, but I was told they cannot remodel without major approvals of the City, and I guess they believe they would be able to do so.   The staff is great. I was helped by Nancy in reservations and found all of my interactions to be very
Manager Response: I'm so glad you enjoyed the views and the close walk to town -- not to mention the beach access! We're here whenever you're back in town for business or a quite vacation.   Until next time,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: a nice and clean place. the showers was a little small but everything else made up for it. All the employee's was very friendly especially the Valet parking guyz. Groovy Drew Vee was the most helpful and is a koo cat  !!!!! Will be back in the future !!! thanks
Manager Response: It's wonderful hearing that you loved everything about your stay with us, Cris! Drew is great -- we love having him as part of our team. Can't wait for your next visit.   Until next time,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Lately, when I need to see the ocean I go only in two places, Laguna Beachand manhattan beach. I go to manhattan for the boardwalk and I go to Laguna for the proximity to the ocean. I split my vacations between the two of them. If I go to laguna, I choose Pacific Edge Hotel. This is my favorite hotel in Laguna Beach, Ca. Why? Close to the waves, if you have an ocean front room, and close enough if you don't have an ocean view balcony. Not expensive as comparing with the other hotels in Laguna Beach. Try to get a room in off season for the half price. The service is great, housekeeping, mentainance and front desk, where Luis, Zach, Cadence and James can help you to enjoy the stay. Walk to the beach, walk on the beach and walk in the town, no need to drive a car. It looks like a
Manager Response: We're so honored to be your favorite hotel in Laguna! I'll be sure to pass your compliments along to the staff you mentioned. It sounds like you're a big fan of our Bohemian ambiance, food and oceanfront view, so we couldn't ask for more than that. We can't wait to have you back next time you're in the area!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: You can't get any closer to the ocean
Summary: This is the second time I have stayed at this hotel.  The service is excellent, from the front desk to the housekeepers.  If you stay here, spend the extra money and stay in an oceanfront room.  The water literally crashes under your balcony during high tide. This summer we saw dolphins and seals from the balcony.   If you are looking for a luxury hotel, this is not it.  They still have window air conditioners and small bathrooms.   We take a shuttle from/to the airport because they do charge around $25 a night to valet park.  You are within walking distance to shopping and restaurants.  Best way to get to town is to walk on the beach.  There is also a Ralph's grocery store about a block away.  The onsite restaurant has excellent food.
Manager Response: I'm glad to hear we could get you as close to the ocean as possible -- that's our goal! It's also great that you're a fan of our Bohemian ambiance, and that our location proved convenient for your daily ventures. Hope to see you again next time you're in Laguna.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We booked a room at the last minute, just prior to the July 4th holiday.  The front desk staff was very accommodating, once we arrived we decided to upgrade to a beach front room.  It was worth every penny, the room was modern, with a wet bar and refrigerator.  The views from the patio were priceless, enjoyed sleeping with door open and listening to  the waves all night.  The entire staff was very friendly and engaging, you can tell this hotel is very well run and managed.  I would highly recommend to family and friends!
Manager Response: Bill, it sounds like you had very pleasant experiences with our staff and our accommodations this past weekend, and I'm glad to hear that being so close to the ocean was relaxing for you. We'd love to have you and your family next time you're in Laguna Beach!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Great room, nicely decorated. Very friendly staff. Waves break under our balcony at night!! Overall great experience. The only criticism I have is the staff knew it was our first visit and did not tell us to grab a beach chair/umbrella early in the morning (July 4th weekend) and when we went they were all taken or reserved. I assumed that there would be plenty for anyone that stayed (assumed wrongly). Next time I'll just throw in our own beach chairs to guarantee we have comfy place on the beach to sit.
Manager Response: Char, it sounds like you really enjoyed your interactions with our staff and that you felt relaxed during your stay here. We totally agree that our staff should have notified you of the early morning routine, and we apologize that you and your family were not able to obtain any chairs or umbrellas for the beach. We sincerely look forward to having you folks back in the near future!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My family loved this hotel. A group of 6 of us stayed here in 1 ocean front suite and two rooms that were closer to the front desk that had a living room and kitchen. It was more than enough room. The staff was great and beach was amazing. Been a little while since we stayed here but I've always wanted to give it a great review.
Manager Response: We're so glad to hear that you had such a pleasant experience with our accommodations and staff, and that it left a lasting impression. We'd love to have you -- and your group -- back next time you're in Laguna Beach!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We booked for 2 nights and just couldn't bear staying for the second one.  The room was hideous.  Felt like I was in a bad college dorm from the 60's, with miserably loud neighbors.  The carpet looked old and filthy, curtain between rooms was frayed.  Creepy rust stains on railings and deck. The whole place feels damp and moldy. Just funky. Ugly ugly ugly. And the beach front rooms do not feel particularly safe. Seems like anyone could walk up. No privacy. I just don't get any sense of "charm." Maybe if you are in your 20s you'd think this was cute and fun. We didn't.   The housekeeping staff works very hard and although the room was "clean" they are fighting an uphill battle.  The towels were old and frayed. Bedding was basic and old. The room seemed grimy, beyond being
Manager Response: We're glad to hear that you thought highly of our staff, but saddened that our hotel was not up to your standards and that you were bothered by the noise. Although we do strive to maintain a Bohemian ambiance and charm, your comfort and safety are our top priorities. If you'd had a chance to speak with our staff, we would have been happy to accommodate your needs properly. Again, we apologize, and hope you'll give us another shot to wow you in the future. I know we can!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Walking distance to all the places we wanted to go to. Clean and a great view.  The beach was great nice place to go and relax.  The bed was comfortable and the service was very helpful.  The dinning next door was very good and the drinks refreshing.
Manager Response: Sounds like our location proved very convenient for your stay, Theresa, and we're happy to hear that we were able to help you relax while visiting Laguna. It's also great that you had such pleasant interactions with our staff -- that's exactly what we aim for! Hope we'll see you again next time you're in the area.   Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Did we get what we paid for??
Summary: Our family has been coming to this location every year for 25 years. It use to be called Vacation Village. In my opinion it has gone down hill the last several years and certainly not worth the $450 per night ticket price for the Fourth of July weekend.  Our family had 6 rooms for 3 nights rented this year. I have stayed at this hotel easily over 20 times. None of the rooms were the same in our group. and every person paid a different rate. You never know what we will get when it comes to rooms. They have a eclectic set of room designs. Their descriptions of their rooms fall short in describing the accommodations. A description will say king bed, but you might end up with a queen. Or 2 full.  You may end up with a remodeled room or one run down.  It might be spacious or the size
Manager Response: It sounds like we may have missed the mark with you and your family this past weekend -- for that, I sincerely apologize. With regard to the rooms, we completely agree that they should always be a clean, comfortable place to stay. As such, we take cleanliness very seriously here, so our staff would have been happy to help you folks out in the moment. Finally, we're sorry that you felt inconvenienced with regard to the beach chairs -- while we do operate on a first come, first served basis, we should always explain this in a respectful manner.   With all of this in mind, I do hope you'll consider giving us another try. The last thing we'd want is to disappoint such a valued customer after 25 years -- I know we can do better than this.   Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Some tough reviews in here.  I guess I can't blame them.  I guess people here and in the state have major purchasing power.  No it wasn't the flashiest hotel I've ever stayed in, but I can also say I've never stayed in one 10 ft off the Pac Ocean.  The room was ocean side with a kitchenette.   Small, but fine for us.  Our deck was over a massive party deck that people were renting out for weddings and parties to have the view for a few hours, we had it for over a week.  I think that says it all right there. Location, location, location.  People dream of this.  The surrounding homes are 25 million plus.  Live like a millionaire and live in an environment men and women plan their entire weddings around.  Amazing.
Manager Response: We're glad to hear we were able to help you live like a millionaire, Travis. It sounds like you really enjoyed our proximity to the ocean, and that the amenities were to your taste. We can't wait to have you back next time you're vacationing here in Laguna!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Up front rooms are old, you get in the room and you see a noise canceled gift, so you get worried, it's needed because road noise is quite high, but this isn't as bad as the fact that rooms are connected and you listen your back door neighbors having sex, luckily my 2 boys are young enough to ask about it but it was very annoying for me and wife. Next day we asked to change rooms, people at front desk were great to understand situation and change us, so we learned that back rooms closer to the pool are newer. So, going to this hotel never accept front rooms.
Manager Response: We pride ourselves on being a family-friendly establishment, Virgilio, so we're glad we were able to get the room switched for you and your family. We completely agree that noise levels shouldn't keep you from being able to relax while staying with us, and we do what we can to keep noise from trickling into other rooms. We'd love for you to come back and see us for a five-star experience in the near future.   Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The rough, meaning so many choices and unfamiliar territory.  It wasn't long before we realized we had made the right choice in hotel.  The departing guests were so complimentary of the hotel and the area.  The hotel staff was friendly and informative. We asked if we could see the  room before choosing one over the other and did.  During our tour we saw a room right over the ocean and inquired on availability and cost when we returned to the front desk.  Much to our surprise, the room was available and we decided to splurge on the additional cost. Later that night we received a call advising there had been an error and we would be generously compensated for our inconvenience. The studio w/kitchenette on the Village side was another nice surprise.  It was great!  We could see the
Manager Response: We're thrilled to be your diamond in the rough, Julie! It sounds like you really enjoyed the Bohemian nature of our lodging, and the oceanfront view as well. I'm glad that your stay went so smoothly, and we can't wait to have you folks back when you're in Laguna again.   Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic birthday stay at Pacific Edge
Summary: We stayed here whilst on a 3 week road trip of California. I was celebrating my 30th birthday and what a place to celebrate we had a sea view room right on the beach front with the waves coming right up under the balcony.  It was great apartment with a great view and feel to it. The room was very comfy and newly refurbished I believe. The bathroom was quite small in the apartment but was perfectly fine for our stay. The location was great we walked into town along the beach and upto the cliff then walked back and into town to the many great shops and galleries the whole town of laguna had a great feel and was a great place to spend my birthday.  The hotel reception was very smart and The staff were very helpful and they even gave us a nice bottle to celebrate my birthday. We
Manager Response: We're honored to hear that you celebrated such a big birthday with us, Jimmy! Sounds like you found the rooms comfortable and the location convenient. I'm glad that you enjoyed the birthday bottle as well, and that you were able to sit back and just relax during your stay. We'll be right here with a view of the dolphins next time you're in Laguna!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This hotel is in a beautiful location and has an excellent staff. We really enjoyed going down to the beach and reserving our lounge chairs and umbrella for a day of soaking in the sun and surf. We didn't eat at the hotel but we did have drinks at The Deck. The deck was a great little beach bar right on the sand . The room itself was a little rough the A/C was just a window mount type unit that was extremely loud. The hotel is right on PCH so you get some road noise as well. So I guess your paying for location. However Laguna is great lots of shops in this little artists community with lots of fun bars and restaurants within walking distance. So it wasn't the best room we have ever stayed in but the hotel is in a choice location. Oh yeah 27$ a day to valet as well...
Manager Response: Sounds like you were a big fan of our staff and location, Michael, and I'm thrilled to hear that. If you were having trouble with the air conditioning unit, I sincerely apologize -- our staff would've been happy to help out in the moment if we had known! We'd love to have you back for a five-star experience in the near future.   Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This is a Great hotel, strongly suggested! Nice rooms, the hotel is beach front, its close to many cool stores, and the service is great, especially Cameron he was there to help you when you needed it.
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear that our location was convenient for your shopping and sightseeing, and it sounds like you really enjoyed the rooms as well. I'll be sure to pass your compliments along to Cameron. Hope to have you back again soon!  Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: What a wonderful stay I had here! Very clean the sound of the ocean is very relaxing! Right in the center of town near everything! Love love love! Would stay here time and time again when visiting Laguna!
Manager Response: Glad we could be there to help you relax! I'm thrilled to hear that we were a convenient location for your stay. We'll be looking forward to seeing you next time you're in Laguna Beach.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Like going back in time -- breakfasting at the Orange Inn, walking the sand, to the Cliff House -- visiting boutiques and reminiscing with ancient artists, dining on fish tacos -- and wandering the main beach and the Old Town. This property is thee' location.  Laguna is no longer the sleepy colony of hippies and beatniks of 1969 -- but staying at the Pacific Edge, was next best thing to a time machine. The original hotel has expanded, and an ocean view was beyond us -- but our room situated close enough to hear the roll of surf, and lull us gently to sleep. The room was spacious, and had sliding doors to the a nice salt water pool. The ambiance of the Pacific Edge is casual and is very beach friendly. And kicking back on the Laguna bay, still the only way to observe the day-glow
Manager Response: Happy to hear that we could whisk you back in time, Mike, and we'd be glad to fire up the time machine at any time! It's great that our staff was so accommodating, and that you enjoyed the spacious room and other amenities we provide. It sounds like this was a pretty convenient location for you, so we can't wait to have you back again soon.   Best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: I spent three days here and wish I could of stayed longer. Had a beach front room that was perfect for me. Wet bar, fridge, microwave, king bed. Everyone was so nice from the valet, front desk people, gal who cleaned my room. Beautiful beach right in front of room. Cabana boys set up chairs, chaise lounges towels for you. My adult kids stayed in the two bedroom apt across the parking lot from me, we hung out on my deck when we weren't on the beach.
Manager Response: I'm thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay, Virginia, and that your room location proved convenient for accessing the beach and your family's apartment room. Sounds like the service really stood out to you as well, which is the exact impression we desire for our customers. We'd love to have you back again for some more fun in the sun.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We just had the most amazing trip to California and in big part because of this great little hotel.  It is most definitely not fancy as some hotels in Laguna but it was clean, it has great staff and you can't beat the location. It has rooms that are literally on the beach and there is nothing like sitting on the balcony, listening to the waves and watching amazing sunsets. Parking is an extra daily fee (I think 25$) and it's valet so count on the tips as well. We got a deal that had free parking included and we only needed our car once, because everything is available a short walk away. I can't recommend this hotel enough for the price it is. We will be back :)
Manager Response: I'm so glad to hear that we were a highlight of your trip, and it's great that you enjoyed our rooms, staff, and convenient location. Sounds like you had a really relaxing time watching the ocean and the sunsets, which is our ultimate goal. We look forward to your return in the near future!  Until then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful spot on the beach in Laguna!
Summary: Wonderful spot - right on the ocean!  Centrally located - walk to restaurants, shopping, and art!  Private Bungalows available for the day or spend the day on the sand just steps away from your room!  One of Laguna's best gems!
Manager Response: What an honor to hear that you saw us as a gem! I'm glad that our central location proved convenient for you -- we'd love to convenience you again in the near future.   All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel right on the beach. The hotel is located walking distance away from great restaurants, bars, shopping, etc. Staff is friendly, hotel is clean and offers great amenities. We visit this hotel once a year & we recommend beach front rooms. (Surf wing are the only rooms they have on the beach & these rooms also have beautiful balconys overlooking the water)
Manager Response: Thanks for being such a loyal customer over the years! It's great to hear that our location has proven convenient for you, as well -- that's our aim! We look forward to seeing you again next year.   Until then, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing oceanfront room with great service!
Summary: Visiting Laguna from New Jersey for just one night and were very happy with our stay.  We had an oceanfront room with a balcony that was literally right over the ocean, we could hear the waves crashing all night, and there was the most beautiful view of the beach.  It was great.  The hotel is walking distance right to the downtown where there are tons of shops and restaurants and art galleries.  The service was great too - Javid gave us a complimentary bottle of wine upon our arrival.  The room was clean, and the bed was quite comfortable. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Manager Response: What a lovely review, Jayne -- thank you for sharing! I'm so thrilled that you enjoyed your room. Nothing beats waking up to the ocean sights and sounds. We hope to see you next time you make the trip to Laguna Beach!   Take care,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing service, clean and modern rooms, friendly staff and an amazing view!
Summary: From the moment we arrived, till the moment we left we received perfect service and hospitality! Upon arrival, the hotel is beautiful and clean. We loved being steps from the gorgeous sand and blue ocean water! The blow dryer went out in our room so we called the desk and they brought one up to us right away. We also called and asked for silverware and they delivered that as well. The pools were warm enough for the kids to swim and they were very clean. The staff was very friendly and went above and beyond to make sure we were having an enjoyable stay. There are lots of restaurants and shops nearby and even a Ralph's a block away for groceries, sunblock etc.. The free trolley runs all along PCH and has many stops. There is a trolley pick up direct out front of the hotel. We
Manager Response: Well, we can't wait to welcome you back! Thank you for your kind note here, Kimberly. I'm looking forward to sharing this with the team, as I know they'll appreciate it, too.   Wishing you and your family a wonderful summer!  Best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The hotel staff Zach, Javid and Stacie were super accommodating.  We ended up adding another night and they were able beat our first night rate and offered us a complimentary bottle of wine.  Our room was small but perfect for my husband and 2 children at an amazing rate.  All my kids wanted to do was swim and play on the beach. Many of the hotels around this location were 2-3 time the rate we were given.  Can't wait to investigate Laguna tomorrow.
Manager Response: It sounds like you and your family had a blast taking in Laguna, Jennifer -- I love it! Thanks for making us a part of your trip. I'll also be sure to let Zach, Javid, and Stacie know they earned a shout-out. We hope to see you next time you make a trip to CA.  Until then,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing ocean view.  You are on top of it.  The staff was overly friendly in a great way
Summary: What a pleasure this hotel was.  A breath of fresh air.  Ocean view rooms and nicely appointed rooms, except for the bed.  Bad back in the morning on second morning.  First night it seemed good but then it hit me.  No privacy on the balcony but it was great connecting with the neighbors.  Everyone was happy to be there.  The staff was sooooo accomodating. Two great restaurants although the portions are tiny.  Please work on the portions because it really does matter.  I ordered a pasta with lobster and there literally was a cup of pasta on the plate with a small amount of lobster and it was $22.00.   Otherwise it was a really nice time.
Manager Response: Well, sounds like a pretty mixed experience! Glad that overall you enjoyed your stay, but hearing you had a bad back really bums me out! We typically get pretty good reviews on the beds, so I'll look your stay up and see if there's any problem other than our bed style being a bad match. Also, thanks for the feedback on the restaurants! Really helps us out.  I hope you'll come back and see us next time you're due for a little vacation -- we'd love to have you back.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: great trip in laguna baeach at the pacific edge hotel
Summary: Cool hotel. RIGHT on the beach. Had a great time with my wife and daughter. great staff. good location for walking around laguna too. We loved the beach in front too. Its called sleepy hollow and when you are on the sand it has a great view of north laguna beach. the beach has super comfy lounge chairs along with bar called the Deck that serves drinks and food.
Manager Response: Sean, thank you so much for this wonderful review! Glad to hear you enjoyed our location and got to make the most of the beach. I hope you'll think of us the next time you're visiting Laguna Beach. We'd love to welcome you and your family again soon!  All the best,   Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We booked in a King surf room and when we checked in its was upgraded to The Pacific suite..WOW!!A gift from Pacific Edge Hotel for our 25th anniversary... staff was very friendly and when we checked out the staff was great..Driftwood Kitchen was absolutely fantastic Awesome view.Try Branzino,The fish had a crunchy crust, but was still moist in the center. promise you won't be disappointed!   we truly enjoyed the entire experience and the VIEW (PRICELESS). Thank you Pacific Edge for making our stay with you one to remember! We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Wow. 25 years -- that is really incredible! Congrats again on your big milestone, and thank you for choosing to spend it with us. I'll make sure to pass along the kind words to the staff, and hope that we'll see you back soon -- whether it be a special occasion or just a quick getaway.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My Housekeeper Graciela remembered me from my previous trips Graciela is so friendly and gracious and the room is spotless and said if there is anything you need just let me know I've been coming here to Pacific Edge here for the past 15 to 16 years great to see some of the great friendly and courteous staff. Makes you feel at home when I come here. Great work Graciela
Manager Response: Graciela is going to love seeing this! Thanks so much for sharing the love here on TA, and for your constant support over the past decade and a half. Looking forward to your next visit!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My fianc√© and I went simply for an overnight "stay-cation". We arrived early and enjoyed the beach for the afternoon. The lounge chairs were very comfy! Then we went up to the room (603, fantastic!!) and got cleaned up for dinner. We walked about 7 blocks south on PCH to the Rooftop Bar for appetizers and a cocktail. If you want to watch the sunset get there early! We then enjoyed a wonderful dinner at the hotel's Driftwood Restaurant. We topped off our evening by climbing into the very comfortable bed and slept with the slider cracked open to fall asleep to the sounds of gently pounding surf. We enjoyed breakfast the next morning at the Orange Inn, a little cafe just up the road on PCH. The whole trip was wonderfully relaxing. We will be returning again in the future, we truly
Manager Response: A stay-cation sounds pretty great to me, Bianka! I'm thrilled you enjoyed your stay -- nice choice on heading over Rooftop, by the way. If you and the fianc√© are ever looking for another relaxing trip, we'd be delighted to be your home away from home.  Take care, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: The towels were so fluffy and soft, the balcony was perfect, the complimentary bottle of wine we enjoyed while watching the sunset was a pleasant surprise.. We considered changing our plans just to stay another night it was so delightful. The decor was vintage beach style and the adorable little orange birds in the lobby were a chirping addition. üê¶
Manager Response: Knowing you almost changed your plans to enjoy another night with us means the world, Kristy! Thank you for leaving us your thoughts. I hope you'll think of us again the next time you're in Laguna Beach -- there will be many more sunsets to enjoy!  All the best,   Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: The only nice thing I can say about this hotel is the staff.  They were extreme nice and willing to help but the rooms are old and so is the property. Sorry to say, I left after seeing the place and checked into a different hotel. Maybe the rooms facing the water are better.
Manager Response: While we're glad our staff went above and beyond to help you out, it's disappointing to hear you weren't pleased with our rooms, Anet. I really appreciate your feedback, so that we know what needs improving. In fact, we've already started renovations on one of our wings, so I hope you'll come see us again in the future!  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We have 5 grown children who came from Orlando, Denver, Los Angeles and Las Vegas to be together in Laguna. Pacific edge provides a comfortable and friendly home base for us.  The rooms are gorgeous and your staff is friendly and courteous, especially Maria, the maid who kept our room immaculate.  She was flexible with our schedule and made us feel at home.  The entire staff, from the beach boys setting up our lounge chairs to the valet parkers and cleaning staff and front desk were all friendly and accommodating.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Your recommendations mean so much to us, Ellen! I'll be sure to pass along your compliments to Maria as well. Your vacation should be as enjoyable as possible, so we do everything to make it so! I hope you'll think of us the next time you're in Laguna Beach -- we'd love to welcome you and your family back.   All the best,   Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Another fabulous time at the Pacific Edge!!
Summary: When I booked  this year there were no reef rooms available however, thanks to Casey at the front desk, as soon as there was a cancellation she accommodated me.. It was right next door to last year's room I even had the same house keeper Graciela Who is wonderful and asked all about my family.. I absolutely love this wonderful staff wonderful beach great ocean good food it's a gem!  They could put an ashtray at the end of the reef parking lot so you didn't have to walk quite so far for a smoke it's a non-smoking hotel but that's okay I just don't like walking to the main street late at night
Manager Response: I'm so glad Casey and Graciela took such excellent care of you! That's what a vacation should be all about -- being treated to something special. I'll be sure to share your kind words with them.   I hope you had a wonderful time in Laguna Beach. We'll see you next time you're due for some R&R!   Best,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We really liked this hotel. The young team were welcoming and so friendly. We paid around $100 per room and this was great for such a good location.  The rooms were clean, tidy and more than adequate although it would be good if they were a little bigger. The valet service was great although at $27 per day it was a bit pricey.  Laguna Beach is such a beautiful location that our two days there just blew us away. This great hotel added to the experience and we will return there for sure.  Book this place with confidence.
Manager Response: It sounds like you had a wonderful time in Laguna Beach, Brian! Nothing beats this beautiful coast, does it? I'm so glad we could be a part of your trip. Also, thanks for sharing your thoughts on our room size. We have a variety of suites and options, so next time you're in the area, we'd be more than happy to find you something a bit larger. Feel free to let us know your preferences!   Take care,  Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This was our third or fourth time we have rented a bungalow for a day and as always we were not disappointed. This is the best place for a ALL girls birthday party, a couples get together or a family celebration. We've done them all at least once! The Pacific Edge Hotel is older but the newly renovated ocean front rooms are awesome.
Manager Response: What a great getaway, Peggy! Thanks for making us a part of it and keep us in mind for the next girls weekend!  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: My husband & I went to Laguna Beach and normally I would stay at the Inn @ Laguna Beach but the room rate for one night in May was $618.00 so we walked down the beach and found the Pacific Edge which was $145.00 for the same night.  It wasn't as modern as the Inn but the staff....each and every one of them....were so friendly and made us feel like we mattered.  There were two restaurants on site and we ate at one of them for lunch....overlooking the beach...had a wonderful long lunch and food was good.  Our room was small but clean.  Don't expect marble floors and chandeliers but honestly, we would stay there again in a heartbeat.  Unfortunately we couldn't have an ocean view room as the hotel was almost all booked up but next time perhaps.
Manager Response: Now that's a vacation! Thanks for the wonderful review, and let us know if there's anything we can do to make your next visit even more special.   All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: Rafaela did a wonderful job I always keeping our coffee stock ,cleaned towels,bed clean.  Guess services were always available and met our needs as we came up with different options to choose from. Room was beachy,elegant and fun with the ocean hitting up against our room. We would love to stay here again!! Thank you for the complimentary gifts on our honeymoon Taylor &GEoff
Manager Response: We'll be sure to share this with Rafaela! Hope to see you and Geoff again soon, Taylor!  Thanks, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: We were looking for an overnight getaway to the beach from Palm Springs, CA and stayed at the Pacific Edge Hotel. Nice renovated room right on the beach front. We enjoyed a Wonderful breakfast on the outside deck at their restaurant Driftwood Kitchen.  I look forward to a returned getaway visit.  Thank you to the great staff at the Pacific Edge! Robert
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us, Robert! I hope we'll have a chance to welcome you back for another beach-side getaway soon.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary: This was our first visit to Laguna. We chose the Pacific Edge for its location. We were also pleased that it was pet friendly.  The entire staff  was extremely courteous! They went out of their way to be helpful. Our room was clean and updated. We loved having a balcony with an ocean view. We definitely recommend this hotel. We plan on returning next summer, however, we will stay for longer!
Manager Response: We can't wait to see you next summer, Scott! Thanks for the wonderful review.  All the best, Thomas Lee General Manager

Summary Heading: Except it as it is; quirky and wonderful!
Summary: My husband and I spent our anniversary here in May 2014.  We weren't sure what to expect after seeing the pictures of the colorful walls, but the views were undeniable. The rate was reasonable for the area and for an oceanfront room. I don't remember what room number we had, but it was a small oceanfront room and I mean oceanfront. I think there are different size rooms throughout this place though. It was quaint and cute, with a little bit of an old ocean room smell to it.  The water was right out front and at night the tide would come in and hit the room wall of the hotel. You almost feel as though you are on a house boat.
