When we got to the hotel we were told none of the upper floor rooms were available due to the computer "randomly assigning" rooms as people check in. We checked in 3 hours early so unless others checked in really early that wouldn't have been true. In addition, we met a couple (celebrating their 14th
Manager Response: It's terribly disappointing that we were unable to show you a warmer welcome, especially since you joined us to celebrate such a special occasion. As you know, this type of service does not come close to meeting our high standards. I must apologize once again, but I hope that we'll be able to resolve this for you shortly. Until then, thank you for your candid feedback.  Best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Friendly staff although they didn't ever come to my room when I called for something, perfect view if you get a beach view, outd
Summary: My boyfriend surprised me with a stay here one night, when we walked in to our beach view room on the 3rd floor it was very clean and spacious the beds were comfy and tv was alright I think they could get a little more modern though since there is more modern looking places near by for the same price. There lobby is very nice which is why I expected so much for the room. The view and patio is where I spent the whole day and night and even morning the view is breathtaking and you can tell its one of the best views available compared to the other hotels on the street. The chairs out there aren't comfy but there super cute. We were planning in staying in for room service but there wasn't very many options to be honest so we went ahead and went to Bjs down the street and brought it
Manager Response: Thanks for staying with us, Georgia! While I do appreciate your candid feedback and your suggestions about our room service and parking, I'm happy to see that you and your boyfriend enjoyed your getaway. Hopefully your next visit is worthy of five stars, but until then, thanks for the wonderful review!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: This place is bad. Room service doesn't answer. The menu is small and the choices are weak. The room is nasty. I feel like someone could break into the room at any moment. Bathroom is tiny and the kitchen is the same. Over all this is the worst place I've stayed in Laguna.
Manager Response: We're proud to call Laguna Beach home, so it's upsetting to hear that you found your stay to be so dissatisfying. However, we can assure you that we are in the midst of making the necessary upgrades for our guests, and we would have been happy to move you to another room if you had let us know about this. Still, we appreciate your feedback, and we hope to have another chance to show you a great time during your next stay in Laguna.  Best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for a wedding this past weekend and were frankly surprised at the poor service and aging conditions of the facility.  The location is great, with a nice beach out front; the small lobby is modern and comfortable; the food and service at The Deck restaurant (part of the hotel) was great.  But somebody needs to explain to the owners and management of this hotel that they are in the "hospitality" industry.  At check-in and other times we had to deal with the front desk, the attitudes ranged from mildly pleasant to impatient and condescending. At no time were we made to feel welcome, certainly.  And when I left my car with the valet (I had to drive it around back to find them), the attendant was unfriendly, bordering on surly.  And it went downhill from there.  I
Manager Response: I'm very surprised to hear of your disappointment. Our team works hard to make sure that all of our guests feel at home here in Laguna Beach, and the attitude you described is completely out of the ordinary. I'm so sorry that you left feeling this way‚Äîwe should have made sure that we did everything in our power to make this right for you, especially when dealing with the valet. While they are a separate company, I will certainly discuss your comments with them for their future reference. Thanks for bringing this to my attention, and don't hesitate to reach out if you'd like to talk.  Best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: A budget-friendly spot; Perfect for what you need
Summary: This place is the perfect spot if you're budget conscious and/or seeking a place to spend a night or two. It's location is ideal and only a few steps from the beach itself, no matter where you stay in the hotel. Yes, the carpet is older, the paint is worn and it could use some renovation. However, by no means is this place 2nd class. It's staff are friendly, courteous and prompt to any issue or need that arises, including setting up free-of-charge lounge chairs, beach umbrellas and towels. The valet are fast and have your car ready in moments. The beds/sheets are clean. The walls are a little thin, so just a heads-up to couples ;) You can hear the ocean from your room, as well. Completely relaxing!
Manager Response: There's nothing better than being lulled to sleep by the sound of the waves! I'm so happy to hear that you were able to unwind with us, and that you loved every minute of your stay. Thanks for the kind words, and keep us in mind next time you need to get away!  Best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantasic location on the beach- quirky modern interiors
Summary: The only stop on our trip with no record of my booking!!  I felt really disappointed too as this was the last stop on our trip and one which I had been  having twitter conversations with the hotel since our booking in July.  We were kept waiting whist Akiko checked the computer for our booking. it took 20 mins to sort and to apologise Akiko upgraded us to room 505 a junior suite with Ocean View.  I had booked a Beach front room but would have been allocated a room in a different block of the hotel (REEF). Akiko explained that these rooms hadn't been brought as up to date as those in Surf Wing and if you look at the hotel website you can see this The hotel has a welcoming lobby that is beautifully decorated and furnished. The hotel rooms are in separate blocks on the site.  We
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to leave such detailed feedback. Although we are aware that there are a few areas in need of improvement, it's very helpful to have input like yours as we move forward. Still, it seems like you enjoyed your stay, and we couldn't be happier to hear that. Thank you, and hopefully your next trip is worthy of the five stars you deserve.  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: My family and I chose this hotel for the great price and location. Originally, I booked a standard village front room. The lady at the front desk was super friendly and accommodating. Upgrading was not in my budget and we were just happy with the location of the property. Upon checking into our room we were able to get a glimpse of an ocean front room. Wow!!!! Breath taking. So we upgraded one night of our 2 nights here. Although, not in my budget...it was worth every penny. The room was fabulous, view unforgettable. We slept great with the waves crashing in the beach. Thanks for an amazing trip!!! My girls and I have already spread the word and all our pics to family, friends and all of Facebook.
Manager Response: Breathtaking, indeed! We're so lucky to get to wake up to this beautiful view every morning, and we're thrilled that you and your family loved it, too. Thanks for staying with us, Robin, and for spreading the word to your family and friends. We can't wait to welcome all of you back again!  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: I chose this hotel for the price we got and really didn't expect to like it. My husband and I stayed in Laguna Beach because my daughter and son in law moved to their first house  near by and we came to help.We only needed a clean bed but got so much more. On arrival we tried to get a renovated room, but they were all taken. We had the old motel type room, but the staff could not have been nicer or more helpful.He gave us a room with an ocean view. The room was old but well decorated and the bed was heavenly.Great sheets and pillows. Our next door neighbors decided to party late one night, and as soon as we reported it, we had silence. The first night, we were really bothered by the air conditioner noise, but when we got used to it it was great white noise.The sound was
Manager Response: After helping your daughter and son-in-law move to their new home, it was our pleasure to help you unwind! Sounds like you and your husband did just that, and we're thrilled to hear it. Thanks for the fantastic review, and be sure to come back and see us next time you're in our neck of the woods!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: My husband and I returned to this property for our five year wedding anniversary.  We actually got married at what used to be called the Pacific Edge house on the property - it is now the Deck restaurant.  It was somewhat heartbreaking to see that stunning house split up and the deck now crowded with small tables as it was a really incredible venue.  I am so glad we got to have it for our wedding.  We stayed in a renovated beachfront room and really loved it.  I knew from our wedding guests that the regular rooms at the hotel are nothing fancy, so we sprung for the nicer accommodations.  It was a beautiful and well-appointed room at the corner of the building and it felt private, clean and comfortable.  It had a nice marble countertop and kitchen area, a king size bed and a
Manager Response: I'm thrilled that you were able to book us for your wedding, too! It's so nice to hear that you and your husband wanted to come back and visit us for your fifth anniversary‚Äîthanks for celebrating this milestone with us! Always a pleasure to have you back, so please come see us again soon next time you need to get away!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: The staff is young and energetic.On our way to our beachfront room I was excited that I didnt book one of the old motel looking rooms away from the beach. It was a little bit more money to stay on the beach BUT definitely worth it. We noticed we were not the only couples there.. I guess its the destination for middle aged unhappy couples that like to sit on the balcony and do nothing but stare at the waves. The room was smal but practical, nothing luxurious.  Bright yellow with outdated shower curtain.  The huge king size bed is a plus.  Free coffee but $4 water bottles.  Free lounge chairs and umbrellas on the beach. Great size pool and jacuzzi,  but NO where to layout.          Overall great experience. I went off season in Sept,  so the price was right!!!. Going Sunday
Manager Response: With a beach as beautiful as ours, you're sure to have a fabulous time no matter when you visit! I'm thrilled that you were able to take advantage of our off season pricing, and that you left such detailed feedback about your stay. We'll certainly keep it in mind as we move forward, but in the meantime, I hope you'll come back and see us next time you need to get away!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Not typical of a JVD hotel
Summary: My husband and I enjoy staying at JVD hotels. Our particular favorite is Shorebreak Hotel, Huntington Beach.  The staff at Pacific Edge were attentive and helpful. The lobby area was attractive. Those are probably the only pros I would have for this property Pacific Edge we found to be misleading based on the photos from expedia. After we got to our room, we immediately called the front desk to ask if we could upgrade to one of the rooms that were right next to the water, but they were unfortunately booked.  The location and beach access, as another reviewer was not ideal. The rooms were extremely outdated and comparable to what I would expect of a motel. No matter how well the housekeepers do their job, they can't make a dated room look clean. To make matters worse, the rooms
Manager Response: I'm sorry to learn of your disappointment, Sam, especially since you've had some fabulous getaways at other Joie de Vivre hotels. While we do agree that parts of our hotel are in need of updates, we are also confident that we can only get better through our guests' feedback. As such, we really appreciate your candor, and we hope to have another chance to properly demonstrate our passion for this property in the near future.  Best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: We had a great time at Pacific Edge! The staff was amazing. They toke great care of us and went above and beyond what was expected. Everything was perfect. The views, the room, dining, all was great. Looking forward to staying again.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to welcome you to Laguna Beach, Terrance! Thanks for taking the time to sing our praises. Come back and see us again soon‚Äîthis view is gorgeous all year long!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Pros: Decent price (booked through Priceline), nice decor, friendly staff. Cons: A bit outdated furniture, bathroom is tiny, having to walk a bit of a way to the beach unless you get the ocean view room, didn't expect this since i have to carry my kids. Also, it was a bit noisy when we were there, can almost hear anything going on around us...  Overall, a decent place to stay if you don't want to pay an arm and a leg for beachfront hotels.
Manager Response: I apologize if we were a bit unclear about the location of your room, Lannie. Carrying your little ones can definitely make beach trips more difficult, and we'll certainly keep that in mind for our future guests. That said, I'm glad you found us at a great deal, and that our team made you feel at home. We have several renovations coming up, and I know you'll be thrilled with the results. Hope you'll consider giving us another try next time you need to get away!  Take care, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: We have stayed in Laguna beach for three days, unfortunately it's not long enough. I don't think I have had a more relaxed stay in a hotel in my life. The location is fantastic, only a short walk from restaurants, shops and cafes. The views are to die for if you book a sea view room. The staff are very friendly, and the room we had was nicely decorated and had a large flat screen TV. My wife and I are planning to visit here for longer. So don't be put off by the bad reviews. Mr and Mrs Wilson.
Manager Response: We couldn't be happier to read your kind words, Paul! On behalf of our entire team, thank you for staying with us, and for sharing your story with fellow travelers. Looking forward to welcoming you back!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Needs some care- Dont do it
Summary: I could not recommend this place we paid for a two bedroom suite.  The carpet was dirty, the place was worse than a low grade hotel with high prices.  Buyer Beware .  The adjoining restaurant was great view.  the bathroom had hair on the floor and mildew.  A/C did not work properly and it smelled.
Manager Response: This is very disappointing. We take pride in offering our guests a luxurious getaway, but it's apparent that we fell short. I must apologize, and I'd like to make this right. Please reach out us at bookpacificedge(at)jdvhotels(dot)com if you'd like to discuss this further.  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: The perfect example of a bait and switch. The hotel's website, Expedia, hotels.com, and others are all showing the same picture for the rooms. When you get to the hotel, you will be in for the switch. We booked a room with two full beds and upgraded to the ocean view. When we arrived, the room wasn't ready so they told us to wait on the beach and they would call. 2.5 hours later, still no call and so I decided to call (They told me the room was vacated when they told me 2.5 hours ago). They told me the room is still not cleaned and the housekeeper is on lunch. I am now irritated by this. When we finally got our room, the best part of this place was the view. It's right on the ocean. That's the only great thing about the place, the location and view. The door to the room isn't
Manager Response: I wish that we had been able to offer you a more relaxing vacation, but after reviewing your comments, it is clear that we fell short in terms of service. The attitudes you received and untimely, disorganized service are simply unacceptable, and I know that we're better than this. I want to make this right for you, so please don't hesitate to email us at bookpacificedge(at)jdvhotels(dot)com if you want to talk. Until then, please accept my sincere apologies.   Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Before I arrived at this hotel I was extremely anxious. The reviews after we booked it seemed to be very negative and I was very close to cancelling the reservation! Travelling all the way from Ireland I wanted my stay in all my hotels to be perfect because I couldn't afford to come out and do it all again the right way!  Luckily, I didn't cancel and thank god! Firstly, the staff are really nice and were really chatty during checkin and really helpful giving us information on restaurants in the area. The room we were allocated was absolutely amazing, two seconds away from the beach which is exactly why we wanted to visit laguna beach!  A lot of complaints about the rooms being a bit run down and I have to agree to an extent. However, everything worked just fine. The bed was
Manager Response: We're so happy that you stayed with us! When you're coming from Ireland, we definitely understand how you would want to ensure that every single bit of your stay is perfect and I'm delighted that we were able to provide that for you. You can't go wrong with our location, that's for sure.  Needless to say, we'd absolutely love to welcome you back to your California home away from home. (Plus, I'll be sure to pass along your kind words to the rest of the staff. They'll be delighted to hear it.)  All the best,  Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: We had an amazing ocean view room.  The hotel was decent but we had to have the bathroom cleaned once we arrived as there was someone else's hair all over.  It was nice to open the balcony door and hear the ocean.  One thing that would have made it better would have been if the hotel air conditioning units were inside instead of outside.  Our neighbor had theirs constantly running and it rattled.  Therefore, we didn't want to sit and enjoy the ocean because of the noise.  The bed was very comfortable and one of the best I've ever slept in!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. I'm happy our beds are some of the best you've ever slept on! Our housekeeping team works diligently to ensure that all of our rooms are in tip-top shape so I'm sorry to hear there was an oversight. I am happy you brought it to our attention so we could have your bathroom cleaned in a timely manner.   I appreciate the feedback on what could've made your visit better. Air conditioning units can rattle while keeping our guests cool so I truly apologize if that took away from your stay with us. I'm glad you were able to keep the balcony doors open to enjoy the ocean even if you preferred to not sit outside. Please keep us in mind next time you want to visit Laguna Beach!  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at Pacific Edge in late July. We had a room on the ocean - which I highly recommend if you go. We loved the retro-surfer decor and charm. The staff was wonderful and attentive. We ate at the deck and enjoyed the experience. It was great to step out onto the sand without walking too far ... great for families, couples, friends.
Manager Response: Thanks for the encouraging words, Cindy. Giving our guests a pleasant, relaxing stay is our number one goal, and it sounds like we did just that. Looking forward to welcoming you back next time!  All the best,  Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: What a gem of a hotel!!
Summary: I stayed at the Pacific hotel in Laguna beach a year ago. My room overlooked the Pacific ocean with the most amazing view of the ocean. I woke up each day to sunrise and surfers, what a dream. Not to mention the sound of the waves hitting the shore, how I wish I was back again. The hotel has cheaper rooms across the street from ocean front rooms, but I highly suggest you go all the way and live in grandeur. The room was very nice, clean, nicely decorated and the shower was fit for two...great! I would highly suggest you stay there if you are in Laguna beach, a real gem. The area around the hotel is great even for people without cars, lots to amenties around.
Manager Response: Thanks for the glowing review, Helen. I'm happy to hear you enjoyed our ocean views and accommodations. The next time you visit Laguna Beach, we'd love to host you again!  All the best,  Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: The name Pacific Edge says it all.  First when you enter the room it is bright and cheerful, lots of colors.  You may feel like a surfer.  Then go out to your Balcony/patio to sit, and you are right by the waves and sand, (of course for beach front rooms).  The clear glas patio with railings provides a unobstructed view of the waves rolling in, so close; that you feel the water, and go to sleep with the surf pounding at night, great sleep.
Manager Response: Glad you had such a nice time with us, Cheryl! We aim to show our guests a relaxing stay in Laguna Beach, and it sounds like we were right on point. Hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again soon!  All the best,  Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: The Pacific Edge is a bit on the pricey side, but well worth it for location and view. The property can use some updating on the exterior, but the rooms are nice, clean and comfy. It is worth paying extra and getting a room in the ocean!
Manager Response: Those ocean-side rooms are something, aren't they? Happy to hear we impressed you! Thank you for sharing your kind thoughts, and we can't wait to welcome you back to sunny California.   Sincerely, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Our first room was right on the road side and I had great difficulty sleeping due to noise from road.Room was also in need of serious updating. In the morning I called Madison at the front desk and asked if another room was available. She said she would check & call me back. Within 5 minutes, she called and changed us to an updated room overlooking the pool in the Surf Wing. I was travelling with 4 other women and Madison took it upon herself to move ALL of us to the Surf wing.We were very impressed with the GREAT customer service. Even though our room was not on the beach, the hotel is on the beach. We did enjoy an afternoon at the beach. Definitely would recommend Pacific Edge, but not a room on Pacific HWY .
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to upgrade your room, Estelle! Madison is going to be absolutely thrilled to hear how much she impressed you and your friends. Thanks for letting us know, and for the lovely review. We hope to welcome all of you back again next year‚Äîor sooner!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Amazing views, beautiful hotel, fell in love with this place!! Javid is the best host ever, most welcoming person I have met in a hotel. I travel the world and if you decide to come to Laguna please come see Javid, he will direct to the right locations, make you feel like a local and start your vacation off the way it should be! Thank you Javid for making my vacation perfect!
Manager Response: Javid is going to be so happy to hear from you! I'm thrilled that he and the rest of our team made you feel welcome, and that you enjoyed every minute of your stay. Thanks, Kristen! Looking forward to welcoming you back!  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: The beach is just out your door
Summary: I stayed here years ago when it was Vacation Village.  Cleaned up since then.  For me the main attraction is that you are literally on the beach.  My room was clean, freshly painted, everything worked; including large fridge and coffee maker with very good in room coffee. One queen bed, dinette, kitchenette.  Staff was very polite and very helpful.  There's a charge for parking and valet system.  This means your car is available--never took more than 5 minutes for me--and it doesn't get parking lot dents.   This is within walking distance of downtown Laguna Beach--and all the services and activities there. There is a trolley in summer.    Visited at height of season and found no wild, loud parties, and pretty much no real noise after about 11pm.  Lots of activities for kids and
Manager Response: Laguna Beach is the perfect place for a relaxing late-summer get away! It sounds like you had a lovely time with us, Ron, and I'm thrilled that you enjoyed your room. Thanks for the kind words, and come back and see us next time you need some sun!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: It's a very nice hotel to stay. It's right on the beach end the staff is so nice and helpful. Carolyn the activity coordinator was great with the kids and made sure we always knew what kind of activities were available to us. And there are so many to choose from.loved the painting lessons on the beach. It was clean and in walking distance to everything. Just a lovely place to stay.
Manager Response: Yes, those beach-side painting lessons are always a blast! We're delighted that you and your family had such a lovely stay, and we really appreciate your kind feedback. Thanks, and keep us in mind next time you need a little sunshine!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Sweet family-friendly stay in Laguna Beach
Summary: I loved my trip to Pacific Edge. The staff were great all around, especially the beach attendants and the carolyn who did activities. Smores were amazing and I had never had them with reeses before. The location of the hotel is great too as it is within walking distance to everything.  Loved the Taco Bell next door as well.
Manager Response: We loved having you here! Thank you for making us a part of your trip, and for the wonderful review. We hope to have you back next summer‚Äîor sooner!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: The experience here is California Beach.  Do not look for lots of extras or luxury in the design of the rooms themselves - or of the hotel (not a great place for those with mobility issues). That said, location is great for walking Laguna & for taking the summer trolley. The beach is wonderful & beach service ( including chairs, towels, umbrellas & very helpful beach staff) is complementary & fabulous!  Beds are comfy, linens nice enough & most room towels are fluffy.  Keurig coffee makers & fridges in rooms are convenient touches as is complimentary coffee in lobby.  Our first night was in a room by the street that had not yet been renovated and sleep was impossible. Front desk staff Madison was understanding & moved us to a room near the beach & off the street that had been
Manager Response: Yes, those beach front rooms are pretty great! I'm glad we were able to move you, Dianne, and that you had a lovely time with us. Thank you, and we can't wait to have you back next time you need a little sun!  Regards. Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: I could have given this a 1* but thankfully they sorted my issue out recently, so it's 5* all the way.  I'll focus on the positives first with the one negative at the end.  Me and my girlfriend spent 3 nights here with an ocean room view, and although it was pretty expensive it was worth every last penny.  You're paying for the view and balcony, and whether you're spending time there for breakfast, a afternoon rest, watching the sunset, looking for seals/dolphins, a few beers in the evening or just chilling out by yourself at 2am listening to the waves with a Lagunitas IPA the balcony serves it's purpose.  With the view an balcony, you don't need to be going out all the time to eat and drink.  We ate out only one night at Tommy Bahamma, and lunch at this cool taco place Taco
Manager Response: You're absolutely right‚Äîit really does mean a lot to us that we were able to earn five stars from you, especially after the booking mishap. We're so glad that we were able to clear that up, and that you and your fiance were so impressed with your room. Thank you for your patience, and for making us a part of this special celebration. We'd love to have you back again soon, but until then, congratulations!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Terrible hotel. We arrived and we booked a two bedroom appartment 6 months before. When we came in after our flight from Holland (12hours) the room was not available because of maintenance.....two days later it could be booked. Theo had simply given it away to someone else. We have two daughters who are 8 and 10 and we wanted connecting rooms and that was not possibile. We saw the rooms and we were very pleased that we could go away! The pool is no good and there is much noise. You don't want to be there in your holidays.
Manager Response: First off, please allow me to apologize. After a twelve hour flight, we can completely understand your frustration, and we wish we could have given you and your family a comfortable room in a more timely manner. That said, the mishap you've described is quite surprising, and we want to make this right for you, especially since you had been looking forward to your stay. Please contact us at bookpacificedge(at)jdvhotels(dot)com if you'd like to discuss this further, Mark.  Warm regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Not for business travelers, not for 3 star or more guests. Stay away from The Deck!
Summary: I've only been here for 6 hours and I can't wait to check out. Valet is 24 bucks. I get it. It's right on the sand. The rooms are in buildings that seem like a bunch of Motel units. Old and crusty looking. The room is giant with stained carpet, a giant jacuzzi tub with questionable stains, a shower that is also of a questionable clean nature, a door lock that doesn't work, wifi that might work if you lean up against the window, and walls that you are better off not looking at too closely because there are some very scary looking stains. And then there's the restaurant, The Deck. I was alone so it should be easier to accommodate my paltry needs. They decided to pull out an end table that was being used in the foyer for decorative purposes, move it into a doorway where people were
Manager Response: This is terribly disappointing. After reviewing your comments, it is apparent that we have fallen short for you in terms of our restaurant and our hotel, and we must apologize for your dissatisfying visit. We wish we had been able to address these issues at the time of your stay, especially since you were trying to rest up before your meeting, but we still want to make this right. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you want to discuss this further. Until then, thank you for your candor.

Summary: First and foremost, this place is expensive (think anywhere in South Miami Beach), so if you are willing to pay over $400 a night for a room, by all means bite the bullet and request an Ocean Front room, either in the Reef building, or the Reef Tower. Don't waste $200 to $300 per night on any of the other rooms, as they have no views, and limited privacy. But if you don't mind that, or would rather look at the pool and spa, or a parking lot, you will save money by requesting a cheaper room and still will be adjacent to the ocean. The hotel is dated, but the rooms are bright and spacious (except for the bathroom and vanity areas), and the outdoor balcony is a great place to relax with a drink and view the ocean, although the air conditioning units are located there and are
Manager Response: Although we're glad you were pleased with our team, we wish that the rest of your stay had left you with a similarly positive impression. That said, we are currently in the midst of implementing the necessary upgrades, and many of our guests have had great things to say about our renovations. We'll keep this up and keep your words in mind as we move forward, Tom, and we hope to have another chance to wow you.  Best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Old motel buildings; understaffed; kitchens removed
Summary: We've stayed at Pacific Edge for years, even before it was renamed Pacific Edge.  You paid lower prices than most other Laguna Beach motels to put up with the mold, lack of air conditioning in the second bedroom, non-closing windows, thin walls, torn carpet and dirty couch because you were so darn close to the beach.  Well, they lost us as clients this year.  We booked the two room "suite" almost a year in advance, but when we returned this year, the "suite" was a single room with a fold-out couch and no kitchen!  What was the story?  We never found out, but staying with a family of four in such circumstances was impossible, so we cut our trip short.  The place is under-staffed, and it takes ages to get help at the front desk, for someone to pick up the phone or even bring you
Manager Response: It's upsetting to learn of your recent visit, especially given how much you've enjoyed your previous stays. After reviewing your comments, it's apparent that there was a mix-up with your reservation, and we wish that we had been able to get you into the room you had requested. We apologize, but we know that we're better than this so we want to make it right. Please send us an email at bookpacificedge(at)jdvhotels(dot)com if you'd like to discuss this further. We hope to hear from you soon.  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: I wanted to inquire about renting out multiple cabanas for an event.  I called in last week twice, and each time I was transferred to a voicemail.  No one asked to take me phone number to get back to me.  I went this past weekend to walk the property and see if I could see the space.  The property has one of the best locations, but again that fell short.  I asked to see one of the cabana rooms and was given a different person's card.  I was allowed to see two rooms.  I found a better alternative for our meeting at the Surf and Sands.
Manager Response: It's terribly disappointing that we were unable to get back to you in a more timely fashion, but we want to make this right. Please email us at bookpacificedge(at)jdvhotels(dot)com with your contact information and we will do our best to get in touch with you as soon as possible. We hope to hear from you soon.  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: I don't want to share what a great location this hotel has, but we rely on Tripadvisor reviews to help with our travel worldwide so I guess we need to give back.  Pacific Edge hotel has one of the best "on the beach" locations you will find. But, spring extra if possible for a ocean front room. We were a family of 4 adults, 2 teenagers, and one toddler. We had rooms 133 and 127, which had balconies overhanging the sand. We were there for 5 days. Rooms were spacious and comfortable and the waves broke under the balcony. Staff is very friendly and has good restaurant recommendations. The beach attendants are extremely helpful and you can have them set up and reserve your beach chairs well in advance. you can come and go and be assured the chairs will be there. Please make sure you
Manager Response: We totally understand the urge to keep a good find to yourself, but we really appreciate you taking the time to share your story with fellow travelers! It sounds like all of your had a fabulous time here in Laguna Beach, and it was a pleasure to be a part of it. Thanks again, and stay tuned for all the upgrades yet to come!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Very quaint hotel.  Rooms are small but accommodating and we don't spend much time in the room to begin with.  Beach is nice and we did not go to the restaurant for a meal however we had drinks there and realized we should have gone there for lunch or dinner.  They have 2 pools (large one is salt water and small is fresh) with a large hot tub.  Most things are within walking distance and there is the free bus service right out front.  We rode the entire loop (20 minutes) to get the lay of the land.  It goes pretty far South so it was nice to see the other beaches.   Would recommend to others.
Manager Response: Great idea! It's always good to get a lay of the land during the beginning of your trip. We're so glad you felt welcome, and that you enjoyed your stay in Laguna Beach. Come back and see us next time you need to get away!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: We stayed here our honeymoon night and the following day our out of town family and friends joined us for a day on the beach.  The hotel staff was very accommodating.....provided chairs, lounges, towels, umbrellas, toys for the kids.  Our suite was spacious and had glorious ocean views.
Manager Response: Thanks for celebrating with us! With ocean views like these, it's easy to see how much you enjoyed your stay. Come back and see us again soon before the summer's over!  Congrats, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Every time we attempted to open our door, the card key did not work , back up to the front desk to rekey. Annoying.  The tv didnt work and an item of my personal belongings was missing. Would NOT recommend, ever   Poor attention to the small things which make a stay worthwhile.
Manager Response: Although we must apologize for your card key, we are truly concerned about your comments regarding missing items. Our staff was hired for their integrity and their hard work, and as such we do not believe they were responsible for this. Still, we take reports like this very seriously, and we'd like to know more about your visit so we can get to the bottom of this. Please email us at bookpacificedge(at)jdvhotels(dot)com so we cam discuss this in depth.  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Family Gathering at Pacific Edge Hotel, Laguna Beach
Summary: My family and I would like to express our deepest gratitude to all the staff at the Pacific Edge Hotel for helping to make our recent family gathering truly special and unforgettable. This past July, 12 members of our family came together to honor the memory of my late mother.  While the day would include witnessing from the shore the scattering of her ashes from an airplane off the coast, the majority of the time would be spent relaxing at the beach, recalling fond memories and sharing our hopes and aspirations all in celebration of her rich life.  I knew that the Pacific Edge Hotel would be the perfect setting for this event as soon as I spoke to bungalow manager Christina Lomonaco, who was sincerely moved by our plans, and who helped to arrange the reservation of a day use
Manager Response: It was an absolute pleasure for all of us to be a part of this beautiful celebration. On behalf of our entire team, thank you for choosing to share this special moment with us, Juliet. Please send our warmest regards to your family, and thank you for taking the time to review us.  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: I have stayed here for extended stays each of the last two Januarys (2012 and 2013).  The first year we stayed in a Village room at an unbelievably low price but the room was old and outdated. My wife said she would not return to that hotel.  I talked her into giving it another chance by spending a lot more, booking a junior suite.  Much better experience.  They are slowly updating the rooms, and I would not recommend a stay in the old rooms at any price.  The service and location are as good as it gets. I will likely return for 2014.
Manager Response: We're so glad you gave us another shot! Thanks for taking a chance on us, and for your kind words. We can't wait to have you back in 2014‚Äîor sooner!  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: First, the ONLY good thing about this "hotel" (should I say, Motel) is Rafael at the front desk, Hilario in maintance and Teresa the housekeeper along with the great location. The hotel is supposed to be a remodeled "fancy" hotel, especially at the price.  Well the rooms are small with ugly furniture and the bathroom was disgusting and dirty!  Paint chipping and mold.  Gross! They say it is family friendly, but they took out the kitchens!  I have a small child and all around is very expensive resturants.  I don't want to ruin someone's evening out by taking my child to a nice resturant.  Plus we had brought food, being told our room had a kitchen.  We had to purchase another ice chest and constantly go out and get ice!   We had a horrible family stay next door to us, who were
Manager Response: It's disappointing that our team was unable to show you a better time, Lincoln. Although we are in the midst of completing the necessary upgrades for our guests, we are thoroughly disheartened by your comments about some of our staff members. Unfortunately, we are unable to affect our guests' parenting style, but we apologize if your neighbor's became bothersome. We also apologize for the interaction you witnessed with our valet, but you can rest assured that we have rectified that with this particular guest. We hope you'll consider this moving forward. Until then, thank you for your candor.   Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Splendid Birthday at Pacific Edge Hotel, Laguna Beach
Summary: It was my birthday and I had one night only to celebrate in Laguna Beach, my favorite beach resort.  Joie De Vivre's Pacific Edge Hotel by the sea made it truly memorable. Not only was the upgraded room spotlessly clean, but the amenities were outstanding. The front desk was eager to please and sent me a gift basket for my birthday, and wine, which I shared with friends. "The weather may be cloudy or sunny," but don't let any clouds keep you away from enjoying the fine hospitality of Pacific Edge Hotel.
Manager Response: Wow! We're absolutely honored to be your favorite beach resort! Thank you for celebrating your special day with us. We'd love to have you back again soon, whatever the occasion!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: This was my second time at the Pacific Edge....we had the best of rooms...right over the ocean. The sound of the surf was almost too loud!!! With a room and location like this, one might never need to leave the room. All of the staff were extremely pleasant, kind and helpful. They make you feel like you are important to them. Anything that you ask for, they try to accommadate. This trip was during the summer and they have all sorts of activities..hot dogs and beer around the pool, escorted walks around Laguna, evening s'mores, etc. The refrigerator in the room is ample and the coffee maker is nice...just wish they had microwaves in all rooms.This is a lovely place if you want to be 'on' the water!!!
Manager Response: S'mores, surf, and the sound of the waves‚Äîit doesn't get more California than that! Your kind words were a real treat to read, so thanks for leaving them. We'd love to have you back again soon!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: We were able to check in early and the location is great. the rooms however were very disappointing. The cedar closet made the room smell like a hamster cage. No wash cloths or trash can, and an icky old shower curtain. The of the room was very random.
Manager Response: We are quite shocked to learn of the condition of your room, Kathryn. Although we do not receive complaints like yours often, we're happy to report that we are indeed in the midst of implementing the necessary updates for our guests, and we look forwarding to completing them for our entire hotel. Thanks for your candor, and let us know if you have any further suggestions.  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: The hotel and staff were great.  This was my first visit to Laguna Beach and I had an excellent time with my stay at the Pacific Edge.  The room was perfect and was clean and comfortable.  The staff made me feel welcome upon my arrival and was extremely helpful and courteous during my entire stay.  Another great feature they had was an Activities Coordinator, she was spectacular and I enjoyed having something fun to do around the hotel.  She had something fun for all ages and an awesome personality, just right for the job; that made my stay even better than expected.  I would definitely stay at the Pacific Edge again.  Thanks to all the staff for making my vacation a most memorable one!!!
Manager Response: Glad we could make your first visit to Laguna Beach such a good one, Brian! We'll be sure to share your comments with our whole team‚Äîthey'll be thrilled to see how much you enjoyed your trip. Thanks for the kind words, and come back and see us next time you need a little sunshine!  Best wishes, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: this is our family's 7th straight year staying here. even though we have always had a great time here, this year was the best. if you need anything on the beach the crew of Devin, Ben and Dara will take care of everything. you can just sit back and enjoy. the new activities coordinator was awesome. the valet parking staff was always helpful especially Jordon who helped me unload my luggage. Adam who was security was also very helpful, but the person who was behind the whole crew was the new front desk manager Mr. Brian Sullivan. He seems to have the Pacific Edge in great order. He really made our stay the best it has ever been. It is always very hard to leave this resort. so we decided to stay another day. Mr. Sullivan was very kind to make sure all our arrangements were taken
Manager Response: Our team is going to be so happy to hear your kind words, Eddie! We're absolutely delighted that they made you feel welcome, and we hope to continue becoming even better in the coming years. Thank you for making us your go-to getaway! We can't wait til welcome you back.  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Javid helped us on the day of check in and not only did he welcome us with such warmth he waked us around the property to show us our room, and the potential upgrade we could get. We did in fact upgrade to one of the Newly renovated rooms, and it was so worth it! We have a beautiful oceanfront view, great clean room, and for a price that was less than expected. Javier also surprised us about an hour after check in win a bottle of wine that he personally delivered. Very nice, very helpful, and his was a great stay!   Some of the other buildings aren't renovated yet, and I am not sure if my experience would have been the same. Parts are dated, but with the new renovations in place, eventually the entire hotel will be first class.
Manager Response: We're so glad that you loved your stay in our newly appointed rooms! Thanks for sharing that with us, and for your fabulous rating. We'd love to have you back again soon.  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: This place is everything you need in Laguna Beach for a weekend.  This hotel is our spot for a girls getaway weekend.  The hotel is updated and beautiful, clean and cozy.  The rooms are perfect in size and have everything you'll need for a weekend at the beach.  The only negative is they close the pool and spa at 10pm- even if you're an adult wanting to enjoy a late night dip.
Manager Response: Thanks for making us a part of your girls weekend! It sounds like you had a blast here in Laguna Beach, and we're thrilled to hear it. Hope to welcome all of you back next time you need to get away!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: This hotel was very nice. Our hotel balcony was literally 8 feet off the ground above the beach. Incredible views. The staff was very friendly. Both pools are heated. The beach is small and very rocky. Beware of the very strong rip tides.
Manager Response: Yes, those currents can get strong! Thanks for the tip, and for sharing your kind words with fellow travelers. We'd love to welcome you back next time you need a little sunshine!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Booked 3 rooms for a weekend family reunion at a cost of almost $3000. None of the great experiences other reviewers mentioned happened to us. I had to accommodate 3 adults in Room with one double bed.  Because there was no elevator to Transport my mother in her wheelchair into the room with 2 beds.  The receptionist tried to resolve the problem but he did not seem too interested. When I paid the bill I voiced my discontent and the young lady asked me if I had requested handicap access when I made my reservation. When I said no, she made it sound that it was all my fault. The feedback from the rest of the family was dismal at best.  The grounds are unkept, the rooms and furniture have seen better years. The valet took over 1 hour to bring the car. Hope anybody reading this will
Manager Response: It's upsetting that we were unable to resolve these issues before you checked out, but we're happy to address your concerns now. We should have been more understanding during our discussion of our handicap access, and we apologize if we were curt. We'll discuss this with our team, but we want to clarify that we are in the midst of renovating our buildings for future guests. That said, we would have been happy to move you to a new room during your stay, so don't hesitate to ask. Until then, thanks for letting us know about this, and please don't hesitate to reach out if you'd like to follow up.  Best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Hotel was OK.  The view is nice. Location is great. Beach front is SMALL. If paying less I would give a higher rating, but i believe it is overpriced for what you get. Staff was wonderful so no complaints there. Valet was horrendous and we waited 1 hour to get our car, after multiple other people had been helped. We were not only ones who waited. Another individual had waited as well. Recommend they review their valet procedures to improve.
Manager Response: We are shocked to learn of the hour-long wait for your car, Jennifer. This is completely out of the ordinary, and we'll look into this right away to make sure that instances like this remain few and far between. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any further concerns.  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: This should not be a Joie de Vivre hotel
Summary: Yikes. This is not consistent with the rest of the chain. I was traveling on business whereas it was clear that the majority of the guests were vacationing families. That didn't bother me but what did bother me is the dirty, chipped paint in my room (for which I'd been charged an upgrade fee - which to their credit, they refunded when I complained), the dirty chipped furniture, the peeling paint from the fixtures in the bathroom (vintage 1980s), the broken fluorescent light covers in the entryway, carpet so dirty I was afraid to do yoga on it in the morning, broken TV, broken sink, towels with stains (most hotels throw away towels with stains that won't bleach out). I'd agreed the upgrade because I wanted a quiet room (having been on the road for 2 weeks) but the rattling and
Manager Response: We are proud to be a part of the Joie de Vivre family, so it's terribly upsetting to see that you felt our hotel fell short. That said, we are happy to announce that we are indeed in the midst of implementing the necessary upgrades for our guests, and we are fully confident that these renovations will allow us to become even better. We hope that you have the opportunity to experience them for yourself next time you're in the Laguna Beach area, but until then, thank you for your feedback. It is words like yours that inspire us to continue striving for excellence.  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Steps to the Sand in Laguna Beach
Summary: My boyfriend had originally booked a one night stay for a standard room through Booking.com. When we checked in, we got upgraded to an oceanfront room, literally steps to the sand. Views to die for. The most spectacular sunsets and SO romantic. Great for couples. We loved it so much that we decided to stay an additional night. Too beautiful to leave. In addition, the staff was very gracious and accommodating. If you're looking for a hotel on the sand, this is the call. You won't be sorry.
Manager Response: Thanks for spending the weekend with us! We can't blame you for wanting to spend an extra night with us‚Äîbetween the ocean views, fresh air and comfortable room, it's pretty hard to leave. We hope to have you and your boyfriend back again soon, but until then, thank you for the wonderful review!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Pacific Edge was nice and relaxing!
Summary: I would like to commend the service overall.  The staff exceeded expectations in customer service.  They were all very nice, accommodating and try to please their guests.   A special thanks to Ben and Tanner at the beach.  Both were very personable and went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable.  Ben impressed us (nice touch) by remembering our names!  Thank you front desk staff for your efficiency and being very polite.    The balcony view was spectacular!  We enjoyed sitting there taking in the heavenly view!  We would definitely stay there again!  Kindest Regards, Tracy & Rowena Crow
Manager Response: Ben and Tanner will be thrilled to hear from you! It was such a treat to read your kind words, and to know that our team made you feel at home. Thanks! We'd love to have you back again next time you need a little sunshine!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: EXTRA STAR- ONLY BECAUSE OF THE VIEW
Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed on the beach front, 1st floor so We are really close to the beach. We got an overnight deal so it was really cheap. Since we got them out of a deal, we were place on an oldest building. It looked like a motel, I can see rusts from the door. But it was clean and we had stayed mostly on the patio because it was very pretty outside. So if you are not getting a beach front room, don't stay here because I don't believe that their price is worth without a view.  I can say that I will come back, only if there is a deal again.
Manager Response: Glad you and your boyfriend enjoyed your stay! It's hard to beat that view, but we wish that you room had left you just as impressed. However, we're happy to say that we're in the midst of renovations, so hopefully your next visit proves to be even better. Until then, thanks for the kind words!  Take care, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: The Cabanas at Pacific Edge Hotel - a summer MUST!
Summary: After hearing rave reviews of the cabanas at Pacific Edge Hotel I jumped on the opportunity to spend a day here after finding a great deal via TravelZoo.  From the time of booking to the end of our afternoon, everything was amazing.  Fun atmosphere, great cabana layout (tv for guys needing to watch a game or catch up on Sports Center & the private bathroom - love it!),  amazing views, and tentative staff.  Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a fun day in beautiful Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Great views, sunshine and a few drinks‚Äîthose cabanas are hard to beat! So happy to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us. Thanks for the stellar review!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: In the midst of trying to get a wedding planned in California and living in Arizona making a trip to "the golden state" is like a mini vacation. We luckily located at super deal for a room at the Pacific Edge.   Since we were traveling we arrived before check in and advised if our room was ready we would be happy to check in. The gentleman advised that the room was not ready and asked for a contact number that they could reach me at once ready...they asked for priority cleaning. I also shared with the gentleman at front desk that we were scoping out the hotel for our stay during our wedding.  While we waited for our room to be prepped we visited the Beach house restaurant. The view from the balcony was nice although the food wasn't too great. We ordered the grilled kabobs with
Manager Response: We are beyond elated to be a part of your wedding, Lissette! On behalf of our entire team, thank you so much for allowing us to take part in the celebration. Good luck with the rest of your wedding planning, and we'll see you in August!  Congratulations!  Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Like many of the other reviews I must agree that the rooms are pretty standard and in tough condition. Not at all 5 star until you walk out on your deck and see the view. The location and service are what make this hotel. The staff go over the top to ensure that you have a great time and I would absolutely return.
Manager Response: It's so rewarding to hear how much you enjoyed your stay, Kim. From our friendly staff to our gorgeous ocean views, it sounds like you had the ultimate beach getaway! That said, we wish that your room had left you with a better impression, but we know that our renovations will wow you. Until next time, thanks for the kind words. We can't wait to welcome you back!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Right on the sand in Laguna Beach!
Summary: This first-class hotel is right on the sand! Rooms are spacious and airy, especially the beachfront rooms and the junior suites. Windows galore, udpated furnishings with coffee maker and fridge. Hotel staff has been excellently trained, from the valet to housekeeping to front desk. Front Office Manager Brian Sullivan was extremely accommodating when our wedding party needed early check-in to dress for the occasion. Our group of 30 or so loved this property, and we can't wait to come back for another stay!
Manager Response: Wow! Sounds like you had a fabulous time here in Laguna Beach! Thanks for soaking up the sun with us, and for the stellar review. Come back and see us next time you need to get away!  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Stayed here last week for three nights. The staff were nice and accommodating. The room we stayed in was not renovated yet, and it was very old and tired looking. We didn't mind, because we were there for the view. We were oceanfront, which was amazing. The cabana boys are sweet, and will look after you while you are relaxing by the ocean. The location is perfect, as it is right in downtown laguna beach. Overall, we had a great time, and we are picky people.
Manager Response: Between our location, our friendly staff and the ocean breeze, it sounds like you had a fantastic time with us, Jasmyn! We couldn't be happier to hear it. Thanks for the kind words, and keep us in mind next time you need to get away!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great service and amenities at a fantastic location
Summary: We stayed in a two bedroom apartment for four nights. After reading so many negative reviews, I was very worried, but it turned out to be a wonderful place to stay. The most important about the room: although older, it was very clean, the beds were comfortable, the televisions were updated, and we had plenty of space to relax and enjoy. Traveling with four young children is never easy (or cheap), but this hotel provided great value and great amenities! It was so nice to have chairs, umbrellas, towels, and toys waiting for us at the beach each day. We also thoroughly enjoyed the pools and hot tub. Being right on the beach and close to everything in town is a big plus, too. Overall, we were extremely happy we chose to stay at Pacific Edge and will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a fabulous time in Laguna Beach! Thank you for staying with us, and for taking the time to sing our praises‚Äîwe're glad that we exceeded your expectations! Keep us in mind next time you're looking to get away.  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Relaxing Trip at a Beach/Ocean Front Hotel
Summary: First of all the staff was great over the phone prior to our trip. Spoke w/ a variety of people including Christina Lomanaco who is a Sales Manager there. Marissa at the front desk and Aikiko were always very pleasant and helpful as well.  We were in the Surf Tower and the waves literally hit the bottom of the building. The sound of the ocean was wonderful and very calming and relaxing after long days out and about. My wife loved the two sinks in the room which was helpful when four of us are trying to get ready. Big spacious fridge in the room and all the amenties you would expect plus the a great balcony w/ some deck chairs to sun or just to unwind.  On Saturday nights they show a movie poolside for the kids which was a great treat. They swam and watched Nemo from the pool and
Manager Response: Wow, Michael! Sounds like the ultimate getaway! Thanks for relaxing with us, and for your kind words. We can't wait to have you back again!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Everything about the service was wonderful. Javid and Marissa at the front desk were very friendly and extremely helpful. Every request I made of them was handled promptly and with enthusiasm. I was even able to check in early! Such a relief to not have to wait around! Subsequently, we were able to get down to the beach that day. Taylor down on the beach was also great. Even though it was starting to get late and he probably needed to start cleaning up, he made us feel welcome and provided great service. We really felt taken care of on this trip! The only thing that beats the location of this property is the service they provide! We will definitely be back due to your great staff!
Manager Response: Javid, Marissa and Taylor are going to be so happy to hear from you! Thanks for staying with us, and for the shout out to our team. We can't wait to welcome you back again next year‚Äîor sooner!  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: My wife previously stayed at hotel it was rough, the room too small bad service ect.  They invited us back we sated in the Surf tower, ocean view.  The newly decorated room was very nice and the view wa fantastic!
Manager Response: We couldn't be happier to hear how much you and your wife enjoyed your stay with us, Jeff! On behalf of our entire staff, thank you for taking the time to share this with us‚Äîyour kind words were a pleasure to read. We'd love to have you two back again soon!  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: DO NOT BELIEVE HOEL WEB SITE
Summary: Last year stayed in Laguna Beach California at different property and came across 'The Deck' social bar scene attatched to Pacific Edge Hotel.This year booked Pacific Edge hotel because of this and paid in total $1000 for 2 nights including parking and taxes.Read all on their web site before booking..Early check in went great until walking to our ocean front room.It was very dirty and bad state of repair.Doors were corroded,paint peeling off walls,tv and air con did not work,room key access worked 1 out of every 8 tries.The view was great of the ocean.Walked to 'The Deck' on property and found it was closed until next month.Staff said  when I complained of the room condition that i should have booked the restored section of property..like we were given a choice ?This hotel gives
Manager Response: We apologize if you felt mistreated during your stay with us. We should have been far more considerate as you were voicing your concerns, and we're terribly sorry that we fell short. We know that we're better than this, and we'd like to make this right. Don't hesitate to email us at bookpacificedge(at)jdvhotels(dot)com if you'd like to discuss this further.  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: The reception holds so much promise, it is light and airy and manned by very helpful staff. The bedroom decoration is fine, but the rooms are laid out in an odd style. You can hear your neighbours as if they are in your room and if you have a room at the front, the road noise is constant. The bathrooms seem to be an additional thought. The buildings housing the rooms are in different parts-not all together, the paid valet parking (only option) is also located away from the front. It's all a bit topsy-turvey!! Laguna Beach itself is very pretty, lovely beaches-but very busy. On reflection, we wished we had stayed down the road at Newport.
Manager Response: Although we're thrilled that you enjoyed the ocean views of Laguna Beach, we wish that your stay with us had left you with similar feelings. After reading your comments, it appears that you were staying in a room that was not facing the beach, but we would have been happy to discuss moving you to a different building. We apologize for that, and we would love to hear any additional feedback you may have in order to show a five-star experience to our future guests. Until then, thanks for taking the time to review us, Joanna. We hope to have another chance to impress you once our renovations are complete.   Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for one night with our two kids (5 and 7). It was nice to park the car and be able to walk to the main part of town very easily and have the beach right outside the hotel. We would have loved to stay longer if time allowed. Perhaps the nicest perk for us was the ability to reserve a VIP tour at the nearby Pacific Marine Mammal Center, a hospital for sea lions and seals. You have to call yourself and make the reservation, but it was so worth it. I enjoyed it as much as my kids. It's a small center, but they do amazing work and I appreciate staying at a hotel that supports them. We will definitely stay here again next time we are in the area.
Manager Response: We're delighted that you had a chance to visit the Pacific Marine Mammal Center, Liz! It's one of our favorite places, and we're sure that your kids loved every minute. Thank you for supporting this fantastic cause, and for sharing your kind words about your stay with us. We hope to welcome all of you back again soon!  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: We travelled many miles to reach this beautiful destination a perfect location.........but with a trailer park room, I was astounded to realise we were paying $400 per night, honestly it had a wood chip effect on the wall!. Everything was warped or paint was flaking ! I spoke to the manager Brian, who stated the views were great, but surely you cannot rely on just a view?. He was decent enough, but I would avoid this hotel like a plague!. It was like a British butlins. Then the hot water stopped working! ..... For 12 hours , if you turned any tap on it smelled like an open sewer!! Disgusting!! Avoid, avoid avoid! I never used trip advisor before booking this hotel, I will next time
Manager Response: While I'm pleased to hear that you were happy with Brian's service, I wish that we had been able to show you a more relaxing vacation. The tap water and chipped paint you described fall far beneath our standards, and as such we would have been happy to move you to another room. That said, we will certainly keep your thoughts in mind as we work to improve for our guests. Thank you for taking the time to leave such candid feedback.  Best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: We just stayed at the hotel for 3 nights with our three boys and had a wonderful time. The hotel, like every building on the beach is older than some may hope, but we found our rooms to,be updated, clean and the location directly on the beach cannot be beat. The staff was very friendly, attentive and helpful, especially those working the beach. Our kids lovd the access to the sand as well a the pool,and hottub. Definately request a room on the water. In the end, a great location for central Laguna, a nice hotel and we'll look forward to staying there again.
Manager Response: Sounds like the whole family had a fantastic time with us! Thanks for coming away with us, Drew. We'd love to welcome you back again next year, or sooner!  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Christina Lomonaco Bungalow Sales Manager is such a DELIGHT TO WORK WITH
Summary: I had my daughters 1st birthday party in the Bungalows recently and WOW what a success. The food was amazing the SERVICE was phenomenal. We have been coming here since they started the cabanas, now Bunglows! We did , New years, Halloween and other birthdays here at The Bungalow on The Deck. But now that they are all remodeled and newly staffed with professionals , I honestly was impressed!  The servers go above and beyond what I expected, everyone was super friendly and very accommodating throughout the day. From checking in with the staff at the front desk to the time we spend down at the Bungalows, Christina really made our experience memorable! She let us arrive a little bit earlier then the check in time of 11am, and even helped me decorate the Bungalow with streamers and
Manager Response: We're so glad that we could help you celebrate such a momentous occasion! Thank you for making us a part of this special day, and for sharing your kind words‚ÄîChristina will be beyond thrilled!  Warm regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location / Very Old Rooms / Mildew Smell
Summary: The carpets in the room literally had sand embedded into it and had an overwhelming smell of mildew. They are in dire need of a good renovation, the buildings are just too old. The only saving grace is that it is located directly on the beach. Not very good for a family, but maybe acceptable for young college students looking for an economy beach hotel.
Manager Response: The conditions you've described fall far beneath our standards, and we apologize. We wish that we had been able to move you to a room that better suited your needs, but we appreciate your candor. Still, we're delighted that you enjoyed our location, and we hope to have another chance to wow you once our renovations are complete.  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: Upon check in I received an oustanding welcome from Javid he was very professional and extremelly couretous. Javid took the time to make sure all of my needs were met and even offered suggestions for great places in the area to dine. I enjoyed the view from my room and the overall stay was very pleasant. The view of the ocean from my room was oustanding and the overall decor made my stay even more enjoyable. I would like to suggest a couple of improvements. overall cleaniness, issues with TV not turning on, and the walls were thin. yet again what impressed me the most was the oustanding Customer Service I received from Javid. He is an assest to your hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to share your experience. I'm thrilled to hear Javid made your stay so memorable, and I'll be sure to pass along your compliments. Thanks as well for your constructive criticism‚Äîwe'll certainly put it to good use. If you're ever back in Laguna Beach, I hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again!  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: I received a voucher to experience an amazing getaway at Pacific Edge Hotel for a day with friends through a charity event participated in. I must admit my first thought was that it was going to be some cheesy pass for a day... But I'm happy to say it couldn't be further From the truth! I was in contact with Christina my planner and she set me up with the Fox racing Bungalow for the day and made every transition a walk in the park. As for the staff I must say was just as Fanaminal with their full, kind  hospitality. I've been to a lot of upscale locations and I must say the service I received at Pacific Edge far exceeded any expectations. Bottom line is my friends and I had a blast and if your looking for a fun getaway call them up and see for yourself...
Manager Response: Happy to hear you and your group had such a pleasant stay with us! Friendly, accommodating service is one of our top priorities, so it's great to know you found our staff so helpful. The next time you're in Laguna Beach, I hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back.  All the best, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Old, small, loud, and poor service
Summary: We arrived in Southern California so excited to start our vacation. We pulled into the Pacific Edge Hotel and were surprised to find that it was actually a 50+ yr old MOTEL that was dressed up with outdoor furniture, etc.  it was 2:15, but only 1 of our 3 rooms was ready. They said they would put us on "priority" so our other rooms would be ready very soon. So, we took an hour long walk down the street. They never called us as promised, so we came back and asked if our rooms were ready. The response, "2 of the 3 are ready, but we will call you when the last one is ready. Another jour and a half later, I called them and found that our third room was ready. The rooms are VERY small, old, and loud!  My room shakes every time someone closes their door. Huge disappointment.  We are
Manager Response: We are truly sorry that we were unable to welcome you in a more timely manner, Joseph. We wish that we had been able to show you a five-star experience, but we completely understand your frustration. That said, we are proud to announce that we are currently completing the necessary upgrades for our guests, and we are confident that feedback like yours will only allow us to become better. We hope to demonstrate this in the near future.  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: There are plenty of negative reviews about this hotel and I actually don't agree with them. I was skeptical at first, but after our check in, I was surprised at how well maintained the property was. The front desk asked us if we wanted to upgrade to a suite for an additional $180-200? Or room was just fine. We had a view of the ocean in our room anyway. I bet though if you do upgrade to an ocean front room, your view would make you cry at its beauty. We loved the hotel. We had a slight me up with our key, and were offered a bottle of wine in response. There is coffee in the lobby as well as free mimosas in the morning for us early risers. We loved the beach house deck for breakfast. Good job folks. There was a huge amount of trash left over from guests on the beach near the
Manager Response: We're glad that we exceeded your expectations! Although we're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and our gorgeous ocean views, it seems that our appearance left you disappointed. We apologize, and we will certainly check in with our team about making sure that ours is a welcoming space. Thanks for your feedback. We hope to have you back next time you're looking to get away!  Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: We LOVE Christina and the Pacific Edge Bungalows!!!!
Summary: I just got off the phone Christina Lomonaco, the manager, and I was so amazed at her level of professionalism and courtesy!! We had gone to a birthday party at one of their bungalows last summer and we met her there.  She came over to us and checked on us to see if we needed or wanted anything.  The service was impeccable, the bungalow was so inviting and made the party just that much more incredible!!  Now, it's our turn to make a reservation for my daughter's party at the Hobie bungalow and we are absolutely excited about it.  Christina was extremely efficient in providing me with specific information as well as the weekday price for reserving a bungalow was not exorbitant.  Her friendly demeanor made it easy to ask questions as she took the time to explain in detail what to
Manager Response: We're thrilled that Christina and the rest of our team have made you feel welcome! We can't wait to host your daughter's party‚Äîwe know that it'll definitely be an event to remember!   Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary Heading: Please update rooms or don't charge so much!
Summary: We had several rooms at the hotel.  Rooms were very dated but were clean and the staff was great. While clean, showers and sink needed to be replaced and also carpeting.  TV's were very old, and we had some difficulty operating them.  Beach was beautiful and service on the beach was great.  Make sure you check to make sure you get an updated room. Also, not all rooms have a view of he ocean.  Yes, there is a street running between the different sections of the hotel.  Hotel is kid friendly and the kids had a great time. Great location.
Manager Response: We're thrilled that you and your kids had such a fabulous time with us, Shirley! However, it's disappointing that we were unable to show you a five-star experience. We'd like to apologize for the state of your room, and we know that we can do better. We will certainly keep your comments in mind as we work to move forward. Thank you for your candor.   Regards, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Pacific Edge hotel recently. It's a very old hotel but the location and service can not be beat. The hotel is spread out and there is a street in between the hotel(very odd). This is not your average hotel. It needs work, maybe a lot of work, but the views of the ocean can not be compared to any other hotel we have stayed at.  The old rooms had very small bathrooms. Room had a slight smell to it and were not as clean as we would like. The balcony faces the Pacific Ocean and the view of the ocean was endless. The hotel is non smoking but we saw a few people smoking in their rooms. Free Wifi. A few issues, the walls are thin, the electricity went out twice and the TV didn't always work. Parking is $24. A little pricey.    The hotel has 2 restaurants
Manager Response: We're glad that you and your husband enjoyed your stay, but we apologize if you were disappointed with your room. However, we are happy to report that we are indeed in the midst of renovations, and we hope that your next visit proves to be even better. Thank you for sharing your story with us, and for your kind words‚Äîwe know that Javid will be thrilled to hear them! We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Cheers, Bill Tremper, General Manager

Summary: We just got home from a great week in Laguna - have to say the entire family was sad to go...  Just wanted to point out some things about our stay.  Yes, the hotel is a mix of newly renovated rooms and ones that need some tlc - our two bedroom apartment was a tlc room.  But with that said we had the understanding before we arrived it was a little on the "tired" side.  In reality it was perfect for our family - mom, dad, daughter (8), and son (4).  We had a kitchenette which allowed us to have breakfast in the morning and sometimes lunch in our room.  The only thing missing was probably a mini- microwave.  But we survived....  The beds were great - linens perfect - the bathroom could have been bigger and a little nicer but then again it was clean and great towels, etc.    The
Manager Response: Sounds like a lovely family vacation, Laura! Although we couldn't be happier to hear your kind words regarding our hotel, we wish that your room had left you with a more favorable impression. However, we're happy to report that we are in the midst of renovations, and we know that our guests will be thrilled with the results!
